svasthānād acalad api gṛhyate
ceti virodhaḥ | grahaṇaṃ tvāvarjanam iti ca na virodhaḥ || 104 ||

acchinnam avirataṃ nī
rasaṃ rāgaśūnyaṃ tat saṃskāramātreṇa pravṛttaṃ yad rataṃ tatrāsaktā mattatvād āsīt_ || 105
||

lg.l: nipītaḥ san rāgaṃ prakaṭayati no vā kim adhikam |
kim ānandasyaiko na bhavatitarāṃ hetur atanoḥ

div.p:
khaṇḍanādinā dvayor apy abhedād adharapallavaḥ sudṛśāṃ candra eva | tatraikasya khaṇḍanaṃ
daśanakṣatāt_, aparasya tu prāyaśo 'paripūrṇatvāt_ | ekaḥ priyeṇa pīto rāgaṃ vyasanam abhi
vyanakti, dvitīyas tu rāhuṇāsvādito rāgam aruṇatvāt_(tvam_) | eko 'tanoḥ kāmasya saṃba
ndhina ānandasya hetuḥ, anyas tasyaivātanor analpasya | sudhāsrāvitvaṃ ca dvayor api || 107 ||
tasyādharasya khaṇḍanenārditā vyathitā | lāsako nartakaḥ || 108 ||

rāgasya ratasyānte
rasād dṛṣṭir apūrvaivāvirabhavat_ | nistimitāḥ sukhasaṃvedanād asaṃcetitāḥ kālasya kalā aṃ
śavo yasyām_ || 109 ||
jaghanarohāv ūrū | kāṇḍaśabdaḥ praśaṃsāyām_ || 110 ||
avitīrṇa ity akārapraśleṣaḥ || 111 ||

līlādayaś ceṣṭāviśeṣāḥ | tatra—‘vāgaṅgālaṃkāraiḥ
śliṣṭaiḥ prītiprayojitair madhuraiḥ | iṣṭajanasyānukṛtir līlā jñeyā prayogajñaiḥ ||’, ‘sthānāsanaga
manānāṃ hastabhrūnetrakarmaṇāṃ caiva | utpadyate viśeṣo yaḥ śiṣṭaḥ sa tu vilāsaḥ syāt_ ||’
iti līlāvilāsau | kilakiñcitahāvāv uktau | ‘vidagdhaśṛṅgārarasopapannāṃ vadhūjanasyā
bhiniveśaniṣṭhām_ | vadanti helām iha cāruceṣṭāṃ janeṣu hevāka iti prasiddhām_ ||’ iti tu
helā || 113 ||

pūrvam ārambhakāle ślathīkṛtā anu paścāc citaḥ pravṛddho dhārṣṭyaparigraho yatra
tadbhāvād rabhasena ratāvegenotsāritā unmalitā lajjā ratyante kṛtasaṃbhramatvād āvirabhūt_ |
atrānucitadhārṣṭyaparigrahatvād iti hetutayā yojyam_ | tadānīṃ dhārṣṭyasyāyogyatvād ityarthaḥ
|| 114 ||

lg.l: kiṃ mattatā kim athavā sudṛśāṃ vyadhatta

div.p: upaśamavelā rātreḥ pariṇatisamayaḥ || 116 ||

iti śrībālabṛhaspatyanujīvino vāgīśvarāṅkasya vidyādhipatyaparanāmno mahākave
rājānakaśrīratnākarasya kṛtau ratnāṅke haravijaye mahākāvye
saṃbhogavarṇano nāma saptaviṃśaḥ sargaḥ |

iti rājā
nakajayānakasūnor alakasya kṛtau haravijayaviṣamapadoddyote saptaviṃśaḥ sargaḥ ||
aṣṭāviṃśaḥ sargaḥ |

tapanabhayaṃ sūryāt trāsaḥ tapanaṃ ca tāpas tad eva bhayam_ | tato hi śrāntāyā yoṣito darpaṇaḥ
patati | uḍūni nakṣattrāṇi tatpaṅktir eva muṣṭibhūtā śṛṅkhalā tayānyatra viśaśre patitam_
|| 1 ||

kṣaṇadā rātris tatrāhato mṛdaṅgaḥ priyaviyogaviklavā yoṣito yad vidadhire tad dhṛ
dayaśūnyatvam akarot_ (?) || 2 ||

lg.l: na khalu kila vibhāvarī gateti kṣaṇavinimīlitadṛṣṭir eva tasthau || 3 ||
tanutimiraniruddhatārakaśrīr atha rataye na babhūva yātayāmā || 4 ||

div.p:
indubimbaṃ candrasadṛśa ābhogo 'pi (?) | ti
miraṃ cakṣurvikāro 'pi | tārake kanīnike api | yātayāmāgatapraharā gatayauvanā ca || 4
||

lg.l: alam ativalanena dehayaṣṭeḥ sutanu tanus tava bhaṅgam eti madhyaḥ |
iti kalaraṇitena kambupaṅktiḥ sadṛśam ivābhidadhe vijṛmbhamāṇām || 5 ||
babhur atanudṛśāṃ tathā na pūrvaṃ satilakapattralatāḥ kapolabhāgāḥ |

div.p:
kaṭākṣaiś cakṣuṣo 'rdhabhāgāvalokanaiḥ (?) virūkṣake akṣiṇī yatra tathākṛtvā
dṛṣṭair iti vā yojyam_ || 7 ||

lg.l: udayagiritaṭe tirohitasya sphuṭam iva mātum aśeṣamaṇḍalam ūrdhvam |
viratitatamasaḥ karāḥ śitāṃsor drutam udahāsata hāsitāravindāḥ || 8 ||

div.p:
ūrdhvam aṇḍam uparitanaṃ brahmāṇḍakavāṭaṃ paricchettum iva karā
udahāsatodgatāḥ | ‘ohāṅ_ gatau’ || 8 ||
kauśikasyendrasya dikpūrvā || 9 ||

lg.l: sarabhasam abhajan niśāvaśāne sapadi diśas tad abhīṣavaś ca dīrghāḥ || 10 ||

div.p:
pracura
taro vego yasya, vidhoś candrasya ca tāpaṃ dadāti yaḥ sa raviḥ pūrvādriśṛṅgam abhajat siṣeve |
tatkarāś ca diśo 'bhajann asevanta | te 'pi pracuratarāḥ suprabhūtā vidhutāpadaś ca vināśitavi
padaḥ || 10 ||

māṃsyā oṣadhibhedasya malanaṃ mardanaṃ tadvan malyamānamāṃsīvanmalinaprabhāṇi
māṃsalatvaṃ ca bibhrāṇāni tamāṃsi cakarire kṣiptāni || 11 ||

lg.l: śriyam abhimukham āpa cīnapiṣṭaprakarakarālarajaś chaṭeva saṃdhyā || 13 ||

div.p:
mṛgāṅkalekhaiva ta
dvac ca dhavalaṃ mṛṇālaṃ tatsahitaṃ puṣkaraṃ nabhaḥ karāgraṃ ca yasya | cīnapiṣṭaṃ sindūram_
|| 13 ||

lg.l: uṣasi dadṛśire ca kāminībhiḥ sarasavivartitakaṃdharaṃ yuvānaḥ || 14 ||

div.p:
nayasya viśvasthitikāritayā nābhir madhyavartyaṃśumān prabhābhir navaṃ śabalaṃ ca viya
c cakāra | avaśaṃ khedaniḥsahaṃ kṛtvā valantī nayane yāsāṃ tābhir aṅganābhiś ca taruṇā dṛṣṭāḥ
|| 14 ||

tamaso bhidurā bhedikā tamasā ca hetunā bhidurā svayam eva bhidyamānā | karta
rikarmakartari ca vidibhidicchideḥ kurac_ | vaikaṭikā maṇikārakāḥ | anuviddhā vyāptāḥ
kṛtacchidrāś ca || 15 ||
ambarīṣaṃ bhrāṣṭram_ | bhṛjyamānāḥ pacyamānāḥ || 16 ||

lg.l: iti pavanavighūrṇitaḥ prabhāte pramadavaśād iva nṛtyati sma dīpaḥ || 17 ||
sphuradamalaruciḥ prabhātavelā diśi diśi saṃdadhatī prabodhajṛmbhām |

div.p:
prabodhena nidrāviratyā jṛmbhā vadanavikāsaḥ | prabodhasya ca vikāsasya jṛmbhā samullāsaḥ |
sauryā sūryasaṃbandhinyā bhayā prabhayā saurabheṇa cāmodena hṛdyā | śrīḥ śobhā lakṣmīś ca
|| 18 ||

lg.l: diśi diśi makarandapānalobhād drutam upari bhramaraiḥ paribhramadbhiḥ |
pyadhiṣata kumudāni bhānavīyaṃ karaparimarśam ivābhito niroddhum || 19 ||

div.p:
bhānukiraṇasparśam iva niroddhuṃ bhramaraiḥ kumudāni pyadhiṣata pihitāni | anye
'py (ana)bhipretajanasaṃpāditaṃ hastasparśam apy asahamānāḥ prabhūnavacchādayanti || 19 ||

lg.l: adhiśiṣayiṣamāṇam apy adhatta bhramarakulaṃ nalinīṃ tathaitya dūrāt |
kṣaṇasamayam alapsyatāvakāśaṃ taruṇiruco na yathāśu tāṃ vibhettum || 20 ||

div.p:
a
py adhatta sthagayāmāsa | kṣaṇa eva samayas taṃ tāvan mātraṃ kālam avakāśaṃ nālapsyata na lebhire
|| 20 ||
utkalikā utkaṇṭhāpi || 21 ||

caturabhramarau bharatoktau hastāv api | haṃ
sānāṃ pakṣāḥ patattrāṇi | haṃsapakṣākhyaś ca hastaḥ | nālaṃ daṇḍaḥ | padmāni sarojāni | nā
lapadmaś ca hastaḥ | uktaṃ ca—‘tisraḥ prasāritā yatra tathā cordhvā kanīyasī | tāsāṃ
madhye sthito 'ṅguṣṭhaḥ sa karaś caturaḥ smṛtaḥ || madhyamāṅguṣṭhasaṃdaṃśo vakrā caiva pradeśinī | ū
rdhvamukhyaprakīrṇe ca hy aṅgulyau bhramare kare || samāḥ prasāritās tisras tathā cordhvā kanī
yasī | aṅguṣṭhaḥ kuñcitaś caiva haṃsapakṣa iti smṛtaḥ || asaṃyutā eva hastaniṣpādyā || 22
||

lg.l: kumudanayanam āśu kairaviṇyāḥ prabalarujeva kṛtavyathaṃ nyamīlat || 25 ||

div.p: karaḥ pāṇir api || 25 ||

harir indraḥ | mukhaṃ vadanam api | atamitamā
m atiśayena tāntam_ | tamī rātriḥ || 26 ||
kūṭaḥ kadambakam_ || 27 ||

uḍu
paś candraḥ | uḍupāś ca yānapātrāṇi | divasa eva maṇiḥ || 29 ||

lg.l: kumudam uṣasi saṃkucatsakhedaḥ kamalam aho vikasatprahṛṣṭacetāḥ |

div.p:
ubhayatra rasena viṣama
sthitī rasāyurbhramaraḥ kumudaṃ kamalaṃ ca khedaharṣābhyām alihat_ || 30 ||

lg.l: mukham iva divasaśriyo vireje dhṛtanavakuṅkumalepam arkabimbam || 31 ||
uṣasi kumudakānanāyamānaṃ kamalavanaṃ bibharāṃ cakāra lakṣmīm || 32 ||

div.p:
viśadbhir a
himāṃśoḥ sūryasya viśadasya ca himāṃśoś candramasaḥ kiraṇair bhinnā vikasitā ye dalānāṃ
saṃdhayas tair vimuktā baddhāḥ santo bhramarā yena || 32 ||
pālī paṅktiḥ | cakhañje skhalitam_ || 33 ||

lg.l: na kamalapuṭabhedanaṃ na cakre divasakaraḥ sthitidhāma cāru lakṣmyāḥ || 34 ||

div.p:
dalāny evārarayo dvārapaṭṭakāḥ | maṅkhā bandinaḥ | kamalapuṭānāṃ padmamukulānāṃ bhedanaṃ vi
kāsaḥ | puṭabhedanaṃ ca nagaraṃ prabhāte samudghāṭitakavāṭaṃ paṭhadbandivṛndaṃ ca rājā lakṣmīni
ketanaṃ karoti || 34 ||

śaśiny adhomukhe sphuṭaṃ niścitaṃ prāptasaṃbhramāḥ | kuto 'nyathā praka
mperan_ | avepiṣata cakampire || 35 ||

lg.l: vikasitam avalokya puṇḍarīkaṃ viracitasaṃhati saṃmadena tāvat |

div.p:
tāvat patattrāṇāṃ paṅktir bhramarair dadhuve kampitā yāva
t teṣāṃ patattrāṇām anilavegena kampināṃ kesarāṇāṃ rajasā sthagitanayanāste || 36 ||

lg.l: dadṛśur api sadeśavarti tat te ślathayati kātaratepsitārthsiddhim || 37 ||

div.p: (yugmam_)
tadalomāni ca (?) kesariṇaḥ siṃhāḥ || 38 ||

lg.l: madhukaranikaro jahāvasādhuvyatikarato nahi kiṃcid asti sevyam || 39 ||

div.p:
karaṭasthalaṃ gaṇḍataṭaḥ | kareṇur gajaḥ | asā
dhur aśobhano 'pi || 39 ||

lg.l: jahur atha parivardhakopanītaṃ vikaṭakaḍaṅgaram āśu ghāsam aśvāḥ || 40 ||

div.p:
navānāṃ yavānāṃ yavasānāṃ ca ghāsānām aprāptiduḥkhāt khuradhāraṇīḥ
khurādhāropalān vidārayanto 'śvā vikaṭaṃ busamatyākṣuḥ | parivardhako 'śvabhṛtyaḥ || 40 ||

lg.l: drutataram avatīrya vāsayaṣṭer bhujagabhujaḥ pratimāgataiḥ śikhaṇḍaiḥ |

div.p:
bhuja
gabhujo mayūrāḥ || 41 ||

anunāsikā ṅañaṇanamā varṇāḥ | tad abhirāmaṃ svaraṃ kṛtvā pra
sāritacaraṇaḥ kukkuṭo 'navarataṃ vavāśe || 42 ||

tat kumudam_ | udarasaṃkaṭaṃ kṛtvā ya
ntritā baddhāḥ | praṇodaiḥ preraṇaiḥ || 43 ||

lg.l: kumudam api yathā kṣaṇaṃ vinidraṃ sapadi tad utplavanānukūlam āsīt |
nanu vipadi viṣādadurgatānāṃ kim iva hi dustaram asti saṃhatānām || 44

div.p:
teṣāṃ dvirephāṇām utplavanam udgatiḥ | viṣādena
durgatā daridrās teṣām aviṣādināṃ muditānāṃ saṃbandhi na kiṃcid dustaram_ | tair eva | saṃbandha
mātre ṣaṣṭhī | tena ‘na lokāvyaya—’ iti ṣaṣṭhīniṣedho na bhavati || 44 ||
(yugalakam_)

lg.l: drutamayam avamocayaty apāsya cchadapaṭalodarayantraṇāṃ ravir vaḥ |
iti kalaraṇitair ivāmbujānām upari caranmadhupānuvāca bhṛṅgaḥ || 45 ||

div.p:
sphu
ṭena dalamaṇḍalena satī śrīr yasyāḥ | sphuṭadalaṃ kamalam_ | aṇḍe brahmāṇḍe lasantī śrī
r yasyā iti vā yojanā || 46 ||

lg.l: diśi diśi vihagās tanūḥ samantād analasapakṣatayopacīyamānāḥ |
uṣasi jigamiṣākulās tadānīṃ dayitaviyogadaśā vadhūś ca dehuḥ || 47 ||

div.p:
analasā vegavantaḥ pakṣā yeṣāṃ tadbhāvenopacīyamānā
s tanūr nijaśarīrāṇi pakṣiṇaḥ prātarutpannajigamiṣākulatvād adahanvyathayāmāsuḥ | maraṇena
khedaprāpteḥ (?) vihagā vā śalabhā vivakṣitāḥ | te prātaḥ pradīpeṣu tanmārgeṇa jigamiṣavaḥ
śarīrāṇy adhākṣuḥ | prātaḥ priyatamajigamiṣā tadvyākulāś ca vadhūḥ priyavirahāvasthās tathaivāda
han_ | tā apy analasapakṣatayā vahnisāmyenopacīyamānāḥ || 47 ||

khañjarīṭākhyaḥ pakṣī |
maṇḍalārthaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ kamalam ātapatraṃ vā bimba yasya || 48 ||

lg.l: dinakarakiraṇāhatābhir indau vinipatite śuśuṣe śuceva sadyaḥ || 49 ||

div.p:
viṭaṅka unnato deśaḥ |
tatra saṭaṅkaṃ saśobhaṃ kṛtvā ṭaṅkitābhir utkīrṇābhiḥ candrakāntaputrikābhiḥ śuśuṣe śuṣkam_
|| 49 ||

lg.l: nabhasi vigalitaprabhaṃ himāṃśoḥ payasi ca bimbam abhinnarūpam āsīt || 50 ||
tvaritam adhisarojini vrajantī madhupatatiḥ kumudākarāc cakāśe |
grahamaṇinicayaṃ jighṛkṣur āpa sphuṭa iva potavaṇiṅnabhaḥsamudram || 53 ||

div.p:
ratha eva plavo yānapātram_ | tadadhirūḍho raviḥ sāṃyā
trika iva viyadabdhim āpadyata || 53 ||

lg.l: sthitim upadadhatī manorathaiś ca tridaśavadhūjanatoṣasi vrajantī || 54 ||

div.p:
sphuṭā madanākhyās taravo yasyām_ | nalaṃ ca naḍaṃ
dadāti yā sā vanabhūr ahatā praśastā | naladair vā māṃsībhir āhatā | payogāṃ jalagatāṃ sthitiṃ
bibhratī | pakṣibhiḥ śritā | manorathair iva prabhāte gacchantī suravadhūsaṃhatiḥ | sāpi mada
nānalasya dāhena tāpaḥ pīḍā tena yogaḥ sphuṭo yasyāṃ tādṛśīṃ sthitiṃ dhārayantī || 54 ||

lg.l: upagatam aparatra vāsateyīṃ drutam apavāhya punaḥ prabhātakāle |
krudha iva ravim akṣamekṣituṃ dyaur avanatam indumukhaṃ ciraṃ babhāra || 55 ||

div.p:
vāsateyī rātriḥ | tām anyatra nītvā prātarāgataṃ raviṃ krodhād iva draṣṭum akṣamā dyaur indumukhaṃ
namraṃ babhāra || 55 ||

lg.l: sphuṭahariṇanibhena rātrim aṅke dadhad iva saṃbhramato 'staśailam abhyait || 56 ||

div.p: kuṭhāraḥ paraśuḥ || 57 ||

lg.l: dayitatamam amuṃ vidhūya tejo dinakara mā paribhūr niśākaraṃ me |
iti viracitakuṅmalāñjaliśrīs tam atiśuceva kumudvatī yayāce || 58 ||

div.p:
vandanamālā puṣpapattramayī
srak_ | sā priyasyāgacchato maṅgalāya dvāroparikriyate || 59 ||

lg.l: janitasukham iva kṣapāvasāne kumudavanaṃ pratipannanidram āsīt || 60 ||

div.p:
viśade madhurase 'raṇaṃ
gatir yasyās tādṛśī anubandhena paunaḥpunyena kvaṇantī bhramarapaṅktir eva vallakī vīṇā | sāpi
viśadā madhurā ca yā sāraṇā mūrchanā tadanusāreṇa kvaṇati || 60 ||

lg.l: haritamaṇisamudrakasya kṛṣṇā śriyam abhṛta prakaṭeva sāṃdhirājiḥ || 61 ||

div.p:
saṃdhirājir dvayoḥ
kavāṭayoḥ saṃśleṣarekhā || 61 ||

lg.l: adhiniśam avaner apūrayad yān kapiśitadigvalayaṃ tamo 'vakāśān |
na tapanarucibhiḥ pupūrire te bata malinasya hi bhūyasī vibhūtiḥ || 62 ||
kṣapitarajanirāgato 'paratra prakaṭitarāga na lajjase karair mām |
spṛśasi yad adhunā jahīhi kasya tvam iti dinātyayakhaṇḍanāṃ smarantī 63

div.p:
aparatra deśāntare sapatnī gṛhe ca | rāgo 'nurā
go 'pi | karāḥ pāṇayo 'pi | ity anena prakāreṇa kasya tvaṃ na kasyacid ātmīyaḥ | dinā
tyaye khaṇḍanā tyaktvānyatra gamanaṃ tatsmaraṇāt serṣyeva padminī bhramararavair ādityam ittham avādīt_
|| 63 ||

lg.l: bhramaravirutibhir jagāda serṣyā tapanam itīva sarojinī saroṣam || 64 ||

div.p:
calanto 'lino bhramarā yatra | pallavā eva hastās taiś cāru paṅkajaṃ kṛtvā | kvacit_
'caladala-' iti pāṭhaḥ | tadā calā dalānāṃ pallavāḥ khaṇḍā iti vyākhyā | nāyikā ca
serṣyā kamalaṃ vikāsayantī preyāṃsam ācaṣṭe || 64 ||
(yugalakam_)

lg.l: śarad iva divasāvatāralīlā sakalam akāśatayā śriyānvitāsau |
kṣatatimiramalā nināya dūraṃ sarita ivāśu diśaḥ prasādalakṣmīm || 65 ||

div.p:
yā śriyānvitā satī sakalam akāśata
sarvam adidīpat_ | antarbhāvitaṇyartho 'tra kāśiḥ | sā divasasyāvataraṇalīlā kṣataṃ timira
m eva malo yayā tādṛśī diśo vimalīcakāra | yathā śaratsaritaḥ | sāpi saha kalamaiḥ śā
liviśeṣaiḥ kāśaiś ca tṛṇaviśeṣair vartate yā tadbhāvena hetunā śriyā yuktā | kṣatās toyasyālpī
yastvāt timayo matsyā yayā sā kṣatatimiḥ | amalā ca jaladavigamān nirmalā ca bhavati
|| 65 ||

lg.l: prakṛtiśucitayā parāvamarśaṃ sapadi visoḍhum ivākṣamābhir ārāt |
spṛśati dinakare karaiḥ sarāgaṃ diśi diśi saṃkucitaṃ kumudvatībhiḥ 66

div.p: karaiḥ sarāgam iti sākūtam_ | arthābhidhānāt_ || 66 ||

vigalitaṃ candramarī
caya eva kañcukaṃ nirmoko yasyāḥ | daṇḍena ca danteṣu cālpamānā bhujaṃgī bhayān nirmoka
m ujjhati || 67 ||

lg.l: nipatati śaśimaṇḍalaṃ hahā kiṃ nabhasi na dṛśyata eva tārakaughaḥ |

div.p: paryadevata śuśoca || 69 ||

s timibhis tatāmarasāṃ ca | stimitāni tāmarasāni yasyāṃ tādṛśīṃ ca jalasthitim a
dhāt_ | pulinamañcati prasarpati pulināñcī tadbhāvena śriyā śobhayā śritena vīcinicayena
hariṇā pulineṣv añcitayā śriyā sevitena sphuritam_ || 80 || kulakam_ ||
(ekādaśabhiḥ kulakam_)

varṣeṣu bhāratā
diṣu bhūmibhāgeṣu girayo himavadādyāḥ | vīcimatī nadī | ilāvṛtaṃ nāma varṣam_ | ilayā
ca bhūmyā vṛtaṃ dhāraṇāya prārthitam_ | avipannā meroś chāyā.........ātapābhāvo yatra
|| 81 ||

dhatte ityādi navabhiḥ kulakam_ || ya iti sāmarthyān meroḥ parāmarśaḥ | karparaṃ
mahāsthi | rukmaṃ suvarṇam_ || 82 ||

kuruvindaṃ padmarāgabhedaḥ | vilagnaḥ pravṛttaḥ | kesarā
ūrdhvamukhāni skandhalomāni | adhomukhāni tu saṭāḥ || 83 ||

yena maṇḍitam ilāvṛtaṃ
brahmaṇā ca paṅkajaṃ cakāstīty antargatopamaṃ dīpakam_ | palāśāḥ kiṃśukataravaḥ pallavāś ca | ka
rṇikāyā aṅko lakṣaṇaṃ tad atyaktaṃ yena | ilāvṛtasya karṇikāvṛttyā kṣiter madhye 'vasthānāt_ |
karṇikaiva cāṅkaḥ || 84 ||

puṣkaram antarikṣaṃ karikarāgraṃ ca | arvāk_ paścime bhāge |
chāyaiva kareṇur hastinī || 85 ||
vitardikā vedikā || 87 ||

vajrā hīrakamaṇayaḥ |
mañjurā hṛdyāḥ | khañjanā gativikalāḥ | khañjarīṭākhyāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ | śiñjā kvaṇitam_ || 88 ||

śāta
kumbhaṃ suvarṇam_ | kumbhī ghaṭikā | śevadhir nidhiḥ || 89 ||

anuvelaṃ muhurmuhuḥ | kalilā
vyāptā || 90 ||
(navabhiḥ kulakam_)
gacchann ityādiviśeṣakam_ || 91 ||

tārakamṛgo mṛgaśirāḥ | tena vici
treṇa nabhasi saṃśayitaṃ candraśakalaṃ yena so 'rdhacandras toraṇālaṃkāra āśliṣṭo yena tam_
|| 92 ||
nākamaṇer arkasya (?) puradvāratoraṇaṃ prāpat_ || 93 ||
(tilakam_)

tasya gaṇasya nabhonibha
dehacchāyayā pītā......taṭeṣu diktaṭeṣu kṣiptanayanā yoṣitaḥ pradoṣaśaṅkayā maṇḍanāvidhiṃ
prati tvarām agaman_ || 94 ||

iti śrībālabṛhaspatyanujīvino vāgīśvarāṅkasya vidyādhipatyaparanāmno mahākave
rājānakaśrīratnākarasya kṛtau ratnāṅke haravijaye mahākāvye
mārgavibhāgarvarṇano nāma triṃśaḥ sargaḥ |

iti rājānakajayānakasūnor alakasya kṛtau haravijayavi
ṣamapadoddyote triṃśaḥ sargaḥ ||
ekatriṃśaḥ sargaḥ |

ścyotad ityādipañcabhiḥ kulakam_ | śīkarair vamathunā śāritam abhraṃ nabho yatra tathā
kṛtvā magno bruḍitaḥ || 2 ||
uttāralagnā raves tāraṇāya pravṛttāḥ || 3 ||

aiḍaviḍo vaiśra
vaṇas tasya yaḥ sakalaśo 'ṅganājanas tasya gāḍhaṃ gāhanaṃ tena śobhā yeṣām_ | ata eva hāṭa
keśanāmnaḥ śivasya tannāmni vā granthe mantrāṇām abhiyogena samārādhanaparatayā kṛtaprabhāvā
ye narendrā guravas tatsadṛśān_ | te tu sakaleṣu śaileṣu yāni bilāni pātālavivarāṇi tatra
kāntājanasya mano ramayanto gāḍhā śobhā yeṣāṃ tādṛśā bhavanti | tadārādhanaṃ hi bila
sādhanavaddivyarūpopagamasya hetuḥ || 4 ||

aluptaṃ matsyānām avanaṃ timīnāṃ gatiḥ prītir vā
yatra tat_ | atanurasam analpāsvādam_ | sthavirā vṛddhā āṭā ātayaḥ pakṣiṇo yatra | tato
viśeṣaṇasamāsaḥ | matsyāś ca janapadaviśeṣāḥ | teṣām aluptānāṃ parair aluṇṭhitānām avane rakṣaṇe
'tanuḥ prabhūto rasaḥ prasaktis tatrasthastam atyajanvirāṭākhyaḥ kṣitipatir yasyām_ | prekholanaṃ
calanaṃ tena kāraṇenāṇḍavataḥ pakṣiṇo haratā taraṅgagaṇena kalpāntavatkṣālitāmbarām_ | ta
dāhi sāra(hara)sya tāṇḍavād adhikaṃ preṅkholanena vidhu......tathāvidhaiva | adhikaṃ prabhūtaṃ śi
rasi ca || 5 ||
6 || kulakam_ ||
(pañcabhiḥ kulakam_)

ratnabisahaṃsayoś cūḍāmaṇīndukapālābhyāṃ sādṛśyādīśvara
śiraḥsmaraṇam_ | uktaṃ hi—‘sadṛśādṛṣṭacintādyāḥ smṛtibījasya bodhakāḥ’ | śiro 'pi
kanakakāntivat piṅgam_ || 7 ||
avataṃsaḥ śirobhūṣaṇam_ || 8 ||

anavamam utkṛṣṭaṃ dānaṃ muñca
tīti kvip_ | tataḥ saptamī | navamadenāsamantāt_ | a iti vā viṣṇus tena namucinā ca
prakṛṣṭā śobhā yasmin_ || 9 ||
bhagnā truṭitā || 10 ||

ālīḍham āsvāditam_ | ālā
ḍhā vā payodhimadhye śliṣṭā || 11 ||
sodaryatā bhrātṛbhāvaḥ || 13 ||

āhito
nyastaḥ | dānena śabalodaratvāt kundavatpāṇḍuratvāc ca sakalaṅkaśaśikhaṇḍadvayena sadṛśau śravaṇau
dhārayantam_ || 14 ||
manthaghoṣo mathanaśabdaḥ || 15 ||

rīḍhā helā | prakāṇḍaṃ nālam_ || 16
||
tripadī pādam ekam utkṣipya pādatrayeṇāvasthānam_ || 18 ||

ripuṇā vṛtreṇa | pra
kīrṇakaṃ cāmaram_ | pakṣmāṇi lomāni | lakṣaṃ vyājaḥ || 19 ||

aśaṅkitaḥ śātaṃ kṛtvā
kumbhayoḥ pāto yasya | maruttarājye 'py ākaniṣṭa(kasmi)kaḥ śātakumbhapāto hemavarṣaṃ sa
ptadivasān abhūt_ | āsanaṃ śirodeśo rāṣṭraṃ ca | śucinā śuddhena radena dantena, śuciś ca nāra
dākhyo devarṣir yasmin_ || 20 ||

avagraho lalāṭadeśaḥ navāś ca grahāḥ śaśāṅkādayaḥ | vālaṃ
puccham_ | saṃdhinā saṃśleṣeṇāhitā kṛtā ā samantāt tanoḥ śarīrasya rucir yasya | bālayā
ca pratyagrayā saṃdhyayā kṛtā atanur analpā kāntir yasya | puṣkaraṃ karāgraṃ nabhaḥ paṅkajaṃ ca
|| 21 ||

śṛṅgāriṇī gairikādimaṇḍanasahitā yasya tanur mūrtirakṣatayā śriyā śritā śobhate |
kaṭau gaṇḍau | kakṣyaṃ madhyabandhanam_ | atha ca tanur lalanā | sāpi pṛthavaḥ kaṭākṣā yasya
tadbhāvena śobhayā yuktā śṛṅgārākhyarasasahitā bhrājate | kakṣyā mekhalāpi | saha dānasya
kavalair vartamānā sthitir yeṣāṃ taiḥ santaś cānakāḥ paṭahabhedā yasyāṃ tādṛśī balānāṃ sainyānāṃ
sthitir yatra || 22 ||

sajjaṃ prastutaṃ navaṃ śīkaraṇaṃ śīkarakaraṇaṃ yasya | saccaritaṃ sajja
nānāṃ vaśīkaraṇam āharaṇahetuḥ | acchinnena dānena varatām uttaṃsatvaṃ bibharti | asurī
m iva | sāpy acchinnaṃ dānavasaṃbandhi rataṃ yasyās tādṛśī bhavati || 23 ||

kuñjarair ajita
m unnatatvād anabhibhūtaṃ vapur yasya | kaṭau gaṇḍau | kaṃ śiraḥ | tadanusāri pīvaratvāt tatsadṛśaṃ
rūpam ākṛtir yasya | kaṭakaś ca madhyabhāgaḥ | tadanusāriṇas tatra caranto rūpā mṛgavi
śeṣā yasya | samahimā māhātmyayuktaḥ | hitayā sukhajanikayā rucā kṛtaśrīḥ | a
samena ca himenāhitayā kṛtayā rucā kṛtaśobhaḥ | satī śāriḥ paryāṇaṃ yasya vaṃśena pṛ
ṣṭhanāḍyā racitā sthitir yatra | satyaś ca śārivākhyā oṣadhayo yasmin_ | śaraiś ca kāṇḍai
ś citā sthitir yasya || 24 ||

gauravaṃ ca puṣṇāti parakṛta ātmani vardhayati | dikṣu
(śikṣā) pīluśāstre yuddhaśāstre ca pratipāditā yuktiḥ | karo hastaḥ karau ca pāṇī |
aghāniṣata hatāḥ | vipakṣanāgāḥ pratipakṣabhūtāḥ kuñjarāḥ | mahāntaś ca vipakṣā vipakṣanā
gāḥ | ‘vṛndārakanāgakuñjaraiḥ pūjyamānam_’ iti samāsaḥ || 25 ||

lg.l: lakṣmīm agastyamunineva ca yaḥ sma dhatte || 26 ||

div.p:
unnatiharaṇam ucchrāyā
tir ekāt_ | agastyo 'pi merujigīṣayā vardhamānasya sūryādimārgaṃ ca nirundhato vindhyagire
ś chalenaunnatyam aharat_ | dānasindhur madanadī | dānaṃ ca śuddhiḥ | ‘daip_ śodhane’ | tadarthaṃ pa
ripītāḥ sindhoḥ samudrasyormayo yena | kumbhau kavāṭau kumbhaś ca kalaśaḥ || 26 ||

anu
ttenāparityaktena madenorjitā śrīr yasya | yaś ca śauryātirekabhṛtpuruṣaḥ so 'nuttamena sarvāti
śāyinā doṣṇā bhujena jitaśrīr bhavati | karaṭau gaṇḍau karaṭāś ca kākāḥ | sthitir ācā
ro 'pi | kokilā hi kākaiḥ samānākṛtayo dhūrtatayā tadācāram āśritya tatkulāyeṣu tair eva
poṣyamāṇāḥ suciram avatiṣṭhante || 27 ||

savikāsamardā vistīrṇakalahā nānāvidhā ye
balasya daityasyānugatā anuyāyino nāgāḥ kariṇas tadvidāriṇo dantā daśanā yasya |
vīnāṃ ca pakṣiṇāṃ kāso gatis tatkṛtena mardaina kṣodena sahavartamānā balā oṣadhiviśeṣā
s tābhir anusṛtā nāgavidāriṇaḥ puṃnāgakovidāratarumanto dantāḥ śikharabhāgā yasya | ga
ṇḍāv eva śailau | gaṇḍaśailāś ca mahānto muktapāṣāṇāḥ | abhrakarīty abhikhyā abhramātaṅga
iti nāma | abhrakaṃ dhātubhedaḥ | rītir ārakūṭam_ | tābhyāṃ cābhikhyā śobhā || 28 ||

bhadrā viśiṣṭajātayo gajāḥ | uktaṃ ca—‘bhadro mando mṛgaś cātha saṃkīrṇaś ceti jātayaḥ |
catasraḥ kariṇāṃ tāsāṃ bhadro 'ntarmada eva yaḥ ||’ tān kālayituṃ samare nirasituṃ śīlaṃ yasya
tathāvidho yo vilāsam eti śobhāṃ dhatte | bhadrakālī ca bha(ru)drāṇī| tasyā api vi
lāsam eti | tatsadṛśo bhavatītyarthaḥ | tatrairāvaṇaḥ premāspadam abhramur nāma kariṇī yasya | ajā
nityā sthitir yasya | avyapāyā sthirā śrīs tatparigraharasikaiḥ pracalākibhir abhikhyā yasya |
pracalam akanti kuṭilaṃ gacchantīti pracalākinaḥ puraḥ pracāriṇo yodhāḥ | hato vādito
dundubhiḥ paṭaho yasya | adharasthitaḥ paribhūtatvād adhogataḥ saiṃhikeyo rāhur yasya tathoktaḥ |
bhadrakāly api abhrāṇyeva madhuradhvananān murajās tatsthito yo ravyapāyas tena.........sya
sa pracalākī cihnabhūtaḥ kumārasaṃbandhī vā mayūras tasya śobhā premāspadaṃ yasyāḥ | abhyā
gameṣu raṇeṣu saṃmukhāgamaneṣu hato dundubhir nāma daityo yayā | adharasthitaś ca vāhanībhūtaḥ saiṃ
hikeyaḥ siṃho yasyāḥ sā tathoktā || 29 ||

nāgā bhujagā gajāś ca | śeṣo bhujagarājo
'vaśiṣṭaś ca | kṣamā bhūmiḥ śāntiś ca | kumudo diggajaḥ kumudaṃ ca kairavam_ | supratīko di
kkuñjaraḥ kaścic chobhanāvayavaś ca | ‘airāvataḥ puṇḍarīkaḥ kumudāñjanavāmanāḥ | puṣpadantaḥ sā
rvabhaumaḥ supratīkaś ca diggajāḥ’ || 30 ||

yudhi nāsti ripuṣu cchalaṃ yasya tadbhāvena śobha
māno yaḥ śarīrarucā bhuvanāni vyāpa sthagitavān_ | vyāpāri lasat tatpuccham eva latā tayā
ca rocamāna iti kecit_ | asmiṃs tu pakṣe kriyāpadam aucityāc ca tad eva kalpanīyam_ | tri
viṣṭapādīty anena vā dehadvi(tvi?)ṣonye tad eva viśeṣaṇīyam_ (?) | triviṣṭapasado devāḥ |
vispaṣṭaṃ diṇḍim asya paṭahasya rutaṃ yasyām_ | diṇḍiś ca kvacit prasiddho mahādevaḥ | yad ukta
m_—‘devadāruvane diṇḍiḥ’ iti | tato vispaṣṭo diṇḍir marutaś ca daityau yatra prakaṭau tā
dṛśīṃ śriyaṃ yo 'bhyeti sa kathaṃ devānāṃ priya iti ca virodho dhvanyate || 31 ||

paryāptaṃ
samantād adhigataṃ dānaṃ yena tādṛgvapur yasya | paryāptaṃ ca prabhūtaṃ kṛtvā dānavān puṣṇāti | da
nurdānavānāṃ jananī | āpyata prāptā | avipannavinaśvaro nayaḥ pīluśāstraprasiddhā nītis taṃ
juṣate śrayati | avipannaṃ ca nityatvād anaṣṭaṃ yajur nāma vedo yasmin_ | caritaṃ saṃcāraḥ || 32 ||

anekaṃ dhāma tejo yasya | kareṇa kumbhābhyāṃ ca karālā śobhā yasya tādṛgvapur yo bi
bharti | rāśicakram iva | tad apy anekadhā bahuprakāram_ | makareṇa kumbhena ca rāśinā dīptaśo
bham_ | hastināṃ samūho hāstikam_ | ‘acittahastidhenoṣṭhak_ |’ tasya sakalasya bhaṅge ba
ddhakakṣyaḥ | atīva nāstiko lokāyatādir iva | so 'pi sakalahānām āstikānāṃ naiyāyi
kādīnāṃ bhaṅge baddhakakṣyaḥ | kakṣyā madhyabandhanaṃ samuddyogaś ca | asti paralokādir iti ma
tir yasya sa āstikaḥ| nāsti sa iti matir yasya sa nāstikaḥ | ‘asti nāsti diṣṭaṃ
matiḥ’ iti ṭhak_ | sādhanaṃ sainyam_, (puṃvyañjanam api) pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntādivacanaṃ ca || 33 ||
ṣaḍviṃśatyā kulakam_ ||
(ṣaḍviṃśatyā kulakam_)
salileśvaro varuṇaḥ || 34 ||

bahulāsutaḥ kārtikeyaḥ | kāsaro ma
hiṣaḥ | samavartī yamaḥ || 35 ||

saikataṃ nirjalaṃ taṭam_ | sajalaṃ tu tad eva rodhaḥ
|| 37 ||

taṭataror daśanavraṇasya sicayena paṭṭikābandham iva kurvatīṃ kalpavallīm adarśa
yat_ || 39 ||
tārāmṛgo mṛgaśīrṣaḥ || 43 ||

chāyā śobhāpi || 44
||
(tilakam_)
vismero vismayanaśīlaḥ || 47 ||

mandīro manthānasya cakrakam_ || 48
||

lg.l: dvārair bibharti pihitair api yatra lakṣmī-

div.p: ararir dvārapaṭṭakaḥ || 50 ||

lg.l: dhatte śobhāṃ dehalīnāṃ gṛhaughaḥ kṣmābhṛtkanyām unnatātmeva śaṃbhuḥ || 57 ||

div.p:
nī
lakaṇṭho mayūraḥ nīlaś ca kaṇṭho grīvā | bhogina īśvarāḥ sarpāś ca | dehalīnāṃ dvārārambha
bhavām_, dehe ca līnāṃ lagnām_ || 57 ||
praṇālaṃ jalaniḥsṛtimārgaḥ || 59 ||

lg.l: rāmābhirāmaś ca vidūrajāśmaprāsādarāśir niśi yatra dhāmnā |

div.p:
rā
mābhiraṅganābhiḥ, rāmaś cābhirāmo manojñaḥ | praśasto mṛgo mṛgarūpaḥ | 'praśaṃsāyāṃ rūpap_' |
sa cihnaṃ yasya sa śaśāṅka ucyate | tasya tejasvināṃ ca jyotiṣāṃ marīcisaṃbandhi balaṃ sāmarthya hataṃ yena | rāmo mṛgākṛticihnasya tejasvinaś ca mārīcākhyasya rakṣaso balaṃ ja
ghāna || 60 ||
ketanāni gṛhāṇi || 61 ||

vrātaḥ samūhaḥ | bhoginaḥ sarpāḥ | teṣāṃ ke
kāśravaṇacakitānāṃ palāyanaparatvena rathabandhaślathīkaraṇam_ || 62 ||
(ṣoḍaśabhiḥ kulakam_)

iti śrībālabṛhaspatyanujīvino vāgīśvarāṅkasya vidyādhipatyaparanāmno mahākave
rājānakaśrīratnākarasya kṛtau ratnāṅke haravijaye mahākāvye
svargābhogavarṇanaṃ nāmaikatriṃśaḥ sargaḥ |

iti rājānakajayā
nakasūnor alakasya kṛtau haravijayaviṣamapadoddyota ekatriṃśaḥ sargaḥ ||
dvātriṃśaḥ sargaḥ |
nīlamaṇayo marakatāni || 1 ||
aṭṭālās tricaturapurāṇi harmyāṇi || 2 ||

lg.l: nṛtte citre ca dadhatīm ākṣiptahṛdayāḥ striyaḥ || 3 ||

div.p:
sthānaka
m ālīḍhādi vapuṣaḥ saṃniveśaviśeṣaḥ | citre 'pi pṛṣṭhāgatādyaṅgānāṃ vartanā tadveṣṭitā yā va
lanā (?) āsūtraṇāni ca | ākṣiptaṃ hṛtam_ || 3 ||

aśeṣā bhogāḥ samagrāṇi sukhāni
śeṣasya cānantasya bhogaḥ śarīram_ | samudraṃ pratīhāraniyantritaṃ gṛham eva gṛhakam_ | anye
‘samudragṛhakam iti dīrghikālaṃkṛtaveśmanaḥ saṃjñā’ ity āhuḥ | samudra eva gṛhaṃ tasya kaṃ
salilam_ || 4 ||

mūrcchanāḥ sāraṇāḥ | paurāś ca vīrāś ceti dvandvaḥ | taiḥ sakalair gītayuddhādi
kuśalaiḥ samagrair vopanatair itastataḥ prāptair udārais tyāgibhiś citāṃ vyāptām_ | kalopanatā pauravī
ca mūrcchanābhedau | tābhyāṃ ca racitām_ || 5 || 6 ||

aśasā (?) bāhulyena talpānāṃ ma
hāveśmanāṃ lopo vināśas tadabhāvo 'talpalopam_ | arthābhāve 'vyayībhāvaḥ | tenāttā śrī
r yayā | talpalā ca vaṃśasya pārśvabhāgaḥ | tenopāttā gṛhītā | vaṃśo nāḍiś ca | vistṛtā
dīrghikāḥ puṣkariṇyo yasyām_ | vistṛtā cāsau dīrghā cāsāv iti ca samāsaḥ | dīrghaiva
dīrghikā || 7 ||

upakaṇṭhaṃ samīpaṃ kaṇṭhasya ca samīpam_ | tālās taruviśeṣāḥ akṣā vibhī
takās tai racitā | cañcupuṭāditālagataiś cākṣaraiś citā vyāptā || 8 ||

lg.l: giraṃ ca sāmṛtodgārāṃ dadhatīr dadhuṣīṃ striyaḥ || 9 ||

div.p:
sakṣmatilakam amṛto
dgāraṃ ca gāruḍaṃ śāstram api || 9 ||

mahāmātrair analpadhanair antaryuktaṃ yogo yeṣām_ | prabhāta
iva ............ samādhānasamayaḥ | patadgrahāḥ sauvarṇāni niṣṭhīvanapātrāṇi patantaś ca gra
hāś candrādayaḥ | niśāntā gṛhāṇi rātryavasānāni ca | arkaḥ sphaṭikaḥ sūryaś ca || 10 ||

nigrahasthānaṃ yatra caurādayo hanyante, asādhanāṅgavacanam adoṣodbhāvanaṃ ca vādiprativādinoḥ
parājayahetuś ca | sadbhir ācāryaiḥ sadā ca cārībhir āhitaḥ kṛtaḥ | ‘ekapādapracāro yaḥ sa
cārīty abhidhīyate | pādābhyāṃ kramaṇaṃ yat tu karaṇaṃ nāma tad bhavet_’ || 11 ||

drutaṃ pratanu madhya

kamaṇḍalur yatra || 6 ||

śubhair bījaiḥ sadbhir akṣair manorameṇa | puñjīkṛtāni śubhasya tasya yāni
bījāni saṃcitya nirmitenetyarthaḥ | tadudgatair aṃśubhis tāram udbhaṭam_ | udaṃśavaś codgatakiraṇās tārā
jyotīṃṣi yatra || 7 ||

hārītaḥ pakṣibhedas taddehabaddharito 'śmā marakataṃ tanmarīcicakram a
ṅgulīyakaśikharasthaṃ yasya saḥ | ata eva tam aśmānaṃ marīcicakrākrāntatayā nalinīvana
m ivāparasaroruhotpattikāraṇatvād udvahan_ | nakārasyātra ‘naś chavi—’ iti rutvam_ || 8 ||
sa iti yaḥ paramadaivatam_ | piṣṭātakaṃ kuṅkumacchuritaṃ piṣṭam_ || 9 ||
(pañcabhiḥ kulakam_)

śiñjinī jyā |
ullolas taraṅgaḥ || 10 ||
koṣaḥ parivāro mukulatvaṃ ca | samīkarabhaso raṇarasaḥ || 11 ||
apāvṛtam udghāṭitam_ | yogyā abhyāsaḥ || 13 ||

asreṇa ru
dhireṇa bisrā durgandhayaḥ | śakramūrdhā(?)dijo 'nyo 'pi dhūmaḥ saṃbhavatīti vahnināsau
viśeṣitaḥ | amukto nīlajaladasya garbho 'bhyantaraṃ yena | vajrasya vidyudrūpeṇa jaladamadhye 'va
sthānāt_ || 16 ||
puṇḍarīkādayo dikkariṇaḥ | puṇḍarīkaṃ padmam api || 17 ||

gaṇḍāv eva
śailau | gaṇḍaśailāś ca mahopalāḥ || 18 ||
daṇḍa āyudhabhedaḥ sainyaṃ ca || 19 ||

śmaśrūṇi
mukharomāṇi tāny eva prarohā aṅkurāḥ | ūrdhvā unmukhāḥ || 20 ||

karavīranāmnāṃ puṣpā
ṇāṃ śeṣā mālā tām iva nayanaprabhāṃ bibhrad asya yamasya purato mahiṣam āruhya mṛtyur etat sa
hāyo 'ntako vegād āgacchati || 21 ||
(yugalakam_)

caṭulībhir ānanodgatābhir ulkābhiḥ kapiśābhiś ca
cūḍābhir eva vidyudbhiḥ sasaṃdhyam iva gaganaṃ darśayanta iti yojyam_ | yātudhānā nair ṛtāḥ || 22 ||
pāśī varuṇaḥ | antakasya mṛtyoḥ spaśam iva carasadṛśam_ || 23 ||

śaṅkhapadmau nidhī ja
lajau ca || 24 ||

siṃhetyādi viśeṣakam_ | paridhā prāvaraṇaṃ tatra rabhasavyudāso jave
notkṣepas tena saṃdaṣṭā garbhīkṛtāḥ || 25 ||
jyotsnaivātapo ghanatvāt_ || 26 ||
va iti rudrā viśeṣyante || 27 ||
(tilakam_)
bandhuritāḥ kharvitāḥ || 28 ||

śivasya śreyasaḥ śevadhi
nidhānam_ | tasya tava skandhāvāraṃ viśveprabhṛtayaḥ saṃghadevā viśanti || 30 ||

nākam eva
nagaraṃ tatra pratibaddhā niyamena sthitā sindhur mandākinī | sā ca purā candramaṇḍalān ni
rgatety āgame śrūyate | yad uktam_—‘svarge caiva purā saiva saṃsthitā somamaṇḍale | somāc caiva
viniḥsṛtya purākāśe vyavasthitā ||’ caśabdo bhinnakramaḥ | induś cety evam anvayāt_ || 31 ||
añjanaṃ kalaṅko 'pi || 32 ||
(yugalakam_)

yoktrīkṛtair ityādiviśeṣakam_ | yoktraṃ bandhanarajuḥ | skandhā
nabhasi vātānāṃ sthānabhedāḥ || 33 ||

yogena samādhināśritam aparaṃ karacaraṇā
diyuktaṃ vapur yena | yogaḥ kanyāsavitroḥ samāgamaḥ | tatrāśritam aparaṃ prāvṛṣeṇyād rūpād vila
kṣaṇaṃ vapur yena | pratāpa ātapo 'pi | saptasaṃkhyāni pattrāṇi vāhanāni | saptapattrāś ca sapta
parṇās taravaḥ | avajitavāsavāḥ paribhūtapuraṃdarā daityāḥ | ta evāsthirarūpatayā vāsarāḥ |
teṣāṃ śrīs tanūkṛtā yena | avajitaś ca vāsavas tatprayuktavṛṣṭinirodhād yais teṣāṃ vāsarāṇāṃ śrī
r alpīkṛtā yena | tadā dinānāṃ tānavotpatteḥ || 35 ||
(tilakam_)
gūḍhacaraṇāḥ sarpāḥ || 36 ||

kṣoṇībhṛtaḥ parvatā rājānaś ca | śibiraṃ senāniveśaḥ | kaṭako 'drinitambaḥ sainyaṃ ca |
bandīkṛtā haṭhena nibaddhāḥ kṣapitapakṣater vajrasya śiśavo yeṣu || 37 ||

samarabherītvaṃ vo
vidhitsuḥ kalpāntaghanānāṃ ghaṭā paṅktir āgacchati | koṇo vādanabhāṇḍam_(daṇḍaḥ) || 38 ||

diśa eva padminyas tā vikacāruṇakamalavanā darśayanti santy uragāṇāṃ balāny āyānti
|| 39 ||

karkaśaṃ kaṭhoraṃ balaṃ sauṣṭhavaṃ yasya | karkaiś ca sitair aśvaiḥ śabalaṃ vicitram_ | a
śvīyam aśvasamūhaḥ | ‘keśāśvābhyāṃ yañchāvanyatarasyām_’ iti cchaḥ | rasacchabdāyamānam_ |
khalīnam antarikṣe lagnam_ | rasac ca khalīnaṃ kavikā yasya || 40 ||

vyālāḥ sarpā matta
kariṇaś ca | unnatā kāyamānasya dehaparimāṇasya śobhā yasyāḥ | unnatena ca kāyamānena
gṛhaviśeṣeṇa śobhā yasyāḥ | ‘pakveṣṭakābhir vihitaṃ sadyaḥ kārujanena yat_ | rājocitaṃ mahā
veśma kāyamānaṃ tad ucyate ||’ nitāntam atyarthamalagardānāṃ phaṇabhṛtāṃ bharo yasyāḥ | a
sabhīkā saha bhayena yā na vartate | nitāntamalāś ca yatra tatra luṭhanāt kāṅkṣitamālinyā
gardabhāḥ kharā rāsabhyaś ca kharyo yasyām_ | ‘tamu kāṅkṣāyām_’ | karālā bahalā karabhā pāṇi
śobhā yasyāḥ | karālāś ca bhīṣaṇāḥ karabhā uṣṭrā yasyām_ || 41 ||

lg.l: r eṣā śivātra śibire kṛtasaṃnidhir vaḥ || 42 ||

div.p:
kṣaṇadā rātriḥ saiva
nakṣatramaṇḍalam akṣasūtravalayaṃ parivartayantī brāhmī bhrājate | brāhmyādayo mātaraḥ || 42 ||
(yugalakam_)

tryambakasyeyaṃ traiyambakī māheśvarī | ‘na yvābhyāṃ padāntābhyāṃ—’ iti
vṛddhipratiṣedha aijāgamaś ca | bhṛkuṭyā vyudastā viśeṣeṇopari nītā yā bhasmarajaḥsaṃba
ndhinī lalāṭikā lalāṭālaṃkāras tasyā iva śobhā yasyāḥ || 45 ||

sudhāmayā
marīcayo yasyās tādṛśī candrasya pratikṛtiś cāndrī devatā tava śibiraṃ tvaritam āyāti
|| 47 ||
śāvaḥ śavasaṃbandhī || 48 ||

ākasmiketyādi viśeṣakam_ | pālī paṅktiḥ
|| 49 ||

khaṭvāṅgaṃ mahāvratinām aṃse dhvajaḥ | pattraṃ vāhanaṃ tasya viṣāṇagarbheṇa pītā rudhirā
savasaṃpadyayā | āsavapānaṃ ca parimṛṣṭe nikuñja eva ślāghyam_ || 50 ||

kālarātriḥ kṛ
tāntamahiṣī || 51 ||
(tilakam_)

nirdagdhakāleti bhagavantaṃ saṃbodhayati | kalaṅkasya pāpasya ketu
r vināśikā || 52 ||

lg.l: kṣodacchāye 'tha sāyaṃ malinayati tamaḥ paṅkapūre dharitrīm |
r anyonyālāpam ārād vidadhur iva niśi vyākulā digvayasyāḥ || 54 ||

div.p:
iti śrībālabṛhaspatyanujīvino vāgīśvarāṅkasya vidyādhipatyaparanāmno mahākave
rājānakaśrīratnākarasya kṛtau ratnāṅke haravijaye mahākāvye
sainyasaṃbhāro nāmaikonacatvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ |

iti rājānakajayānakasūnor alakasya kṛtau hara
vijayaviṣamapadoddyota ekonacatvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ ||
catvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ |

māgadhāḥ sūtāś ca bandibhedāḥ | ānakaḥ paṭahaḥ | bharaṃ bharaṇaṃ karotīti vigṛhya ‘ta
t karoti—’ iti ṇici kṛte niṣṭhāyāṃ bharitaśabdaḥ || 1 ||
tasyetyādi viśeṣakam_ || 2 ||
brahmāṇḍakavāṭapṛṣṭhena vāraṇam uparigamananirodhas tena namyamānavapur adhogamanāśrayaṇāt_ || 3 ||
pālī paṅktiḥ | karayos tālaḥ parasparāhananam_ || 4 ||
(tilakam_)

tasya śivasya cittabhāgagatenāva
ṣṭambhena paricayāt tiraskṛtaḥ strīvaikalyayogo yasya tādṛśam iva mānasaṃ dhārayanty umā samara
rasena niriyād iti pañcabhiḥ kulakam_ || 5 ||

malinitā chaviḥ śobhā yasyā
s tādṛśīṃ kāntim iva kareṇotpeśayantī (utproñchayitum_) līlayā || 7 ||

muṣṭigrahe 'pi
śithilam atikṛśatvān muṣṭim api pūrayitum akṣamaṃ madhyaṃ balītrayayogi bibhratītīva kucābhibha
vecchayā yathā tuṅge 'py atra kucamaṇḍale ekā kevalaiva balī racitā mayā tvatikṛśenāpi
balītrayaṃ dhṛtam iti | vastutaḥ punar ekāvalī hāralatā || 8 ||
(pañcabhiḥ kulakam_)

kāntā nāma dṛṣṭiḥ |
uktaṃ ca—‘harṣaprasādajanitā kāntātyarthaṃ samanmathā | sabhrūkṣepakaṭākṣā ca dṛṣṭiḥ śṛṅgā
riṇī matā ||’ iti || 10 ||

upagūhanam āśleṣas tadrasenodgataḥ pulakaprabandho yatra tādṛśo
maṅgalānāṃ maṇimantrauṣadhiprabhṛtīnāṃ vidhir itikartavyatāviśeṣas tayā vidadhe nibaddhaḥ
|| 11 ||
apinehur abadhnan_ | lohajālaṃ tanutram_ || 12 ||

kaṅkaṭavat kavacam ity anarthāntaram_ (?)
|| 13 ||

chāyaiva tamas tena malinitā kaṇṭhasthasyāhipateḥ phaṇāmaṇiśrīr yena |
kaṇṭhatro galatrāṇam_ || 15 ||

kodaṇḍasya madhye kṛśatvād agre mahattvāc ca bhogīndra
kaṣaṇakṛśamadhyamandareṇa sāmyam_ || 17 ||
bharmaghaṭitāni hiraṇmayāni || 18 ||

babhravā
dayo gaṇāḥ | ratnamālāyā lambamānatayāvasthānāda[stā]bhimukhaṃ patantyaiva nakṣatra
paṅktyā sāmyam_ || 19 ||

lohitakaḥ padmarāgaḥ | ‘lohitān maṇau’ iti svārthe kan_ |
abhrakaṃ dhātubhedaḥ | tanucchado māḍhī ca kavacaḥ || 20 ||

parabhāgaḥ śobhāti
śayaḥ | nāgavaktro vināyakaḥ | puṣkaraṃ kariśuṇḍāgraṃ kamalaṃ ca || 22 ||

hautāśaniḥ ku
māraḥ | tasya ṣaṇmukhatvāc chirastrāṇy api ṣaḍeveti bahuṣu pūrvādriśṛṅgeṣv arkabimbāni bi
bhratī kalpāntadyaur iva mūrtis tasya śuśubhe || 23 ||

agnikākhyasya gaṇapater daṃsanaṃ bandha
(vraṇa)raktabindunibaddha vivaratvād ardhasyūtapadmarāgam ivāsīt_ || 24 ||

sthapuṭito viṣa
mīkṛtaḥ | śubhalohaṃ kālāyasam_ || 25 ||

vāraṇo niṣeddhā | jālikā jālīti pra
siddhaṃ pratanuvasanam_ || 26 ||

ketanāni dhvajās tatpatākābhiḥ śabalitanabhastalāḥ kariṇaḥ
sainikaiḥ kṛtāḥ | pratimā dantakoṣaḥ, devānāṃ pratikṛtayaś ca | rakṣāyām adhikāraḥ prastāvo
yasyāḥ | rakṣārtham upādīyamānetyarthaḥ | tatra.........rakṣā bhūtebhyo vivakṣitā | surasadmanāṃ
tu varṣopanipātāt_ | bhūtir makkolādiraja eva | sudhā makkolabhedaḥ || 27 ||
(yugalakam_)

mau
ktikanicayasya nidhānāny āspadāni kumbhāḥ kavāṭās tadrakṣāyai vyākulā ajagarasadṛśāḥ
karadaṇḍā yeṣām_ | nidhighaṭeṣu cājagarā rakṣākulā bhavantīti prasiddham etat_ | kīcako
veṇus tadyaṣṭir eva kadalī dhvajas tatra | ‘kadalī vaijayantī’ iti tu kecit_ || 29 ||
uṣasi sindūrarajaś churitaṃ tāmarasarajorājamānaṃ dikcakram iva viśvam āsīt_ || 31 ||
līletyādikalāpakam_ || 32 ||
āyānam aśvābharaṇam_ || 33 ||

kuśalair aśvaśāstrajñair vīthīṣu
mārgeṣu gamitāḥ saṃcāritāḥ | vīthayaś ca turaṃgaśāstre nava prasiddhāḥ | yad uktam_—‘caturasraṃ
kāṅkaṃ māyūram ardhamāyūram iti sāṃnāhyaṃ vīthicatuṣṭayam_ | valganaṃ nīcair gataṃ laṅghanaṃ dhoraṇaṃ
nāroṣṭa(?)m ity aupavāhyaṃ vīthipañcakam_ ||’ iti | stuvas turagāṇāṃ lalāṭadeśaḥ | tasya śra
modabinduśabalatvāt sudhodgamaneneva lagnakaṇāḥ keṣāṃcid aśvānām amṛtād utpatteḥ || 34 ||
(tilakam_)

sānūkatām anyena sadṛśatvaṃ bibhrato 'py upamānaśūnyā iti virodhaḥ | sahānūkaiḥ śubhair lakṣaṇai
r vartanta iti tu vyākhyāyām avirodhaḥ | ‘anūkaḥ praguṇataraḥ pra(pro)thaḥ’ iti tu kecit_ |
mandā alasās te samīravegaṃ glapayantīti virodhaḥ | ‘tatra mandamṛgākhyās tu turagā lakṣa
ṇānvitāḥ’ iti tu mandajātitvād avirodhaḥ || 35 ||

añcitaṃ gamanam_ | śikhino 'gne
r utpetuṣām utpannānām_ | keṣāṃcid aśvānām agnikāraṇatvāt_ || 36 ||

vipulakair vistīrṇaiḥ |
vicitrā pulā gativiśeṣo yeṣāṃ tair iti vā | svārthe kan_ | vipalakaiś ca vividharomanthaiḥ |
vipulaṃ kaṃ śiro yeṣāṃ tair iti vā | śucibhir nirdoṣaiḥ puṇḍraṃ tilakaḥ | nigīryate 'neneti
nigālaḥ kaṇṭhaḥ | devamaṇayo divyāni ratnāny āvartabhedāś ca || 37 ||

utthāpakenordhva
khuratvenottamānām aśvaśāstrakuśalānāṃ mudaṃ dadatas turaṃgā lakṣmīm ūhuḥ | bhāṇḍam aśvālaṃkāraḥ |
rūpaṃ dehakāntiḥ | jave nikāmaṃ hitāḥ prītihetavaḥ | raṅgās tu nāṭyabhuva uttamānāṃ nā
ṭyasvarūpanipuṇamatīnāṃ pramadaṃ diśantaḥ śobhāṃ dhārayanti | tatpakṣe utthāpaka utkṛṣṭaḥ
sthāpakaḥ sūtradhāraprāyaḥ | uktaṃ ca—‘sthāpakaḥ praviśedanyaḥ sūtradhārasamākṛtiḥ’ iti |
‘udaḥ sthāstambhoḥ pūrvasya’ iti sakārasya thakāraḥ | utthāpako vā sātvatīvṛttibhedaḥ |
uktaṃ ca—‘aham utthāpyāse.........tāvad darśayātmanaḥ śaktim_’ iti | saṃghasamāśrayam utthita
m utthāpako jñeyaḥ ||’ (?) iti | bhāṇḍāni murajādayaḥ | rūpaṃ nāṭakaprakaraṇādi | javani
kayā tiraskariṇyā mahitāḥ pūjitāḥ | kvacit_ ‘utthāpanena’ iti pāṭhaḥ | tatrotthāpana
m utplāvanam_ | ‘yasmād utthāpayanty atra prayogaṃ nāndipāṭhakāḥ | pūrvam eva tu raṅge 'smiṃs tasmād u
tthāpanaṃ smṛtam_ ||’ iti pūrvaraṅgāṅgaṃ ca || 38 ||

vistāraḥ prathamadhātubhedaś ca | kṛtinas turaṃ
geṣu (turaṃgaśāstra)gāndharvavedapravīṇāḥ | kṛto rūpasya varṇo mārjanādisaṃskāro yasya |
kṛtarūpa......svarūpavarṇāḥ sthāyisaṃcā[ryā]rohyavarohirūpāḥ svarūpā yatra | āviddham udgataṃ
dhātubhedaś ca | karaṇāni gatau vicchittiviśeṣāḥ | karaṇaś ca dhātubhedaḥ | vyañjanāni śrīvṛ
kṣādīni lakṣaṇāni teṣāṃ kramo yathāśāstram aṅgeṣu viniveśaḥ | vyañjanasya ca dhātuviśeṣasya
kramaḥ puṣpakalādi (tālādi ?) | tatprabhedānāṃ yathāprāyaṃ (?) prayogaḥ | dhātavo vistā
rādyāś catvāras tantrīṣv aṅguligrahaṇena viśeṣaniṣpādyāḥ svaraprayogaviśeṣāḥ | tadāśritaṃ vādyaṃ
dhātuvādyam | anupaplutaṃ svanāhitaṃ (?) doṣaśūnyaṃ ca || 39 ||

list.item: 1. ‘karaughaiḥ’ kha. ka-kha-pustakayor asmāc chlokād anantaraṃ ‘aśvavarṇanam_’ ity asti.

div.p:
divi kṣaṇaṃ lagnapadatvā
t khurais tata utpatanaśikṣām ivākurvata turagāḥ || 40 ||

‘mūlata eva prabhṛti prāgraṃ yāvat prasā
ritaḥ pavanaiḥ | ketau niveśito yaḥ sa paṭaḥ sītāpaṭo jñeyaḥ ||’ upakaraṇam āyudhasaṃpadanādikaṃ
ca || 41 ||

anavarataṃ sadā | navaṃ ca rataṃ ramaṇaṃ yathākrameṇa | nāyakaḥ prabhuḥ kāmukaś ca |
ūruṇā vistīrṇena yugena kāṣṭhaviśeṣeṇa sajjā (ghanā) yā śrīḥ sā saṃdarśitā yayā | saṃda
rśitā corvor yugasya yugmasya sataś ca jaghanasya śrīr yayā | abhiyogo raṇaḥ surataṃ ca | rathānāṃ
samūho rathakaṭyā | ‘initrakaṭyacaś ca’ iti kaṭyac_ | tayā śrīrāpi prāptā | rathakaṭyā
cātra nāyiketi viśeṣaṇasāmyād gamyate || 42 ||

[‘sarvapaścāt padaṃ vartate’ iti bhāṣyakṛdvyava
hāradarśanād avyayena saha ṣaṣṭhīsamāsapratiṣedhasyānityatvaniścayāt tadanu tadupariprabhṛtīni śabda
rūpāṇi sādhutvaṃ nātivartante |] maṇḍalāgraṃ khaḍgo bimbasya ca purodeśaḥ || 43 ||

agni
śikhāvatpiśaṅgatvaṃ rathasya kesarimayatvāt_ | teṣāṃ ca prāyaśaḥ kapiśavarṇatvāt_ | āyo
dhanānuguṇā saṅgrāmānurūpā | kvacit_ 'pṛthvīdharānuguṇa' iti pāṭhaḥ | tatra pṛthvīdharo 'tra
kodaṇḍīkṛto mandaraḥ || 44 ||
veṇiḥ pravāhaḥ | uṣṇavāraṇaṃ chattram_ || 45 ||

śabdānuba
ndhino maṇivalayā yasya tādṛgbhujo yayos te || 46 ||

.........kam_ | pāṇijā nakhā
s tat samūhena śaśasya yad dāraṇaṃ tena hetunā kāṃdiśīko bhayadrutaḥ pradoṣeṣu śaśī kṛtaḥ || 47 ||
ruñjitaṃ siṃhagarjitam_ || 48 ||

karālā bhāsvarāḥ | vajrasūcī vajramayī sevanī || 49
||
(cakkalakam_)
tārkṣyo vainateyaḥ || 51 ||

vigraho deha eva bharo bhāraḥ | vigrahaś ca kalahasta
drūpo bhara āṭopaḥ || 52 ||

dūram avagāhanena dṛḍhaṃ vidāritaṃ pātālāgraṃ
yais tādṛśāḥ śailanivahāḥ kenāpi prakāreṇākṛṣṭatvād gaganodmane garuḍasya kṣaṇaṃ vighnena kheda
m udapādayan_ || 55 ||
yathāyathaṃ yathāsvam || 56 ||

tāvad iti yāvad evaṃ sarve samarasaṃmukhā
s tāvad aṅganājano 'naṅga(?)viṣaye 'tyartham ākulo jātaḥ | pratītaṃ prakṛṣṭam_ || 57 ||

baddhaspṛhatvaṃ karapratiṣṭhatvāt_ | iyam asya preyasī sāṃpratamanayā sārdham eṣa viharatīty abhi
prāyād vā | śititvaṃ śyāmatā tīkṣṇatvaṃ ca || 60 ||

lg.l: ghanamecakaṃ viṣam ivodabhvat pracuraṃ rajaḥ pradhanaratnanidheḥ || 25 ||

div.p:
pradhanaṃ
saṅgrāmaḥ || 25 ||

lg.l: vidadhaj javāt kuliśamuṣṭihataṃ kariṇo raṇe radanadaṇḍayugam |
subhaṭo 'karon navaram apratimaṃ samabhiṣṭutaḥ svam api yodhajanaiḥ || 26 ||

div.p:
kuliśakarkaśo muṣṭiḥ kuliśamuṣṭiḥ | āyudhabheda ity anye | apratimaṃ
dantakoṣaśūnyam apratispardhaṃ ca || 26 ||

lg.l: pulakaṃ dadhau saghanagharmajalā dhṛtavepathur muhur ajṛmbhata ca |
bhaṭam īkṣya khe nahi tad asti na yad vidadhe 'psarāḥ smaramayaṃ lalitam || 27 ||

div.p: lalitaṃ vilasitam_ || 27 ||

lg.l: navalākṣikaiḥ śuśubhire sadṛśā yudhi cāmarair dinakarāṅgabhuvaḥ || 28 ||

div.p:
dinakarasyāṅgabhūḥ
suto yamaḥ || 28 ||

lg.l: dadhato mudaṃ rudhirapānakṛtāṃ yudhi babhramur vikṛtabhūtagaṇāḥ || 29 ||

div.p: āsanaṃ paryāṇam || 29 ||

ari cakraṃ samaralakṣmyā bhujaśālinā vidhṛtaṃ
maṇimukuraṃ vyaḍambayat_ || 30 ||

lg.l: yudhi koṭavīr abhivilokya tadā muditātmanaḥ prakṛtanṛttavidhāḥ |
dalitāśrayair dhavalaketupaṭais tarituṃ camūr drutam ivaicchad asau || 31 ||

div.p:
koṭavyo nagnā yoṣitaḥ | vidhā prakāraḥ | staritu
m ācchādayitum_ || 31 ||

lg.l: parighāhatāt pṛthuviṣāṇamukhāt pratimā babhau nipatitā kariṇaḥ
śaradhiśriyaṃ yudhi paribhramataḥ samavartino nijaruciṃ dadhatī || 32 ||

div.p:
parigho mudgaraḥ | samavartī yamaḥ | tatsaṃbandhinaḥ śaradher iva śrīr ya
syās tādṛśīṃ nijaruciṃ bibhratī pratimā śuśubhe || 32 ||

lg.l: kṣatapuṣkarair aśivayā śivayā sa tadānakair nipatitair avanau |
raṇarākṣaso grasitum āśu camūr bahubhir mukhaiḥ sthita iva vyarucat || 33 ||

div.p:
puṣkaraṃ vādyabhāṇḍāgram_ | śivā
sṛgālī | ānakaḥ paṭahaḥ || 33 ||

bhadrāṇāṃ gajaviśeṣāṇāṃ ghaṭāḥ paṅktayaḥ | bhadraghaṭāś ca
nidhiviśeṣāḥ | bhadrā vā kalyāṇā ghaṭā nidhīnāmādhārabhūtāḥ kumbhāḥ | sannidhayo
vastrā......nāni | santaś ca nidhayaḥ śobhanāni nidhānāni || 34 ||

lg.l: gṛhabhṛtkalā dhavalapakṣa iva vyanayat kramād atanumaṇḍalatām || 35 ||

div.p:
kṛṣṭir namanam_ |
grahabhṛc candraḥ | maṇḍalaṃ cakrākāratā bimbaṃ ca || 35 ||

lg.l: ghanam utthitaṃ yudhi mitho 'bhihateḥ śriyam āyayau subhaṭakhaḍgarajaḥ |

div.p:
mitho 'bhihateḥ khaḍgānāṃ parasparā
bhighātāt teṣām eva rajaḥ samutthitaṃ raṇakṣamayāpsarasāṃ saṃvanane prakṛtaṃ niṣpādita(?)m añjana
m iva śriyam āyayau | ‘prakṛtisaṃvananaṃ’ iti pāṭhaḥ | saṃvananaṃ vaśīkaraṇam_ || 36 ||

lg.l: yudhi śaṅkubhir bhaṭakaraprahitair dadhur unnatāḥ sphuṭaśikhaṇḍabharaiḥ |
giribhiḥ kṣaṇaṃ sadṛśatāṃ kariṇaḥ pracalākibhiḥ śirasi baddhapadaiḥ || 37 ||

div.p:
śaṅkur ma
yūrapicchanicitaṃ kuntaśaraprāyam āyudham_ | pracalākino mayūrāḥ || 37 ||

lg.l: samaṇitviṣā ghaṭitamīlikayā patitaṃ bhaṭāt samiti cakram adhaḥ |
kuṭilaśriyā śaśabhṛtaḥ kalayā ravimaṇḍalaṃ sahitam anvakarot || 38 ||

div.p:
īlikā kṛ
pāṇī || 38 ||

lg.l: acalādhipaṃ dalayateva javāc charajanmanā yudhi raveṇa tadā || 39 ||

div.p:
tridivaukaso devāḥ | teṣāṃ śarajanmanā bāṇotthitena raveṇa vegān meru
m iva dalayatā vavṛdhe vṛddham_ | atha ca śarajanmanā kumāreṇa vavṛdha ity uktam_ | so 'py anuyā
yināṃ devānāṃ raveṇa daityavadhūr viklavīkurvann acalādhipaṃ krauñcaṃ dalitavān_ || 39 ||

lg.l: śriyam āsadan vikaṭakuntalatā bhujaśālibhiḥ sarabhasaṃ bhramitāḥ || 40 ||
yudhi keśino daśanaratnakaṇaiḥ śabalīkṛtā haribhujeva babhau || 41 ||

div.p: keśī nāma dānavaḥ | bhujā bāhuḥ || 41 ||

lg.l: dviradaḥ kṣaṇād asivilūnatalān pratihāriṇaḥ karikarān avanau |
bhayapuñjitān sapadi pattripatir bhujagān iva vyadalayat samare || 42 ||

div.p:
dviradaḥ kariṇāṃ pratipakṣabhūtānāṃ karān pratihā
ritvād bhayapuñjitabhujagasadṛśān amṛdnāt_ || 42 ||

lg.l: bhramayañ javād atanukuntalatāṃ nijatejasāsphuṭam adhaḥstham avait |

div.p:
daśanotpluto gajasya dantayor upari sthito
bhaṭaḥ | pratigajasyāṃsagatatvāt svāpekṣayonnate sthitam api subhaṭaṃ tejasādhaḥstham evāvaid ajñā
sīt_ | subhaṭaprahitānāṃ hetiśatānāṃ kuntalatābhramaṇena nivāraṇāt_ || 43 ||

lg.l: kariṇi sthitaḥ pracurabhūtisite sphaṭikācale draviṇanātha iva |
amanuṣyagaṃ tad api dharmam agāt subhaṭoparaḥ kṣapitaśatrugadaḥ || 44 ||

div.p:
yadyapi sa
bhaṭo draviṇanātha iva tad apy amanuṣyagaṃ dharmam agād iti virodhaḥ | dhanado hi manuṣyagaṃ dharmaṃ
dhatte | manuṣyadharmeti tasyābhidhānāt_ | manuṣyadharmeti rūḍhir eṣā dhanadasya | na tatrārthasya
kaścid anugama iti tu na virodhaḥ | kṣapitāḥ śatrava eva gadā vyādhayo yena kṣapitaśatruś ca
gadā āyudhabhedo yasya || 44 ||

lg.l: galitaṃ tathā radanināṃ samare plutadiṅmukhair bahaladānajalaiḥ |
srutanirjharān abhiviśaṅkya girīn nabhaso yathā ghaṭitam ambudharaiḥ || 46 ||

div.p: radanino gajāḥ || 46 ||

lg.l: kariṇāṃ mitho daśanaghaṭṭanayā viṣamārciṣā sapadi niṣpatatā |
samarājire jvalitakuntalataḥ kṣitibhṛd babhau prakaṭadāva iva || 47 ||

div.p:
viṣamārciḥ sa
ptārciḥ || 47 ||

lg.l: nibiḍaujasaḥ śuśubhire turagāḥ śitivartmabhiḥ sadṛśatāṃ dadhataḥ || 48 ||

div.p: vāhitā bhrāmitā vyāpāritāś ca || 48 ||

lg.l: kalaśair iva pratidiśaṃ nihitair bhaṭamastakaiḥ kṣitir abhāt patitaiḥ || 49 ||
racitāspadā dadhati vārimucā samadehatāṃ gajapatau samade |
śriyam āsadat taḍid ivāruṇitā galatāsṛjā samiti khaḍgalatā || 50 ||

div.p:
sadvandvaḥ saṃ
garaḥ sabhaṭau dvau dvau parasparaṃ yatra yudhyete | pravaṇāḥ saṃmukhyaḥ || 51 ||

iti śrībālabṛhaspatyanujīvino vāgīśvarāṅkasya vidyādhipatyaparanāmno mahākave
rājānakaśrīratnākarasya kṛtau ratnāṅke haravijaye mahākāvye
samarodghātavarṇanaṃ nāma dvācatvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ |

iti rājānaka
jayānakasūnor alakasya kṛtau haravijayaviṣamapadoddyote dvācatvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ ||
trayaścatvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ |

lg.l: sumālī so 'tha saṅgrāme ripusenāṃ juhāva tām || 1 ||

div.p:
yatkṛte madanenānṛjuhāvatāṃ devayoṣid dadhre sa sumālī nāma daityas tām arisenāṃ juhāva yu
ddhāyāhūtavān_ | anṛjur vaktraḥ | hāvaś ceṣṭāviśeṣaḥ || 1 ||

tato 'surāṇām antaṃ vidyādharagaṇe
'tati gacchati sati sa sumālī tām eva nānā bahuvidham airirac cikṣepeti saṃbandhaḥ | ītīnā
m upadravāṇāṃ tottā vyathakaḥ | vināśaka ityarthaḥ | atra ‘kartari ca’ iti ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaprati
ṣedho na bhavati | ‘janikartuḥ prakṛtiḥ’ ity anena tadanityatvasya jñāpitatvāt_ | atīnānā
inasya prabhorano ratham atikrāntaḥ svāmiratham atikramya paramparam_ nataṃ raṃgā (?) | nūno navo
nā puruṣo na kiṃ tarhi purāṇaḥ | susāṃsaḥ suṣṭhu sahāṃsābhyāṃ vartate | balavān ityarthaḥ | a
susāsāsiḥ asusau prāṇāntakāriṇau āsaḥ śarāsanam asiś ca yasya saḥ | irā bhūs tayā
rorā daridrā arayo yasya | tenaivāhṛtatvāt_ | nūna iti ‘navasya nū ādeśo nastnaptanap_
khāś ca pratyayāḥ’ iti sādhuḥ | airirad iti ‘īra gatau’ ity asya curādiṇijantasya luṅi rū
pam_ | atrottaratra ca vyākhyāntaraṃ kvacit saṃbhavad api na kṛtaṃ kliṣṭatvād granthagauravabhayāc ca || 2 ||
3 ||
(ekākṣarapādaḥ | yugmam_)

sāraiḥ sudṛḍhair amarṣibhiḥ sapatnair nikṛttāś chinnāḥ | samantapañcakaṃ kṣetram_ | tatpakṣe tu
ripukaṇṭhā rāmarṣiṇā kṛttāḥ | seti ca pṛthakpadenorvī viśeṣyate || 4 ||

tena sumālinā
samare kenāghāniṣata sarve nihatāḥ | bhagnāḥ ketuś chattraṃ patākā ca yasyās tathāvidhayā ca
tatsenayā kayā tucchatrapatā dhṛtā | na kayācit_ | sarvaiva pracuralajjābhūd ityarthaḥ | aghāni
ṣateti hanter luṅi ciṇvadbhāva iḍāgamaś ca || 5 ||

lg.l: eko 'py aneka ity ājau vicarann aikṣyatāribhiḥ || 6 ||

div.p:
aneka iti pratyekaṃ ripūṇāṃ saṃrambheṇa
praharaṇāt_ || 6 ||

lg.l: bhedenaibhaṃ raṇe tasminn avasāya kaṭaṃ kayā |

div.p:
aibhaṃ kaṭaṃ gajagaṇḍaṃ bhedenāvasāya pralayaṃ nītvā kayā senayā nāroci
sarvayaiva śobhitam_ | navasāyakaṭaṅkayā navaśaraśobhayā || 7 ||

vyatijaghnuḥ parasparaṃ jaghnuḥ |
‘itaretarānyonyopapadāc ca’ iti karmavyatihāre taṅṅabhāvaḥ || 8 ||

ye dantino niścita
m eva rasāṃ bhuvaṃ viṣāṇamusalair abhindan vidārayām āsus te gajā daityasaṃbandhinām urasāṃ pīvaratvaṃ
ke nābhinandanti sma | sarva evābhyanandan_ | kṣitivattadbhede pāṭavābhāvāt_ | kecit pā
dābhyāsānurodhena ‘abhinan_’ iti paṭhanti tat tu na yuktam_ | luṅi dakāralopasyālākṣa
ṇikatvāt_ || 9 ||

lg.l: nairguṇyam āśu bhajataḥ piber iva viṣāṇinaḥ || 10 ||

div.p:
nairguṇyam akiṃcitkaratvam āśrayato gajasya kenacid vīreṇādantatā pratya
jñāyi | dantaśunyo 'yam iti pratijñā kṛtā | anyathā kathaṃ yudhyeta | piber iva | yathā pi
bādeśasya lakṣye guṇābhāvaṃ bhajato 'dantatā akārāntatā pāṇininā pratijñātā | anyathā
hi laghūpadhatvād guṇaḥ syāt_ || 10 ||

lg.l: raṇe śivābhir ama nāgr amanāg amitaṃ cakale varam |

div.p:
amitaṃ sthūlaṃ varaṃ cotkṛṣṭaṃ kalevaraṃ śarīraṃ śivā
bhir amanāk_ cakale saṃkhyātam_ | ‘kala śabdasaṃkhyānayoḥ’ | asthiśeṣatvaṃ gamitaṃ cādṛśyata
māṃsārthitayā vicāritam_ || 11 ||

śrīvṛkṣaḥ kharjūrī cāvartaviśeṣau | anyatra śrīvṛkṣo
bilvaḥ kharjūrī ca taruviśeṣaḥ | paryāptā vaṭavarṇās tilakabhedā yasya tādṛk kaṃ śiro yeṣām_ |
vaṭaś ca nyagrodhaḥ | varṇakāś candanataravaḥ || 12 ||

mānavatāṃ śūrāṇāṃ rabhaso 'bhilāṣas tasmā
t tayā nākastriyā bhāvitam_ | śritotkaṇṭhita(ṇṭha)yā sthitam_ | lyablope pañcamī | tasyāś ca
tadabhisaraṇodyatāyā raṇadhūlyā triyāmā rātrir ādadhe kṛtā | tayeti vā hetutṛtīyā | aham a
nayā vṛto 'ham anayā vṛta iti yas tad dhetukas teṣāṃ raṇas taddhūlyetyarthaḥ | navena stutyā tāntayā
khinnayā śūrāṇāṃ punaḥpunaś cāṭukaraṇāt_ || 13 ||
sīmantayāmāsa dvidhākarot_ || 14 ||

lg.l: abhayaṃ tair asau senāṃ kāṃ kṣiṇoti sa yācitaḥ || 15 ||

div.p:
jayāvāptiṃ kāṅkṣanti ye 'rayas tān ativismayācito bahunā garveṇa yukto vinighnaṃs taiś cāri
bhir abhayaṃ yācitaḥ kāṃ senāṃ kṣiṇoti sma | na kāṃcit_ || 15 ||

prajñāta......
lakṣaṇam ity abhidhānāt_ | anāhataṃ lakṣaṇaṃ dhvajo yasyeti tu na virodhaḥ | bhīṣmo 'śānta
navaś cety api tu virodhaḥ || 16 ||

abdeṣu jaladeṣūtkānāṃ mayūrāṇām āgamakṛd asau siṃhanā
dasamṛddhyābhūt_ | tayā svanaśriyāsya cecchayā bhaṭā yoddhuṃ rāgamayuḥ saṃprāptāḥ | akṛttayā
avinaṣṭayā || 17 ||

prabhañjano vāyur api | bhāsvān ravir api | amaradviṣām iti ‘jāsi
niprahaṇa—’ iti ṣaṣṭhī || 18 ||

asau gaṇo līlālasaṃ kṛtvā lalāsa cikrīḍa | sā
lāṃsaḥ sālatarusamaskandhaḥ | salilasyollolas taraṅgas tadvallolo 'sir yasya saḥ | suṣṭhūllasa
tīti sūllasaḥ pramuditaḥ | aṃsalo balavān_ | sāsaḥ sahāsena prāsena dhanuṣā vā vartate
saḥ | asatī ninditā lālasā vāñchā yeṣāṃ te asallālasā māraṇodyatā ripavas teṣā
m asūṃl lunāti yaḥ sa tathoktaḥ | dvyakṣaraḥ || 19 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ)

lg.l: ya ekastarasā daityān vaṃśān iva suparvaṇaḥ |

div.p:
parvāṇy utsavāḥ saṃdhayaś ca | kṣmābhṛto
nṛpāḥ parvatāś ca | kaṭakaḥ skandhāvāro nitambaś ca | surakuñjaraḥ suraśreṣṭho devagajaś ca | sa
rvatra ‘vṛndārakanāgakuñjaraiḥ pūjyamānam_’ iti samāsaḥ || 20 ||

sādino gajāśvārohāḥ |
teṣāṃ tāno vistīrṇatā sāsti yasyām_ | tādṛśī sā senā tena gaṇena sāditāvasādaṃ
nītā | sahasā ditā khaṇḍitā | ‘do avakhaṇḍane’ | rabhasāt saṃyugamitā gamitā || 21 ||
(saṃdaṣṭayamakam_)

anyeṣu viṣayeṣv anagho nirdoṣo 'khaṇḍito vā ghanaś ca nyāyo vīravrataṃ yasyāḥ | ātataṃ ca
tāmasaṃ krodhaṃ yayā tādṛśī yā matā jñātā | sā nīlavajrākhyasya daityasya senā tīkṣṇa
vartmabhiḥ khaḍgair ākīrṇā āśu tvaritam āsīt_ | bhogino 'pi tīkṣṇavartmāno dṛṣṭiviṣāḥ |
tīkṣṇaṃ viṣaṃ vartmany apāṅgadeśe yeṣām iti kṛtvā | sārā prakṛṣṭā ābhā yasyāḥ | śubha ārāsaḥ
śabdo yasyāḥ | sāratā sāvaṣṭambhatvaṃ mamatāhaṃkāras tayo rasā bhūmiḥ | tama eva tāmasam_ |
prajñāditvād aṇ_ || 22 ||
(anulomapratilomapādaḥ | yugalakam_)

viluptajyākaś chinnamaurvīka indraḥ svāmī yasyās tādṛśīṃ
tāṃ senāṃ sa gaṇo 'vadhīt_ | avadhānata ekāgratayā | avadhair vā ahatair ānataḥ praṇataḥ | kā
rtāntikā gaṇakāḥ | prakriyā śailī | tatra jyā grahāṇām asphuṭānāṃ jīveti prasiddhā sphu
ṭīkaraṇayuktiḥ | kendraṃ madhyamandabhedena dvividhaṃ cālyamāno grahaḥ | yathā caitat tathā ta
c chāstrād evāvagantavyam_ | atra pakṣe 'viluptety akārapraśleṣaḥ || 24 ||

lg.l: na yasya pratibhāty ārād asṛgālo hi tādṛśaḥ || 25 ||

div.p:
nandino dṛśo 'sṛ
graktaṃ tenevālohitā babhūvuḥ | yasya tādṛśo nīlavajrajātīyo nāsṛgālaḥ pratibhāti |
api tu sagāla eva | palāyamānatvāt_ || 25 ||

lg.l: tenāsta divyāḥ khaṃ draṣṭuṃ rurudhur yatayo 'bhayam || 27 ||

div.p:
śailādir nandī | tasyobhayaṃ
balaṃ sauṣṭhavarūpaṃ senākhyaṃ ca dhuryatayā uru prabhūtam āścaryakaraṃ yasmād āsta tena kāraṇena
divyā yatayo devarṣayaḥ khaṃ rurudhuḥ | abhayaṃ kṛtvā draṣṭum_ || 27 ||

kaṭakaḥ sainyaṃ nita
mbaś ca || 28 ||

praṇatānām abhītidānarūpayā vācā dikcakram ārurutsatāṃ roddhum icchatāṃ
teṣāṃ gaṇānāṃ kīrtir utsatām acchinnapravāhatvaṃ yayau | yato bhagnadānavā cāruś ca || 29 ||
ralī goṣṭhī || 30 ||

lg.l: sthitir gatyā raṇe yeṣām anṛjvālābhi dhāvatām || 31 ||

div.p:
gandharvasenā tejaḥ surārīṇām ahārṣīt_ | ata eva nṛjvālā puruṣa
tejas tadabhidhā nāsti yeṣām_ | ete tejasvinaḥ puruṣā iti na kaścit tānvyavaharatī
tyarthaḥ | yeṣāṃ dhāvatām anṛjvā kuṭilayā gatyā raṇe sthitir alābhi prāptā || 31 ||

śivasyāpatyaṃ śaivaḥ kumāraḥ | śivādibhyo 'ṇ_ | sa raṇāganaṃ viveśa | ardhacandraś candrakha
ṇḍo 'pi | vāhinī gaṅgāpi | nāgāḥ sarpā api | viśveṣāṃ samagrāṇāṃ śāvānāṃ śiśū
nām īśo vibhur adhidevatā | śaiśavaṃ bālyam_ | śavānām aṃśā bhāgās teṣv āśābhilāṣas te
nāveśinaḥ sonmādāḥ śivāvaṃśāḥ sṛgālīsaṃdhā yatra raṇāṅgane | viśāṃ vaśī
janānāṃ madhye jitendriyaḥ || 32 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ | yugmam_)

asau kumāro ripucamūṃ
nighnanyaśo 'dadhad babhāra papau vā | ......syā eva ‘dheṭ_ pāne’ | ‘vibhāṣā dheṭ_śvyoḥ’
iti vibhāṣā caṅādeśaḥ | tāṃ saṅgrāmabhūmimṛto gataḥ karuṇām adadhad adhārayat_ | tāmasā
vṛtaḥ krodhāviṣṭaḥ || 35 ||

tanucchāyaṃ śarīrakāntir eva timiram_ | ‘vibhāṣā senāsurā—’
iti napuṃsakam_ | tārako nāma daityaḥ, tārakāṇi ca jyotīṃṣi || 36 ||

sa kumāras tāḥ
senā dakṣatayā śastā api sannayodhāḥ savyadhāś ca mahāsinā vyadhād akarot_ | akṣatā
śo 'khaṇḍitāsthaḥ | sanayaḥ sunītiḥ | dhāmahāsinā tejasā prahasanaśālinā | ‘vyadhaja
por anupasarge’ ity ap_ || 37 ||
(samudgayamakakāñcīgomūtrikāmurajajālabandhāḥ)
tārakākṣaprabhṛtayo daityāḥ || 38 ||

danave dānavānāṃ jananyai
śubhadātā śreyasaḥ khaṇḍayitā kumāraḥ saṅgrāmāṅganaṃ gato daityān avasyan vyāpādayan_ | taccara
ṇājiraṃ navānāṃ syandanānāṃ vegena śuśubhe | danava iti ‘kriyāgrahaṇam api kartavyam_’ | iti
saṃpradānatā || 39 ||

sa kumāraḥ | samīke raṇe | tasya ripoḥ sainikānekaśaḥ pratyekaṃ śaṃ
sukhena kṣeptuṃ śaśāka | camūbhī racitā camūraiś ca mṛgabhedaiś citā vyāptā satī śrīr yeṣām_ |
śaśikeśasya candramauler aṃśakaḥ sutaḥ | aśokā pramuditā gaurī yatra samīke | śiśu
r bālaḥ | ata eva śukī krīḍāśukabhṛt_ | aśūko durdāntaḥ kekīnām īśo mahāmayūras tasyā
kāśaḥ samantād bhrājamānaḥ kauśikaḥ śakraḥ | sa yathā varṣeṇāvarjayati mayūraṃ tathāsāv api
nijaṃ samarottejanayā | śūkā karuṇā || 40 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ | yugalakam_)

tasya ṣaṇmukhāni raṇacchāyāśo
bhīni padmānīvādhiṣṭhitavatī śrīḥ sainikair dṛṣṭā | padmāny api ṣaṭcaraṇānām alīnāṃ chāyayā
śobhāśālīni || 42 ||

lg.l: manvānās taṃ śaraiḥ saṃkhye te purastād ripuṃ jitam |
tejo 'rkam iva bibhrāṇaṃ tepur astādri puñjitam || 43 ||

div.p:
te daityās taṃ ripuṃ saṃkhye raṇe purastād agrato jitaṃ manvānās tadī
yaiḥ śarais tepuḥ saṃtaptā jātāḥ | astā jitā adrayo yatra tādṛśaṃ tejaḥ puñjitaṃ dhāraya
ntam_ | ādityam iva | so 'py astādrau puñjitam eva dhāma dhārayati || 43 ||

sa īśaśiśuḥ
kumāraḥ śaraiḥ śārā āśānāmaśrīḥ paryantān ārarau jagrāha | śobhanā darśanasya rūpasya śrī
r yasya | cakriṇaḥ sarpās tān bhuṅkta iti cakribhuṅmayūraḥ | tam āśrito 'dhirūḍho ripuśirāṃsi
śātayan bhindan_ | tathā sudarśanaḥ śauricakraṃ tasyaiva śrīr yasya | so 'pi cakribhujaṃ haribāhu
m āśritaḥ śatruśirāṃsi śātayati | śūrayati sādhv iti śūrī vikrāntaḥ | ‘sādhukāriṇi ca’
iti ṇiniḥ | aśriyā rorā daridrā aṃśavo yasya saḥ | śaśinam īrayati nyakkarotīti
śaśīro rāhus tam aśnātīti śaśīrāśī rāhughātī | reśino siṃhakāḥ | ‘reśṛ hiṃsāyām_’ |
tān api śṛṇāti hinastīti reśiśīḥ | ariśaḥ pratiripuṃ śaśannāplutibhir gacchan_ |
ariśa iti ‘saṃkhyaikavacanāc ca vīpsāyām_’ iti śas_ || 44 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ | yugalakam_)

tasya bāṇair āhatā
daityā aprāptā gatir gamanaṃ saṃjñā ca cetanā yaiḥ kriyāyogeṇa ca śūnyatāṃ gatā nirvyārā
āsan_ | upasargāḥ prādaya iva | te hi kriyāyogam antareṇa gatisaṃjñāṃ na pratilabhante |
‘upasargāḥ kriyāyoge’, ‘gatiś ca’ iti vacanāt_ | upasargavyapadeśaś ca yogyatāvaśāt_ ||
46 ||

lg.l: taccamūś ca dviṣaḥ saṃkhye sajjātīyāya sā ravān || 47 ||

div.p:
sāravān balī kas tasmai spṛhāṃ na cakāra | sajātīyāya sujanmane | ‘jātyantāccha
bandhuni’ iti svārthe chaḥ | tasya camūḥ śatrūn atīyāyāticakrāma | sajjā saṃnaddhā | sāravā
n ninādayuktān_ || 47 ||

lg.l: vyaroci ca gajaiḥ saṃkhye tadīye dānavartibhiḥ || 49 ||

div.p:
dānavartibhir dānavānāṃ gatibhiḥ kṣuṇṇaṃ tadraṇavartma tena
ketumālinā īye gatam iti karmaṇi lakāraḥ | tadīye ca samare gajaiḥ śobhitam_ | dāna
vartibhir madajalapravartanaśīlair madasthair vā || 49 ||

asau kumāro vīrakopena gṛhītaśamaśo
bhaḥ ṣaṭ_ ca mukhāni bibhradgayāsuram abhīyāya| janyāsatayā janye 'syatīti janyāsas tadbhāvena |
raṇe nirasitum ityarthaḥ | atha ca dhvanitam_—ṣaḍ_jasya svarasya nyāso yeṣu mukheṣu tāni
tathā tadbhāvenopalakṣitāni mukhāny aṃśakān bibhratsauvīrakākhyena grāmarāgeṇopāttaśubhaśrī
r abhiyayāv iti || 50 ||

taṃ gayāsuraṃ nighnatā tenādayā kṛtā | nirdayam eva tam avadhīd i
tyarthaḥ | astārātinā nirākṛtadviṣā tatsenayā ca śaravarṣeṇa tamaḥ kṛtam_ | tārātinādayā
uccair atiśayena nadantyā || 51 ||

sa guhaḥ kair asurair ākor yuddhabhūmer udasāhi soḍhaḥ | kekī
mayūra īrako netā yasya | nāsti kutsitā kārā bandhanam akatīti vā | karmaṇy aṇ_ | ka
rakā aśanivarṣaṃ tasya kārakaḥ śakras tasyārayo daityās tān rujatīti kvip_ | ākekara
kair bhayān nimīlitanayanaiḥ piṅgalākṣair vā | arokair niṣprabhaiḥ | ‘ruca dīptau’ | vistīrṇaṃ kaṃ
śira ūrū vā yeṣāṃ taiḥ || 52 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ | yugalakam_)

lg.l: sa śaktyā dīprayā hāralatayeva śriyaṃ dadhau || 54 ||

div.p:
tārakāsyasya daityasyāntasthitir maraṇam_ | tā
rāṇāṃ ca muktāmaṇīnāṃ kāntā sthitī ramyam avasthānam_ | ojaḥ prabhā || 54 ||

māninā
cittenopalakṣitā caṇḍī tāṃ raṇabhuvamitā gatā | gaganavan nāsti nimā paricchedo yasyāḥ |
mamatayāhaṃkāreṇa cāmitā aparicchinnā || 55 ||
(yukpādapratilomaḥ)

tayā nikṛttā viparyayeṇa ca niviṣṭā
grīvā yasya tadbhāvaṃ gato bhaṭaḥ svapṛṣṭam ivāpaśyat_ || 56 ||

lg.l: nābhāc chrutir ivāhīnā sadoṃkāratayā na yā |

div.p:
bhartuḥ śivasyāṅke āratayā
krīḍitayā anayā saṅgrāmasado 'gāhi viloḍitam_ | yā śrutir iva na nābhāt api tu
śuśubha eva | śrutir vedaḥ | sadoṃkāro raṇapraveśasamaye pāṭhakāle ca yasya tadbhāvanāhīnā
sahitā || 57 ||

sā bhagavatī eṇāriṇā siṃhena raṇerāṃ samarabhuvaṃ rīṇā śliṣṭā rarāṇa
siṃhanādam akarot_ | pramāpaṇaṃ hiṃsanam_ | ‘mīñ_ hiṃsāyām_’ | anyatra pramā vikreyāṇāṃ
padārthānāṃ paricchedaḥ | paṇo mūlyam_ | bhaṭā yodhāḥ svāmigrāhyabhogodgrāhakāś ca | niṣadyā
āpaṇaḥ | daṃṣṭrā rathyāpi | reṇunā rorau vegavāhitvād rahitāv ūrū yasya tena | arṇorāṇāṃ
raṇo dhvanis tasyāraṇiḥ kāraṇam_ | tattulyasiṃhanādetyarthaḥ | tathā aṇavaḥ prāṇās teṣām u
raṇair hiṃsābhir upalakṣitāḥ | rīḥ śleṣo maittrī | ‘rīṅ_ śleṣaṇe’ iti dhātuṣu keṣāṃcit pāṭhāt_ |
tām īrayanti kṣipantīti rīraṇā dānavās teṣām ariṇeti hiṃsā eva viśleṣataḥ || 58 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ | yugalakam_ | ṣaḍbhiḥ kulakam_)

sā devī sadṛśātmano yuddhayogyasvabhāvān asurān avetya jñātvā .........devānāṃ
naur ivābhavat_ | tayaiva teṣāṃ tato nistāritatvāt_ | aritrāsakṛdarīṇāṃ bhayajananī | a
ritrasya ca kenipātanasyāsakṛtkṣepakāraṇaṃ yasyām_ | karṇaḥ śrotraṃ ......... | avāra
bāṇatā nirnirodhaśaratvaṃ vaidhavyādakañcukatā ca | sāratayā sthairyeṇārahito 'dhyāsaḥ samarā
dhiṣṭhānaṃ yasyāḥ | sā dhyātā ca satī kṣatasādhvasā bhinnabhayā | ādhyānaṃ cintanam_ |
sādhubhir apy asādharmyāṃ dhiyaṃ rāti yā || 60 ||
(saptadaśākṣaraṃ padmam_)
(tribhiḥ ku(ti)lakam_)

lg.l: vāditā tarasā bhīmā bherīṇāṃ sakalā tatiḥ |
sāditā tatra sāyāmā sārīṇāṃ sabalā gatiḥ || 63 ||

div.p: (gomūtrikājālabandhaḥ)

udāttaḥ śreṣṭho
babhūva | bhagavatīkṛtatvāt_ || 64 ||

lg.l: anirjitaripuḥ sāpi na tasthāv aratā madāt || 65 ||

div.p:
tadīyo rathamardaḥ kṣiter natasthāvaratām adāt_ natāḥ
sthāvarā adridrumādayo yasya tadbhāvaṃ dadau | sāpi madād anirjitaripur aratā ca krīḍārahitā
na tasthau || 65 ||

acchā nirmalā anaghā akhaṇḍitā namā bhaktalokā
yasyāḥ | āyatā unnatā | āsthāsu viṣaye 'lpakapratimā na, mahājanaiḥ sadṛśī | samya
g āśāpūraṇāt_ | śobhanā sthāmno balasyātiprakalpanā yasyāḥ || 67 ||
(anulomapratilomapādaḥ)

utpātadeśīyair u
padravasadṛśaiḥ || 68 ||
(yugalakam_)

lg.l: tadrūpaṃ vīkṣya ko na sma tadāśvasiti mānavaḥ || 69 ||

div.p:
tayā tadā āśu tvaritam asitimā kṛṣṇatvaṃ dadhre | navo nūtanaḥ |
kaś ca mānavo manuṣyas tasyās tad asitaṃ rūpaṃ vīkṣya nāśvasiti sma | tasya daityanidhananidā
natayā sarva evocchvastaḥ || 69 ||

vajraketur nāma daityas tayāghānīti viśeṣakam_ | savyā
pasavyau vāmadakṣiṇau | yā satataṃ hatārivargā avadātā ca nirmalā | gajamadenānando
yasya tādṛśena hariṇā siṃhenāsurān yātā tān prati dhāvitā | na sundarān durnirīkṣyān_ |
asravatā gajarudhiraliptena | atra prathamārdhād dvitīyārdham ekaikenākṣareṇāntaritaṃ nirgacchatīti
samañjaso 'yaṃ bandhaḥ || 70 ||
(samañjasabandho gūḍhārdhaślokaḥ)
(tilakam_)

lg.l: tatsenā ca tayā cakre sāsrākṣī damitā yudhā || 73 ||

div.p:
amitā yudhā bahalapaharaṇā sā ripuraṇe
māyārūpā mūrtīr asrākṣīn nirmitavatī | ripusenā ca tayā yudhā yuddhena damitā satī sāsrākṣī
sabāṣpanayanā kṛtā || 73 ||

sā caṇḍī seśāsu salokapālāsu āśāsu dikṣu śaṃ sukhena
pramathān_ śaśāsa vyāpārayat_ | sāśīrāśiṣāṃ padam_ | saśaṃsā stutiyuktā śiśusūr janavatsa
lā | sāśā jayābhilāṣiṇas tān syaty antaṃ nayatīti sāśasā | āśu śīghram_ | śaśīśaṃ
haraṃ śīyate gacchatīti śaśīśaśit_ | sāṃśur bhāsvarā | śaśān mṛgān śaśati plutibhir ga
cchatīti śaśaśāśī siṃhas taṃ suvati prerayati yā sā || 74 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ | yugalakam_)

pañcatāṃ maraṇam api
|| 76 ||

lg.l: sā saṃkhye svaḥsadāṃ śaśvad eva tārā dhanāyate |

div.p:
svaḥsado devāḥ | teṣāṃ sā samare nityam eva dhanāyate sarvasvamayāśā (?) | tārā
saṃsārottārakāriṇī | tena kāraṇenānyāsāṃ devānām ārādhanārthaṃ te matiṃ na vidadhuḥ || 77 ||

vīthīmārgamaṇḍalāni yuddhaśāstroktāḥ saṃcāraviśeṣāḥ | ākāśe tu vīthī surasaritpravāhaḥ |
mārgaḥ sūryasya panthā dakṣiṇottaralakṣaṇaḥ | maṇḍalaṃ raviśaśinor bimbam ābhogo vā || 78 ||

dantasya koṣaḥ pratimā | tam anaṅgadaṃ kaṭakaśūnyaṃ gajo vahan_ pariṇaman_ dantaprahārān dadat_
antakaś ca dviṣām ārād aśamanam apratividheyaṃ vyādhim akarot_ || 79 ||

lg.l: kubjāpy ekasya saṅgrāme caturasrāṃ śriyaṃ dadhau || 80 ||

div.p:
caturaśrā .........
manoharā ca || 80 ||

caṇḍyāḥ siṃhasya tanur aribhir jaghne tāḍitā | saruñjitaravā siṃha
nādayuktā | suraś cārisainyāni saruñji savyathāni vidadhuḥ | taravāribhiḥ khaḍgaiḥ || 81 ||

tatpuruṣatve tasyāḥ saṃbandhini pauruṣe sati yodhā vispaṣṭadvandvatāṃ prakaṭakalahatvaṃ yayuḥ | ta
tpuruṣaś ca samāso dvandvatvaṃ pratipadyata iti viruddham_ || 82 ||

āsu senāsu madhye rāhave
(daityaviśeṣāya) sā kupyantī adīpiṣṭa śuśubhe | tasyāś ca khaḍge sādī hayārohaḥ śriyam ā
have dadarśa | piṣṭāsuḥ pareṣāṃ visarita(vidalita)prāṇaḥ || 83 ||

lg.l: nānānīkānanaiḥ kiṃ nu pṛtanāsu na bhūbhṛtaḥ || 84 ||

div.p:
sā bhūbhṛtaḥ sutā
pārvatī raṇe tāsu pṛtanāsu dānavān kiṃ nu na yātā | niścitam eva yātetyarthaḥ | ānu(ru)ti
mātrāsu ninādaikaparāsu | aṅgāni hastyaśvarathapattayas teṣāṃ parakīyāṇāṃ nāśe rasaḥ sakti
s tatra tiṣṭhanti yās tāsu | tārakabhayottāraṇahetavaḥ sainyāḥ subhaṭā yāsāṃ tāsu | sā tu
nānāvidhair anīkānām ānanair bhāsitā | śobhane ca nyāse vyūharacanāyām ekaratā tatparā |
kṛttiś carma saiva vāsas tenopalakṣitā | sahāsavena pānena vartamānā yā attir bhakṣaṇaṃ tatra
kṛta āyāsaḥ samantād yatno yayā | ata eva susthā sukhena tiṣṭhantī | saraśanā kāñcī
yuktā | aṅganā kalyāṇāṅgī | ‘aṅgāt kalyāṇe’ iti nakāro matvarthīyaḥ | sutrāmā śakra
s tena cātinu(ru)tā asibhā khaḍgaśobhā yasyāḥ sā tathā || 84 ||
(pratilomānulomābhyāṃ ślokadvayam_ | tilakam_)

rasaḥ samarahevākaḥ śṛṅgārādiś ca | citraiś citrakāvyavadbhir api | śloko yaśo vṛttabandhaś ca |
sargaḥ sṛṣṭir vicchedasthānaṃ ca || 87 ||

sā raṇābdheḥ pāraṃ yiyāsu sadvairimaṇḍalam iyāyeti
saṃbandhaḥ | aṃśukānyeva sītāḥ sītālakṣitāḥ paṭāḥ | te copariplavānāṃ vātagatijñānāya
kriyante | rathā eva plavā uḍupāḥ | sāyāsāḥ sopadravāḥ | saha seyair avasādaneyair vartamānāḥ (?) |
sahāyasair nārācair vartamānāḥ | sāsūyāś ca yeyā yātavyā yāsu tādṛśīṣu pṛtanāsu satīṣu
rājitā | anumataś ca niṣeddhum aśakyo ravo yasyāḥ sā | tāmasānāṃ pāpaikaratānāṃ kāyā
n syati paryantaṃ nayati yā | sāyakeṣv āse ca prāse raso yasyāḥ sā | ārādhaḥ samārādhanaṃ
tasya dharā bhūḥ | sāranutā sajjanaiḥ pūjitā | ājiṃ rātīty ājirā saṅgrāmapradā | sāsiḥ
sakhagā | asūn suṣṭhu suvati pareṣāṃ prerayati yā sā | tathā śobhanaṃ ca yudhyata iti sayutsa
ṅgrāmanipuṇā | rājitetyādi ślokasya viparyayeṇa. pāṭhe ślokāntaraṃ jāyate | tatrānurasā
anukūlahevākā | sāraṃ syantīti sārasā ripavaḥ | tāmayanti parān khedayantīti tāmā
yodhās tatsamūhena nutā | śiṣṭaṃ spaṣṭam_ || 88 ||
(asaṃyogākṣarānekapāṭhanandikavartanaḥ (?))
(dvyakṣaraḥ | tilakam_)

mṛdhe raṇe
dāmodaram anukurvan_ | ānandenāmodena ca kusumādisaurabheṇa ranjito yo na kena
cij jitaḥ | sa daityo nāgaṃ gajam ārūḍho vipāṭhaiś ca śarair virasitaḥ | ............
granthaparamārthe bhramati | bhramaṇaṃ calanaṃ mohaś ca || 92 ||

lg.l: sa tayā nāgam ārūḍho vipāṭhair virasīkṛtaḥ |

div.p: (yugalakam_)

naiṣṭhuryeṇa samo
grāvā pāṣāṇo yasyāḥ sā caṇḍī savājibhiḥ sāśvair api vāsavena sahājiḥ sa
ṅgrāmo yeṣāṃ tair aribhir nāsahyata | yataḥ śaktyā samagrā pūrṇā || 94 ||

lg.l: tām abhīyus tamaskāṇḍakallolā iva te dviṣaḥ || 95 ||

div.p:
sādhvasenāvahata
āyāsaḥ prayatno yatra tathā kṛtvā te dviṣas tām abhiyayuḥ | tān atra raṇe sā saṃyātā | tama
skāṇḍaṃ timiranikaraḥ | kaskādir ayam_ | śita āsas tīkṣṇakuntaḥ sa eva ravis tatas trāso
yasyāḥ sakāśāt_ | avirasatāñchitā avarasyenāyatā | sotsāhetyarthaḥ | heti khede |
vasā asthirasas tasyādhvā mārgo 'sthīny eva tāni syati vināśayati yā sā || 95 ||

lg.l: sādhv asāv ahatāyāsaṃ saṃyātā ha vasādhvasā || 96 ||

div.p: (anulomapratilomapādaḥ pādādyantayamakaṃ ca)

tathā sajjātiḥ sujanmā | ekānaṃśeti bhagavatīnāma | sajjo vātireka utkarṣo yasyāḥ |
anaṃśā samāghātarahitā | ‘aśa samāghāte’ | atha ca satī vyatirekeṇa vidyamānā jātiḥ
sāmānyaṃ sā caikānaṃśā niravayavā sakṛdekatra nirdeśe 'py anyatra taṃ vināpi gṛhyate || 97 ||

ijyata iti yājo haras tasya jāyayā caṇḍyā yeye yātavye ripau yuyuje 'bhiyogaḥ kṛtaḥ |
jaye jāyum auṣadham iva yunakti yā tayā | yudhi jit_ tayā jyāyobhiḥ praśasyatarair yojyā
jyayayā ijyayā yāgena | ajeyayā jetum aśakyayā || 98 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ)

vidhunā tulyamānanaṃ da
dhatyā | praṇatānām aghāni ca pāpāni vidhunānayā nyakkurvatyā nayā sapatnasenāghāni nihatā |
saṃdohaḥ samūhaḥ || 99 ||

lg.l: sā dadhaty ānanaṃ tulyam aghāni vidhunānayā |

div.p: (yugalakam_)

sā dhūmrākṣasya daityasyodajāsayat_ hiṃsām akarot_ | ‘jāsi
niprahaṇa—’ iti karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī | parācīnaṃ parāṅmukham_ | aujasikas tejasvī || 101 ||

vigatena garuḍagāminā hariṇā tejitābhā satī sā devī ajite śatrau gavibhūmau nate
sati bhātā śuśubhe | sārābhā sudṛḍhaśobhā | vibhā dīptiḥ rāsaḥ śabdas tau vividhau
yasyāḥ | rājitam age parvate gataṃ gamanaṃ yasyāḥ | ājirā yuddhapradā ca || 102 ||
(sarvatobhadraḥ)

lg.l: natānām anatānāṃ ca samaṃ vyavahāra sā |

div.p:
ekeṣāṃ
natānām aurjityaṃ kṣayaṃ nivāsam anayat_ | nijagṛhe teṣām aiśvaryam akarod ityarthaḥ | anyeṣām ana
tānāṃ tu jīvitaṃ kṣayaṃ vināśaṃ nināyeti saṃbandhaḥ || 103 ||

lg.l: ahanyata balaṃ teṣāṃ sadā nagajayā tayā |

div.p:
sadā saṃtataṃ tayā nagajayā pārvatyā tadbalaṃ hatam_ | sadānaṃ samadaṃ gajānāṃ yātaṃ gamanaṃ yasyāḥ | tayā vīrāṇāṃ vā
hinyā ca bhrājitam_ || 104 ||

lg.l: āliṅgyata raṇe kīrtiḥ svarganārī ca tatkṣaṇam || 105 ||

div.p:
akalpaṃ kalpāntāvadhi | ākalpaś ca veṣaḥ || 105
||

tāretyādi viśeṣakam_ | sā vaiṣṇavī nāma devatā citraṇa yuddhaviśeṣeṇa (ā
yate) parāṃ śobhām asmayā garvaśūnyā satī babhāra | yā dviṣataḥ sakāśāt parāñci parāṅmu
khāni surasainyāni trāyate sma | kīdṛśī | taranty asmān mumukṣavaḥ śūrāś ceti tāro bhavasamudraḥ |
taduttāre tarī sūkṣmaḥ plavaḥ | tīratarubhis tasyanti tān ādāya pratipakṣānupakṣayaṃ nayantīti
tīratarutasaḥ | ‘tasu upakṣaye’ | tādṛśām arīṇām ītir upadravaḥ | saṃhartṛtvāt_ | uttarā udgata
vegā | arātibhī rāto datto ya urutaras tāraḥ plavanaṃ sa tīritaḥ samāpto yayā | yataḥ
ati......abhi...... || 107 ||
(ekāntaritadvyakṣaraḥ)

lg.l: dviṣataḥ surasainyāni parāñci trāyate sma yā |
sā babhāra śriyaṃ saṃkhye parāṃ citrāyate 'smayā || 109 ||

div.p: (tilakam_)

anijāḥ śatravaḥ teṣāṃ kāla
rātriḥ | jānujena javena janānūnānalpabalān ajījanajjanayāmāsa | anujananī bhūtānāṃ
karuṇāparatvād apareva mātā | sāpi janany eva | ajasyeva janasyaijanaṃ kampanaṃ jānānā |
paśum iva kampamānaṃ janaṃ manyamānetyarthaḥ | nijenājinena carmaṇopalakṣitā || 110 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ | yugalakam_)

samare brāhmī śriyam āsadat prāpeti viśeṣakam_ | adabhrā prabhūtā | anindya ity a
kārapraśleṣaḥ | dakṣāṇāṃ praguṇayodhānāṃ mānaṃ chyanti cchindantīti dakṣamānacchāḥ | tā
dṛśāḥ sādino yatra | bhramāgatagamānāṃ vistīrṇagatīnām āsādaḥ samantād avasādo yatra |
‘cho chedane’ ity asya pacāditvād ac_ | bhadrā gajaviśeṣās teṣām aśvānāṃ ketūnāṃ ca mālā
yatra | bhadrāśvaḥ ketumālaś ca parvataviśeṣau || 113 ||
(ardhabhramaḥ)
(tilakam_)

lg.l: kurvatīṃ viśikhais tāṃ sma ke tudanti niśāṃ tatām || 116 ||

div.p:
prāṃśavaḥ ketavo
dantinaś ca yatra tasmin raṇe śāntatām aprāptāṃ tāṃ ke tudanti sma na kecid avyathayan_ | yato
viśikhair vistīrṇāṃ niśāṃ kurvatīm_ | śaravarṣeṇa raver ācchāditatvāt_ || 116 ||

anyatheti |
prasiddhaviparītena prakāreṇa | hṛdayāni vidhyatīti hṛdayāvit_ | ‘nahi vṛtivṛṣi—’ iti
kvipi dīrghaḥ || 117 ||

lg.l: dviṣo vīkṣya raṇādbhītyā tuṣṭāva sarato nutām || 118 ||

div.p:
gīrvāṇāḥ surāstajjanatā raṇādbhayena dviṣaḥ sarataḥ palāyamānā
n ripūn ālokya tuṣṭā anu ca tadanantaraṃ tām aindrīm avasaratas teṣu teṣu prasaṅgeṣu nutām abhyupetya
tuṣṭāva stutavatī || 118 ||

araya eva palāyanaparatvena rallā mṛgās tadālīr alam atyarthaṃ sā
airirac cikṣepa | ralīlolā samaragoṣṭhīgṛghnuḥ | līlayā lunāti śatrūś chinattīti līlālūḥ |
rolasya samarasyollolair vilāsair lalāḥ savilāsāḥ | arālā īlyaḥ kṛpāṇikā yāsām_ |
......... || 119 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ | yugalakam_)

śikhaṇḍena kabarīkalāpena jitā picchasya śrīr yayā |
śaktir āyudhabhedaḥ || 121 ||

ahno dinasyāṣṭānām aṃśānām antare lakṣmīm aṇunā svalpe
nāpi gaṇasainyena sā ahnoṣṭa sthagitavatī | aśāntareṇunā mahārajaskena || 122 ||

śaṅkha
padmau nidhiviśeṣāv api || 123 ||

lg.l: dviṣacchiraḥ kandukaughaiḥ sāraṃsta na na tāpadam |

div.p:
sā tāpadaṃ sthiratarasāraṃ cārikulam āpadaṃ nayantī
stanābhyāṃ ca natā dviṣatāṃ śiraḥkandukanicayair nāraṃsta [iti na] || 124 ||

lg.l: tām abhīyāya garjantī yā tadā vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ || 125 ||

div.p:
tayā senayā
sā nekṣitā | yato yātayā bhayāt palāyitayā | nuttayā preritayā | tanu tūṣṇīṃ nutayā svaba
ndibhiḥ stutayā | āttarayair gṛhītavegaiḥ surair anviṣṭaḥ pāto 'bhibhavo yasyāḥ | senayā sasvā
mikayā || 125 ||

lg.l: natayā senayā tatra yātayā nuttayā tanu |

div.p: (murajabandhaḥ | yugalakam_)

agnir devatā yasyāḥ | ‘sarvatrāgnikalibhyāṃ ḍhak_’ iti ḍhak_
|| 127 ||

kaṭā eva kacchā gahanapradeśā yasyās tādṛgareḥ kariṇām eva sindhūnāṃ tatīr adhikaṃ
śirasi jale ca yayā bhinnā tāṃ yāmyām āsādya | kṛtapuṅkhaś ca śāstrakuśalo 'pi saṃhitaśaro vā
daityaloko na nyavartiṣṭa na punar āgataḥ | tayaiva hatatvāt_ | yādhikaṃ prabhūtaṃ kaṭakasya cchāyayā
śuśubhe | yamasyeyaṃ yāmyā | ‘yamāc ca’ ity aṇa || 128 ||

lg.l: saṃprāpya na nyavartiṣṭa yāmyāṃ yamapurīm iva || 129 ||

div.p: (yugalakam_)

lg.l: kīrtir jajñe samīkeṣu navaiva svatayāṃ tayā |

div.p:
yāmyā svatayā nija
tvena vaivasvatayātayā yamānusṛtayā bhṛkuṭyā na muktā || 130 ||

lg.l: vigarhyaḥ sa tam ārūḍho yayāv airāvataṃ satām || 132 ||

div.p:
airāvataṃ suraga
jam ārūḍhaḥ sa vidyujjihvo yayau | tayā dhiyā sātāṃ garhyo nindanīyo yathā śatruṣu vairam evā
vataṃso yasya tadbhāvaṃ dadhau | bhūṣaṇam iva vairaṃ dhṛtavān ityarthaḥ || 132 ||

tejasvimaṇḍalaṃ
sūryabimbam api | antardhir māraṇam adarśanaṃ ca | astā acalā yena || 133 ||

asta
āyāso yataḥ sā | tathā samāyeṣu cāpakṣapātinī yā | samā sarvatra suravarge samadṛṣṭiḥ |
ata evāpakṣapātinīti vā yojyam_ | nītipā nayapālinī | gaṇarecitaṃ gaṇair aśakyatvā
t tyaktam_ | taṃ daityaṃ yātā pratidhāvitā || 134 ||
(anulomapratilomārdho 'yam_)

maṇḍalaṃ puram api | tac cāgameṣu vāruṇyā
vṛttam uktam_ || 135 ||

lālitaṃ vidyutam elīlataivālātam ulmukaṃ yayā vāruṇyā | elī kṛ
pāṇikā | līlābhir lalitatā ramyatvaṃ tayā tatā vistīrṇā | tālaiḥ karatālais tālataru
vadvā uttālā udbhaṭā | tilatulā tilavattulitā viloḍitā ālulitā alitā ari
karma yuddhaṃ yayā | rephalakāraḍakārāṇām ekatvasmaraṇād evam uktam_ || 136 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ | yugalakam_)

vispaṣṭaṃ su
ndākhyasya daityasya rasitaṃ yāsu | kumudvaty astu sundaryaḥ sitāś ca bhavanti || 137 ||

sā
bhimānā manasvino raṇāṅgane rejuḥ | ṭaṅkā āyudhabhedaḥ || 138 ||
(kāñcībandhaḥ)

vāyavyā vāyur devatā yasyāḥ |
‘vāyvṛtupitruṣaso yat_’ | vāyave vā hitā vāyavyā | ‘gavādibhyo yat_’ | asyā api maṇḍalaṃ
vṛttam evoktam_ || 139 ||

sā kayā ripoḥ senayā soḍhā na kayācit_ | saṃkhyasahā saṅgrā
masahiṣṇuḥ | śātaṭaṅkayā tīkṣṇāyudhaviśeṣeṇa āśātaṭaṃ ca bāhulyena rundhānayā sthagayantyā
|| 140 ||

lg.l: sā dīpraparaśuḥ saṃkhye śriyaṃ vaināyakī dadhau || 141 ||

div.p:
analakāni nalakair alakaiś ca śūnyāni | nalakāni jaṅghāsthīni ||
142 ||

lg.l: sā jigāya dhvaneḥ krauryaṃ sāgarīyasya māyayā || 143 ||

div.p:
svanaśriyā dhvanadbhiś ca yodhaiḥ sā vaināyakī garīyasy abhūt_ | amā paricchedara
hitā | yayā svanaśriyā sā devī māyayopalakṣitā sāgarīyasya dhvaneḥ krauryam ajayat_
|| 143 ||

sūciromābhidhasya daityasya yā camūs tāṃ vaināyakīm abhyayuṅkta samāskanditavatī
sā tayā devyā tatra raṇe āse nirasteti viśeṣakam_ | asaṃkhyasaṃkhyā gaṇanātītasaṅgrāmā |
avadbhiḥ pālakair bhaṭaiś ca vṛtā | bhāseddhā pramayā samṛddhā | ahātaṃ tananam āsādayati labhate |
vistīrṇā yā māyā tāṃ dayante rakṣayanti ye mahādaityās taiḥ sevitā | ‘deṅ_ rakṣaṇe’ | sā
sahastatayā saprāsakaratvenāśāntasārā saṃtatotkarṣā | ahitasamidripubhiḥ saha raṇas tayā
yutā yuktā | sahasā balena ditāḥ khaṇḍitāḥ senānām ahitavāhinīnām āśā yayā | a
hitadyutā śatruśriyā yātānusṛtā | avitrastarāsā nirbhayasiṃhanādā | addhā niścitam eva |
sabhāmā sakrodhā | ‘bhāma krodhe’ || 144 ||
(prastāraślokaḥ)
(caturaṅgāśvapadapūraṇaślokaḥ | tilakam_)

lg.l: rundhatyā kukubhaḥ sarvā vikarṇair apy ajihmagaiḥ |

div.p:
tasya daityasya senayā sa
marabhūmer ālīya vinaśya lulāyāyino mahiṣagāmino yamasyālayaṃ bhavanaṃ yaye prayātam_ | vi
karṇaiḥ | śarair ajihmagaiḥ spaṣṭair diśaḥ sthagayantyā | atha ca vikarṇā bhujagā ajihmagā bhava
ntīti virodhaḥ | teṣāṃ kuṭilagatitvāt_ | līlāyāyibhir yayubhir aśvair ullolā yeyā abhi
gamyā yasyām_ | lāya ādānam arthād ripūṇāṃ tatra lolayā sābhilāṣayā | lāyo grahaṇaṃ
tadvatī gṛhyamāṇā lolūyā ripuviṣayā lavanecchā yasyās tayā | lāya iti ‘lī dravīkaraṇe’
ity asya caurādikasyāciprayogaḥ || 147 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ | yugalakam_)

pādapātibhiḥ padātibhis tato
vistīrṇo raṇo vavṛdhe | mārutir hanūmān_ | tatpakṣe pādābhyāṃ pātitas toraṇo yeneti yo
jyam_ || 149 ||

lg.l: śaktīr vahanto yaśasā navā yuyudhire citāḥ |
caklamuś cāsurā bhītyā na vāyuyudhi recitāḥ || 150 ||

div.p:
navāḥ śaktīr vahanto yaśasā citā dānavā yuyudhire yuddham akurvan_ | tathā
bhītyā mocitās tyaktā vāyuyudhi samīrapradhāne samare na klāntāḥ || 150 ||

lg.l: vineduḥ paruṣaṃ bheryo varūthinyaś ca saṃyuge || 151 ||

div.p:
uddāmavegair da
ṇḍair uddāmabhiś cocchṛṅkhalair vegadaṇḍaiḥ karibhir yathākramaṃ hatā bheryaḥ senāś ca paruṣaṃ vineduḥ || 151 ||

āsurī pṛtanā nānā bahuvidham ariṃ dhunānā sasāra yayau | tarjano ripūṇāṃ bhartsano yo
guṇasphoṭo jyābhighātas tena saha vartamānā dhīrā yodhagaṇā yasyām_ || 152 ||
(śaktibandhaḥ)

kā
likā meghamālā || 153 ||

lg.l: yudhi cakraṃ dviṣām āśu nīrandhrasamayaṃ viyat |

div.p:
dhrasā āyudhamedās tanmayam_ | meghaiś cotpāṭitair unmuktanīraṃ
viyatkarma ripucakraṃ kartṛbhūtaṃ cakāra | nīrandhrasamayam avicchinnaniścayam_ | viyat_ vividhaṃ
gacchat_ || 154 ||

sā vārāhī rarāsa ninādam akarot_ | rārāsā atyarthaṃ dīptās teja
svinaḥ | ‘rāsṛ dīptau’ | taiḥ saha vartate yā | sārasya balasyāram āgamanam asyanti kṣipanti
ye teṣāṃ sarā saratīti sarā upasarpikā | arasā nīrāgā | sārarā sasaṅgrāmā | saha
saraiḥ padātibhir vartamānam āram arisamūho yasyāḥ | āsānāṃ prāsānām āsāro vegād varṣaṇam arā
tiṣu yasyāḥ | rāsair nādaiḥ sarati yā | rasā bhūmir iva | sarvaṃsahatvāt_ || 155 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ | samudgayamakapratilomānulomagomūtrikamurajasvastikaśaktyādibandhāḥ)

lg.l: cāmuṇḍā baddhavairā sā jitārātir mṛdhe babhau || 156 ||

div.p:
mṛdhe raṇe
sā cāmuṇḍā lokottarayā rucā ruruce | sthirājiḥ saṃtataraṇā sā na bhavatīti virodhaḥ |
asthnāṃ rājibhiḥ sārā dṛḍheti tu vyākhyāyāṃ na virodhaḥ || 156 ||
(musalabandhaḥ)

lg.l: raṇe suradruhāṃ sainyaṃ tadāsa marutāṃ gaṇam |

div.p:
taddānavānāṃ sainyaṃ
marutāṃ gaṇam āsa cikṣepa | tadā śivā sṛgālī raṇasyāṅgaṇaṃ sthānam abhajat_ | asamarutā
prabhūtataraninadā || 157 ||

rājarājasya vaiśravaṇasyāstraiḥ sāre raṇe sā senā
śuśubhe | āsāro vegavadvarṣam_ | dānāmbu viṣpandata iti karmaṇyaṇ_ || 159 ||
(ślokābhyāṃ khaṅgabandhaḥ)

kācic camūḥ kṛṣṇayā śārvareṇa timireṇāgatayā śriyā śliṣṭā yudhyamānā ca satī svāminaḥ
sakāśād aparṇā apagataṛṇā babhūva | gaurīva | sāpi pracuraḥ śārvo harasaṃbandhī rāgo yasya
tadbhāvena śriyā śliṣṭā aparṇā ca nāmnā || 161 ||

atikrāntaṃ sahasrāṃśor navaṃ dhāma
tejo yeṣāṃ tādṛśān ṛṣīṃs tāpayanti dānavās tair nādīpyata na bhrājitam eva | vadhena hiṃsayāma
rṣitāṃ samatsaratvam avaśyam āpnuvadbhiḥ || 162 ||

lg.l: laṅkeva nair ṛtī reje yudhi trāsakarī dviṣām || 163 ||

div.p: yātavo rākṣasāḥ || 163 ||

varam utkṛṣṭaṃ
tadraṇaṃ pāṃsumayena tamasā nāmoci na muktam_ | yasminn asau khaḍge sthite sati śūrajano nāmna
ucitamaram atyartham akarot_ || 164 ||

uromaṇir lakṣaṇaviśeṣaḥ kaustubhaś ca | puraskāro 'grataḥ
karaṇaṃ pūjā ca | guravaḥ sthūlā hariś ca guruḥ sarvajanapūjyaḥ || 165 ||

anayā nair ṛtyā
vidviṣo ripūn āyāsayam ānayā khedayantyā rurunāmno daityasya senā hatā | ananyasamā
lokātītā | samāyā chadmaprahāriṇī | sayamā yamādhiṣṭhitā || 166 ||

lg.l: nāgair iva raṇād bhītair vineśe dānavāhibhiḥ || 167 ||

div.p:
dānavā evāha
yas tair vinaṣṭam_ | gajair iva | te 'pi dānavāhino madajalabhṛtaḥ | kalāpaḥ sainyasamudāyaḥ picchaṃ
ca | śikhaṇḍī nāma gaṇo mayūraś ca || 167 ||
meghanīlo nāma daityaḥ | meghaiś ca nīlaḥ || 168 ||
(atālavyaḥ)

lg.l: kṛtapuṅkhā bhaṭās tasya mārgaṇāś ca virejire || 169 ||

div.p:
śarair vyāptir digantācchādanaṃ śaravyasya ca lakṣyasyāptir upagamaḥ | kṛtapuṅkhāḥ śastrāstrakuśalāḥ
saṃhitāś ca (?) || 169 ||

lg.l: yena vyadhāyi svargo na nāśakro dhānuṣaṃ gataḥ |

div.p:
aśakraḥ svargo yena na vyadhāyi naṃ | api tu kṛta eva | sa
daityaḥ krauryaṃ gataḥ sandhānuṣaṃ nādam akarot_ | svasainikānāṃ nāśena yaḥ krodhas tadanuṣaṅgāt_
|| 170 ||
pattrabhaṅgo vāhanaviśe(śle)ṣaḥ pattracchedyaṃ ca || 171 ||

lg.l: ākṛṣṭā dhanuṣo dūraṃ jyā yasya dhvanitānavam |

div.p:
yasya jyā dhanur ga
ṇo 'navam apūrvaṃ dhvanitā | tena daityena jyāyasy api ripucamūr ājer adhvani saṅgrāmamārge tānavaṃ
nītā || 172 ||

lg.l: saṃkhye balibhujaṃ tatra navāyasam api krudhā |

div.p:
balinau bhujau yasya | navā āyasā... yasya | balibhukkākaḥ sa vā
yaso na bhavatīti ca virodhaḥ || 173 ||

lg.l: valgitais tatrasuḥ senā sāravair iva dhenavaḥ || 174 ||

div.p:
sārāṇāṃ vairiṇāṃ vadhena yo 'sya saṃrambho 'bhū
t sa iti lokottaraḥ | asya ca sāravaiḥ saśabdair valgitair dhenava iva senāstras tāḥ | ārava
iti ‘upasarge ruvaḥ’ iti ghañ ca na pravṛttaḥ | ‘kṛtyalyuṭo bahulam_’ iti bāhulakāt_ || 174 ||

anena meghanīlena dviṣaḥ senaiva nāyikā nunnā preritā satī nābhāji no |
api tu bhagnā sevitā ceti viśeṣakam_ | sahyo jetuṃ śakyaḥ parvatabhedaś ca | mahībhṛdrājā
parvataś ca sāmarthyāt sahya eva | anyathā virodhāsaṃgatiḥ syāt_ | balabhadro balena kalyāṇī
haladharaś ca | asīrī sādhu khaḍgena prerayati yo 'haladharaś ca | akūṭātmā nirvyājahṛdayo 'pa
rvatasvabhāvaś ca | tuṅgatvaṃ sābhimānatā samucchrāyaś ca | anilaval lolena | līlā eva ullolā
vīcayo yasya | lolayati parān palāyayatīti lolī tena | anūnānalenānalpena vahnineti
rūpakam_ | elyā ca lūnāni dviṣāmānanāny eva tucchatvān nalāni tṛṇaviśeṣā yena | ardha
candrāḥ śaraviśeṣā eva nakhāḥ | ardhacandrākhyāś ca nakhā nakhakṣatāni | abhiyogo 'va
skandaḥ surataṃ ca | abhīkena nirbhayena kāminā ca | abhājīti ‘bhañjaś ca ciṇi’ iti
nalope kṛte rūpam_ || 175 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ)
(tilakam_)

lg.l: kṣmā cāsīd iṣubhir bhinnapātālā tasya sā dhutā || 178 ||

div.p:
anukṛtaṃ krūrapātam alātam ulmukaṃ yena
tādṛśasya tatsaṃbandhinaḥ khaḍgasya sādhutā śreṣṭhatvam āsīt_ | sā ca bhūḥ śarabhinnapātālā
dhutā kampitāsīt_ | pātālam adhastano deśaḥ || 178 ||

prastārapratihārau prasāraṇakuṇḍalī
karaṇe prastārapratihārakādayaś ca sāmabhaktayaḥ | uktaṃ hi—‘āvāhalakṣma hiṃkāraḥ prasavaḥ
pratihārakaḥ | ............... sāmabhaktayaḥ ||’ iti | kariṇāṃ sāmajatvaṃ sāma......
karād utpatteḥ | kāraṇaguṇaprakrameṇa hi kāryotpattir dṛṣṭā || 179 ||
