tasminn apsarasāṃ dṛṣṭayaḥ
patitāḥ | atikrāntāḥ kalāvantaḥ kuśalā yena kalāvāṃś candraḥ | atiśayena ca yaḥ
kalāvān gītacitrādinipuṇas tatra yoṣitaś cakṣuṣprītim āsādayanti | tigmāṃśuvadvibhā dī
ptir yasya tādṛśenāsinā nivibhāsī nitarāṃ vidyotanaśīlaḥ || 180 ||

anekamukhatāṃ
bahūpāyatvaṃ caturānanatvaṃ ca | hater hananasya yugapatsamam eva yugānāṃ ca kṛtādīnāṃ paddhateḥ
kartā vidhāyakaḥ | kamalā lakṣmīs tasyā asano 'pahatī kamalāsanaś ca brahmā || 181 ||

vāyavīyāya vāyusaṃbandhine vayovyayāya śarīranāśāya yo 'suro yayau ... vayasā ca śarīraṃ la
kṣyate | vāśabdaś cārthe | ayāvyair akutsitair yayubhir aśvair yāti tacchīlaḥ | avyayāya niṣpratiba
ndhāya | vyeyo viśeṣeṇa eyaḥ | avayavī praśastāvayavaḥ || 182 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ)

tena saha saṅgrāmārthinī yā
ripusenā raṇājiram āpatsāñjasā spaṣṭam evāghāni nihatā | udrūḍhaṃ(rṇaṃ) bhramitam_ | ajarā udā
ttāś ca manasvino ye | pare ripavas teṣām apy ajayā jetum aśakyāḥ | añjanām agatā vyaktim aprāptāḥ |
bhayenādṛṣṭigocaratvāt_ | nighātāya ripuhataye āgamanaṃ yasyāḥ || 183 ||
(pratilomānulomārdhaḥ | yugalakam_)

saṃyuge
kriyāṃ vyāpāraṃ pratyakṣaṇiko rasikaḥ | tādṛśasyāpyasya krameṇa yugapad vā virodhaḥ ka
laho yan nābhavat tac citram āścaryam_ | kenacid api prakāreṇāmunā saha yoddhuṃ kaścid api na praga
lbho 'bhūd ityarthaḥ | atha ca virodho dhvanyate—akṣaṇikaḥ kālāntarasthāyī yas tasya krama
yaugapadyābhyām arthakriyāṃ prati virodhe 'nupapattir nābhavad iti | bauddhadarśane bhāvānām arthakriyā
kāritvam eva sattvam_ | yad āhuḥ—‘yad evārthakriyākāri tad eva paramārthasat_’ iti | tac ca kṣaṇa
sthitidharmaṇa eva bhāvasyopapadyate nākṣaṇikasya | tasya kramayaugapadyābhyāṃ tadvirodhāt_ |
tasya hi krameṇa tatkaraṇe ...... yugapat tataḥ kriyāyāṃ dvitīyasmin kṣaṇe tadabhāvāt_ ......
kriyāṃ kurvīteti saṃkṣepaḥ || 185 ||

spaṣṭasaṃghaṭṭā rathā yeṣāṃ te dānavasvāmino yatra
tādṛśaḥ samaro 'bhūt_ | athānantaraṃ ko bhramaro dānavāriṇe nāspṛhayat_ || 186 ||

lg.l: sehe na prasare daityaiḥ kṣayavāyor ivādribhiḥ || 187 ||

div.p:
tatra vīrabhadre dviṣaḥ kopāveśaṃ cakruḥ | śūratām āpnoti tac chīlas tasmin_ | dānavānāṃ ca
ṛtiṃ gatiṃ nivartayati yas tasmin_ || 188 ||

lg.l: paśyaty aricamūr dagdhuṃ na palālasamā na saḥ || 190 ||

div.p:
yaś caṇḍīśo bhītān hantum apalā
lasamānaso nirabhilāṣahṛdayaḥ | sa ripusenā dagdhuṃ palālena samā na paśyati na | tṛṇa
tulyā eva manute || 190 ||

lg.l: sa cakāra camūr yuddhe matimān avamā yayā |

div.p:
sa matimāṃs tayā atimānavam āyayā lokātīta
m āyayā camūr avamā adhogatijuṣaś cakre | yayā viśvam api vismayamayāsīt_ || 192 ||

bho
gina īśvarāḥ sarpāś ca | bhadrā gajaviśeṣā api || 193 ||

lg.l: sa dikṣu yaśasā lokān avācyo 'ṣṭāsu rañjayan |
na caklāma mṛdhe dhairyān na vācyoṣṭāsuraṃ jayan || 194 ||

div.p:
aṣṭāsu dikṣu lokān yaśasā
rañjayann ājau na pariśrāntaḥ | na vā dhairyād acyoṣṭa | avācyo 'nindyaḥ | āsuram asurasamū
ham_ | vāśabdaḥ samuccaye || 194 ||

yat sainyaṃ ruṣābhyāgatam ata etad duddam upatāpapradaṃ damayā
māsa | trimūrti mūrtitrayadhāraṇād brahmaṇā tulyam_ | madena medo yeṣāṃ tān dunoti yaḥ | u
ddāmena ca dāmna āmodena mudaṃ harṣaṃ dadat_ | mamādir ahaṃkārādis taṃ madhnāti yaḥ | adamo
nirupaśamaḥ | adat parān bhakṣayat_ || 195 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ | yugalakam_)

prahlādākhyasya daityasya tadā senācakraṃ
candramasā asevi yuddhāyābhiyātam_ | tato 'nantaraṃ tad evāse nirastam_ || 197 ||

rasād vī
rākhyād aśāntenānivṛttena | daśāḥ śatrūṇām avasthās tāsām antena vināśahetunā | kalāpinā
satūṇīreṇa | kalāś cāpnoti yas tena | vitatorasā vistīrṇavakṣasā || 198 ||
(saṃdaṣṭayamakam_ | yugalakam_)

jadhikama
ṇḍalau saṃpūrṇabimbau | parivrājakasya tu karo 'dhigatakamaṇḍaluḥ | evam ādau copamānopame
yayoḥ śabdamātreṇāpi sāmyasadbhāvād upamātvaṃ cintyam_ || 199 ||

bhagnaprabhāvaraṇaṃ yasya
tādṛśaṃ tad daityacakram abhūt_ | aśvi turagānvitam api | sāndraprabhaivāvaraṇaṃ yasya tad indubimba
m aśvitat_ vyadyotiṣṭa | ‘śvitā varṇe’ | ity ato ‘dyudbhyo luṅi’ iti luṅi parasmaipade ‘pu
ṣādi—’ iti sūtreṇa cleraṅādeśaḥ || 200 ||

saṃyugasyotkarṣeṇa bhairavair bhīṣaṇais tridaśānā
m asurāṇāṃ ca maṇḍalair yudhi diśaḥ pūritāḥ | prāvṛṣīva | tatra tu saṃyugaiḥ saṃgatahalāṅgair utkaiś ca
ṛṣabhair dāntair diśaḥ pūryante ravair ninādaiḥ | vṛṣabhā api tisṛṣu daśāsu śaiśavādikāsv asuraṃ prāṇa
pradaṃ maṇḍaṃ poṣaṇārtham ācāmaṃ lānti || 201 ||

ḍāmarāḥ śūrās taducitaiḥ sainyair asurādhipāḥ
śriyam āsadan prāpuḥ | taiś cāroci bhrājitam_ | uccair unnata āsāya kṣepaṇāya daṇḍo yasyās tāṃ
tṛṇatāṃ kuntajātīyam āyudhaṃ dadhānaiḥ || 202 ||

amalena kīnāśena yamena āmalakīnāṃ
ca nāśena śūnyām_ || 203 ||

tena daityena dviṣāṃ senā navaṃ tāmasaṃ krodhamañjasā spaṣṭam ā
veśi praveśitā | avatām ātmānaṃ rakṣatām_ | asamañjasā viśarāruḥ || 204 ||

sa āmardako gaṇo 'sya śarabhasya dūramastaṃ kṣiptam atra raṇe śaranikaraṃ bhīdasya bhayapradasya
raṇagajasya totratāṃ khedakaraṇāt pratodatvaṃ gatam astambhīn niruddhavān_ | tāṃ śatrusenām asyato
nirākurvataḥ || 206 ||
harayo 'śvāḥ siṃhāś ca | kūbarī rathaḥ || 207 ||

lg.l: so 'vait kṣatiṃ dviṣāṃ tasminn avācām antike sthitām |
prāptaṃ yodhaṃ śivaughāḥ sma navācāmanti ke 'sthitām || 208 ||

div.p:
sa ketus tasmi
n samare ripūṇāṃ kṣatim antike sthitām āsannām avaidajñāsīt_ | avācām adhomukhānām_ | ke vā
śivānāmoghā yodham asthitāṃ karaṅkaśeṣatvaṃ prāptaṃ nācāmanti sma sarva eva bubhujire || 208
||

sa nā puruṣo lalāṭenāṣṭāpadaṃ caturaṅgaphalakam anukurvan raṇabhuvam āyatām āgacchatāṃ
ripūṇām āyatāṃ dīrghām āpadamasoṣṭa janitavān_ | tuṅganāsaḥ samunnataghoṇaḥ || 210 ||

lg.l: tataḥ krauryodadher dīrghaiḥ srotobhir iva māninām |
nistriṃśair vyāptadikcakram abhyaid bhūr jaṭir āhavam || 211 ||
durutsahatvaṃ saṅgrāme na vāhinyā sa kṛcchrayan |

div.p:
sa dhūrjaṭir vāhinyā senayā asurasamūhaṃ kṛcchrayan parikliśnan na vyaraṃsīt_ | durutsahatvaṃ śrayan du
rabhibhavatvaṃ bhajan_ | navaṃ cāhīnāṃ sarpāṇāṃ nyāsaṃ hārādiracanāṃ karoti yaḥ || 212 ||
virūpāṇi viṣamāṇi vikṛtāni ca | kṣveḍā dhvaniviśeṣaḥ kṣveḍaṃ ca viṣam_ || 213 ||

sa
śaṃbhuraurasasya sūnoḥ kumārasya sīriṇaś cerāṃ bhuvaṃ sasāra | saṃsārārir bhavocchettā | sasārau
sotkarṣāv ūrū yasya | sūrir vidvān_ | aseḥ sāreṇa balena ruṇaddhīti kvip_ | sasiraṃ kaṇṭha
nāḍīh pūrayitvā rāsasūḥ siṃhanādakṛt_ | aram atyartham_ || 214 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ)

nityaḥ sanātanaḥ | a
ñjano nīlapītādirūpeṇa vyaktaḥ | upayujyata ity upayogaḥ sarvopakārī upagatasamādhir vā |
tathāvidhena yena śatrustraiṇāny anarmāṇi krīḍāśūnyāni kṛtāni | nayanānīva | tāny api ni
tyabhañjanasyopayogenānarmāṇyākhyarogarahitāni kriyante || 215 ||

sa haro jaṭābaddha
vāsukiḥ sāravāsu ripusenāsvātatāṃ kirātatām avahat_ | pureva yathā kirātārjunaraṇe |
kirātatā hiṃsakatvaṃ śabararūpatā ca | na cāndhakakṣayāt kirātārjunayuddham avarakālam iti
purevety asaṃgatiḥ śaṅkyā | ‘na kadācid anīdṛśaṃ jagat_’ iti nītyā kirātārjunavirodha
syāpi tataḥ pūrvam abhinivṛtatvāt_ || 216 ||

vahnigarbhasya yā camūḥ sā tu vibhunā hara
gajeneha samare 'hani divasa eva hatā | ata eva hariṇaiḥ saha gavi bhūmau vigatā samupa
viṣṭā | sāyāsā sayatnāpi | bhuvi bhūmadhye sārāsā samutkṛṣṭakuntā || 217 ||

lg.l: hariṇair iha sākaṃ sā sāyāsā vigatā gavi |
vibhunā bhuvi sārāsā tuṅgā tu nihatāhani || 218 ||

div.p: (prātilomyena sa evārthaḥ | yugalakam_)

īśāno haraḥ āśānanāni diṅmukhāni viśikhair aniśaṃ saṃtataṃ nānaśe na, vyāptavān eva |
luṅkhitaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ | śiśunā bālena śaśinā nāsty aṃśunāśo yasya | ata eva niśo rātre
r anūnaḥ | nānāṃśo bahuvidhāvatāraḥ | nā puruṣaḥ | pauruṣavān ityarthaḥ || 219 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ | yugalakam_)

satī mātrā sainyādisāmagrī yasya tādṛg acyuto harir yatra maṇḍale......paro 'rthaḥ saṃpadyate
yathā—‘niyatam agamyam avaśyaṃ bhavati kila trasyatoraṇopāntam_’ iti | andhako daityaḥ |
andhayatīty andhakaṃ ca gūḍhakriyāpadādi | yathā—‘ātāmrair āmrapadair navodgatair yāmavatīruci
tām_ (?) | tām adhunaiva smṛtvā mama hṛdayaṃ dīryate śatadhā ||’ iti || 221 ||

jīvitam eva
dhanaṃ muṣṇantaṃ ripuṃ sa bhagavāñ jaghāna | vicitrā aṃsakau skandhabhuvi śobhamānā mālā
yasya | sakusumāś cālakāś cūrṇakuntalā yasya tādṛśaṃ savyaṃ vāmaṃ dehārdhaṃ bhartā dhārayitā
|| 222 ||

īśitā vibhus tā ripūṇāṃ ketumatīḥ senāḥ śataśas taiḥ śarair atutta vyathayāmāsa |
utpātadaśā api ketumatyo 'niṣṭasūcakajyotiṣmatyaḥ | śātitāśaḥ śatrūṇāṃ ghātitamano
rathaḥ | atītāśīrāśāsyābhāvāt_ | śiśuḥ śītāṃśur yasya tadbhāvenātato vyāptaḥ | tottā
ripūṇāṃ vyathakaḥ | aśitā yajñādiphalasya bhoktā | āśāsvatanti saṃtataṃ gacchantī
ty āśātair diṅmukhaprasāribhiḥ | śitais tīkṣṇaiḥ || 223 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ | yugalakam_)

viśikhāvaliḥ śara
paṅktiḥ | viśikhāsu ca rathyāsu balir upahāraḥ || 225 ||

lg.l: tadā kṣaṇena vīryasya samadaḥ sahitaḥ padam |

div.p:
tadā bhagavān reje | vīryasya padaṃ
sthānam_ | samadaḥ sābhimānaḥ | sahito hitakārī | stuto nayo yasya | yataḥ sākṣānnayaṃ
vetti | kṣatāmataḥ kṣapitaripuḥ | ataḥ ślokāt kvacin mātrāviparivṛttau ślokāntaram utpa
dyate tasyārthaḥ—varyasya prārthanīyasya padam_ | tataḥ sarvaṃ labhyata ityarthaḥ | samaśabdaḥ sarva
paryāyaḥ | yathā samarājyaṃ vartata iti | samam asti yeṣāṃ te saminaḥ sarveśvarā daityās tā
ny ati khaṇḍayati yaḥ | sahataś ca sahiṣṇoḥ padam_ | sahiścurādiḥ ‘ādhṛṣād vā’ iti vikalpi
taṇickaḥ | astas tyaktastanayo 'ndhako yena | andhakasya tatputratvāt_ | nayasya vede jñāne
sati kṣatāmatir nihatakubuddhiḥ | athavaivaṃ viparyayaḥ—īkṣaṇena varyasya padaṃ darśanamātreṇā
bhīṣṭapradaḥ | sāmadaḥ sāmāni rakṣati | ‘deṅ_ rakṣaṇe’ | sahatiḥ saha śatruhiṃsayā vartate |
stutir nayo yasya | nayavādenokṣitaṃ siktaṃ srutam amṛtaṃ yena saḥ | anayaiva diśān yad apy atra samabhyūhyam_ || 226 ||
mātrāpahāradānābhyāṃ yatheṣṭābhyāṃ ślokadvayam_—

ślathaṃ pataccakram āyudhaṃ yasya tādṛśaṃ vajranāgaṃ(bhaṃ)
dhuraṃ yasya | ślathaṃ ca cakraṃ rathāṅgaṃ yasya | tādṛśavegavattvān manaḥsadṛśaṃ ratham akarod iti dhva
nitam_ || 229 ||

amuṃ bhagavān vajrabāhum amāyaṃ kṛtvā iyāya | mayākhyasya daityasya mā
yaivāmayo rogas tadāyāmaṃ mīnāti hinasti tacchīlaḥ | ‘mīñ_ hiṃsāyām_’ | mamamayo 'haṃ
kāramayaḥ | ayamo 'dvitīyaḥ | yeyo yoginām abhigamyaḥ | ameyā aparicchedyā yamā
ahiṃsāsatyāsteyādayo yogāṅgāni yasyās tayā comayā gauryā upalakṣito yeyo vā || 230 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ)
veṇīśabdena samarāt palāyamānasya daityasya strītvaṃ dhvanyate || 231 ||

tasminn īśvare maṇḍa
lībhiś carati sati te daityabhaṭās tatrasur bhītāḥ | kṛpayā apākṛte tyakte | dhyānibhir nidhyāte
parabrahmarūpatvāt_ | nirditā niḥśeṣeṇa khaṇḍitā ardino hiṃsakā yena || 232 ||
(śūlabandhaḥ)

sa hara
s triśūlena sūcilomākhyaṃ daityam avadhīt_ | śūlasya ca tisraḥ śākhā iti trayāṇāṃ purāṇāṃ
dāhacihnam etat_ | vividhānām ādhīnāṃ vadhe dhīvāprājñaḥ | vidhair api vedhāḥ sraṣṭā | dhavānāṃ
puruṣāṇām avadhiḥ | tadvyatirekeṇottamasya puruṣasyābhāvāt_ | dhiyaṃ dhāvati deśanābhiḥ śu
ddhīkaroti yaḥ | vadhvā vīvadhī dhartā | vinā garuḍena vāti gacchatīti vivo viṣṇus ta
m evaidhayati mānena vardhayati yaḥ | vidhuṃ ca dhatte bibharti yaḥ || 233 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ | yugalakam_)

lg.l: nijadhāna raṇe senāsv asau duścyavano balam |

div.p:
asau
haraḥ senāsu sthitaṃ balaṃ jaghāna | duṣṭaṃ cyavanaṃ ripūṇāṃ pāto yasmāt_ | vipulo mahānu
mātmaje guhe ādaro yasya | duścyavanaḥ śakraḥ sa balāsuraghātī kathaṃ pulomātmajāyāṃ
śacyāṃ vigatādara iti virodhaḥ || 235 ||

lg.l: yaś cakāra dviṣe kupyann avaktrāsavatāṃ sabhāḥ |

div.p:
yaś ca tiṣṭhate yuddhāyāgacchate dviṣe kupyann ava
ktrāsavatāṃ mukhāsavaśūnyatvaṃ tasyaiva cakāra | śiraśchedakaraṇāt_ | sabhāḥ sadīptiḥ | asau
haras trāsavatāṃ sabhā bhītapariṣado nyāyānavak_ evaṃ yudhyadhvam iti yuktīr avādīd eva | a
nyathā nyāyānavak_ | yato 'sau na tiṣṭhate na | api tu vivād apade nirṇayaṃ karoty eveti sthe
yākhyāyāṃ taṅ_ syāt_ || 236 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ)

yas tuṣārādrir iva rājate taṃ nīlalohitaṃ haraṃ ketubā
hor daityasya sainyam apaśyat_ | yaś ca prahāramūrcchitaḥ sa sarvaṃ nīlalohitaṃ paśyati | garasya viṣa
syāgārāṇi gṛhāṇi ye uragās tair ugramuro vakṣo madhyabhāgaś ca yasya | gauryaṃ rāgī vyasanī
vatsalaś ca | gaurāḥ śubhrā aguravas tarubhedā yāsāṃ tathāvidhā girīrāḥ parvatabhuvo gacchati
śrayati yaḥ | arer gaur vajra iva | himavāṃs tu dviṣo gaus tatra palāyyāvasthānād āspadam_ | gu
rūn mahato bhaktānāṃ rogān rujati yaḥ | nāgā bhujagā gajāś ca | kaṭakāḥ kaṅkaṇāni kaṭa
kaś ca madhyabhāgaḥ | guhaḥ kumāro guhāś ca khadāḥ | śiraḥprabhṛtibhir aṅgair dhāraṇāt īśitāspa
dam aiśvaryasya sthānaṃ himān īśatāspadaṃ ca | akṣayo jñānalābho yasyāḥ | dhvastā dakṣayajñe
'nalasyābhā yayā || 237 || 238 || 239 || 240 ||
(cakkalakam_)

kulāni samūhā gṛhāś ca | satī
dharmād anapetā harmyāṇāṃ ca sthitir yatra | rathyās turagā mārgāś ca | raṇe kṛtāntasya saṃnihita
tvāt tena nagataṃ(raṃ) viveśitam_(niveśitam_) || 241 ||

māyayā avasitā jñātā raṇe
coṣitā sthitā taccamūḥ krūratām āyayau | asibhis toṣitā hlāditā || 242 ||

navānā
m arīṇāṃ damanas tasya rathaḥ śuśubhe | śaratkāla iva | tatra tu nāsti vāridānāṃ manora
tho 'pi || 243 ||

mamatyahaṃkāras tamasyantīti mamāsā nirabhimānās teṣu samīmāṃsaṃ savi
cāraṃ bhagavān āsāmāsa sthitavān | sahomayā somena ca śaśinā vartate yaḥ | samāṃse māṃ
sale aṃse yasya | somaṃ mīnanti somamāḥ ṛtuvighātinas tān asyati yaḥ | asamo loko
ttaraḥ | asimān sakhagaḥ | suṣṭhu ca sāma sāntvaṃ vedaṃ vā sūte yaḥ || 244 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ)

maṇḍalāgraṃ
bimbasya koṭir api | ekapiṅgalo vaiśravaṇaḥ | ekaś ca piṅgalaḥ kaścid anucaraḥ | bhāsvān ra
vir api | udgataṃ lāghavaṃ yeṣām_ | ullāghaś ca roganirmuktiḥ | sā vidyate yasmāt_ | ‘ārogyaṃ
bhāskarād icchet_’ iti vacanāt_ || 245 ||

sa haro nā puruṣottamas tanayena śobhitaḥ śauryam a
bhito vistārayāmāsa | sanātanaṃ nityaṃ yaśo yatra tam_ || 246 ||

tasya śaṃbhoḥ kākṣeṇa rūkṣa
kuṭilayā dṛṣṭyā dṛṣṭair uror daityasya sainikair irā yuddhabhūr aribhiś cakrair abhāri pūritā | bhīrorair bhayada
ridraiḥ | bhābhair nakṣatranibhaiḥ | bhareṇerayanti parān kṣipanti ye | rurur mṛgas tasyeva capalatayā rīr ga
tir yeṣām_ | ata evorabhrābhā meṣair iva śobhā yasyās tāṃ ruciṃ bibhrati ye | urū mahāntau
ūrū yeṣāṃ taiḥ || 247 || 248 ||
(yugalakam_ | dvyakṣaraḥ)
kalāpinas tūṇino mayūrāś ca || 249 ||

sajjaḥ saṃ
nihitaṣ ṭaṅkaḥ śobhā ravaś ca nādo yeṣāṃ tair aribhiḥ saṃkule raṇe śobhanajaṭaṃ tadīyaṃ vapuḥ ka
riṇā gajāsureṇa karavāribhiḥ siktam_ || 250 ||

lg.l: dānavānāṃ ruṣā sainyaṃ daityānāṃ ca yuyutsu tat |

div.p: (dvyakṣaraḥ)

dānavānām ityādi viśeṣakam_ | asya
harasya sā camūr asurair nāsahyata | yayā ayaṃ haro jaladhir ivāsurāṇāṃ sainyaṃ bhūyo bahutaram a
bhibhūya bhūyaś ca punar bhāyayann abhiyayau saṃmukhaṃ jagāma | yo bhūyeyo bhuvā bhūlokena śraddhayā
bhigamyaḥ | abhayayāyināṃ śaraṇāgatānām ibhyaḥ svāmī | ibham arhatītībhyaḥ | ‘daṇḍādibhyo
yaḥ’ | abhībhayaḥ abhiyā ibhena yāti yaḥ | abhayaṃ nirbhayaṃ kṛtvā | bhābho nakṣatrakā
ntiḥ | kṣamābhṛtaḥ parvatā api || 251 || 252 || 253 ||
(tilakam_)

sa haraḥ saṅgrāmanabhasy āśu
tvaritam udaid ujjagāmeti viśeṣakam | yadīyasenā daityān diśo 'bibhramadbhramayāmāsa | aśo
citā kṛtakāryatvāt_ | vibhramadaśāyāś cocitā ripunārī yena na kṛtā || hārdaṃ, mūrtam a
surādi, naiśaṃ ceti triprakāraṃ tamaḥ | bhāsvān ravir api | so 'pi lokatrayavartitvena trivi
dham andhakāraṃ hanti | daśānām āśānāmādeśāḥ pradeśās tān dayate rakṣaty ādeśo yasya | ‘deṅ_
rakṣaṇe’ | śaśidaṃśo rāhus taddaśāśinau doṣau bāhū yasya | śaśadaṃśā vā vyāghrādayaḥ |
deśī dātā upadeṣṭā vā | śaṃdadat_ śreyaskaraḥ | udaṃśuṃ śaśinaṃ dayate rakṣati yaḥ | śadī
yodhavān_ | śīyante parān avasādayantīti śadā yodhāḥ || 254 || 255 || 256 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ | tilakam_)
yugapat_ hatis tāḍanaṃ yāsām_ | yugānāṃ ca kṛtādīnāṃ paddhatīrvyavasthāḥ || 257 ||

lg.l: pidadhur mārgaṇās tasya tam īśaṃ kāñcanocitāḥ |
chāyayā na vyadhur vyomni tamīśaṅkāṃ ca no citāḥ || 258 ||

div.p:
tasya
daityasya śarās tam īśaṃ bhagavantaṃ pidadhur asthagayan_ | kāñcanair ucitāḥ samavetāḥ | ‘uca sama
vāye’ | chāyayā ca citā vyāptāḥ | tamīśaṅkāṃ niśābhrāntiṃ na no cakruḥ | akurva
nn eva || 258 ||

tasya saṃbandhināṃ pratiyoginām arīṇāṃ sainyena nākavadācaritam_ | rave
r yataṃ gamanaṃ yatra || 259 ||

lg.l: śaravṛṣṭiṃ dviṣaḥ prāptāṃ sa viṣehe tu tāmitaḥ |

div.p:
sa tu haraḥ śatroḥ sakāśād āgatāṃ śaravṛṣṭiṃ viṣehe soḍhavān_ |
tāmitaḥ krodhitaḥ | ‘mitāṃ hrasvaḥ’ ity atra vety anuvṛtter atra hrasvābhāvaḥ | yadivā tāṃ śaravṛṣṭi
mito 'smād areḥ prāptāṃ viṣehe iti yojanā | saviṣe sakālakūṭe | hetutayā trijagatkāra
ṇatvena hetunā amito 'paricchinnaḥ || 260 ||

ghanāghano vivarṣur meghaḥ | pṛṣatkā binda
vo 'pi | uktaṃ ca—‘pṛṣatkabindupṛṣatāḥ pumāṃso vipruṣastriyaḥ’ iti | rājahaṃsā rājendrā
haṃsabhedāś ca || 261 ||

lg.l: nūnaṃ nāgān nagenena gaganaṃ gāṃ nagān agān || 262 ||

div.p: (dvyakṣaraḥ)

anena vibhunā guptāpi harivāhinī vāsavasenā suketunāmnā surā
riṇā daityena vegenāgatyāse nirasteti viśeṣakam_ | nagnānugena digambarasahāyena | anūnā
gnir bahalavahnir gaur vilocanaṃ yasya | anu paścādgāmino gāyanā yasya | nagasya kailāsasya na
gāyā vā gauryā inena svāminā nūnaṃ niścitam_ | nāgān_ gajān_ gaganaṃ gāṃ bhuvaṃ nagā
n girīn_ agāṃś ca tarūn_ śaraiḥ pūrayatā | kutra senā nirastety āha—saha māraṇena vartate yat_ |
asamaś ca grāsaḥ pareṣāṃ kavalīkaraṇaṃ yatra | asamānaṃ ca lokottaraṃ yat tādṛśe raṇe | senā
ca samagrā sakalā | asamā ananyasadṛśī | samānāś cāhaṃkāriṇa ibhā yasyāḥ | ariṇā
cakreṇa bhāsurā ca | bhāsuram ari cakraṃ vā yasya surāreḥ || 262 || 263 || 264 ||
(tilakam_)

lg.l: nādi nādau na nunude nūnaṃ nānaudanādinā || 266 ||

div.p:
sa
suketur anenānaṅgaketunā smaradhvaṃsakena hareṇa nā pauruṣavān api ādau prathamam eva na nunude na
raṇe praviṣṭamātra eva nirākṛtaḥ | ādinā pradhānena | adīneṣu śūreṣu nodo nivasanaṃ
yasya | nidānena hetunā ūnena rahitena | nityatvāt_ | nādinā nādavatā | nūnaṃ niści
tam_ | nānāvidhamodanaṃ viśvātmakamatti tacchīlena | bhagavataḥ saṃhārakatvāt_ || 265 ||
266 ||
(yugmam_ | dvyakṣaraḥ | pādādyantayamakaṃ ca)

suparvaṇo daityasya vāhinī senā tena sāyakānāṃ samūhaiḥ pratisrotaḥ pratīpaṃ nītā |
timiraṃ tamo dīptimattvād aśnanti ye taiḥ | visphurantaḥ kūle nikaṭe kuñjarā yasyās tādṛśā
ājir yasyāḥ | visphurantyaḥ kuleṣu kuñjānāṃ rājayo yasyās tādṛśī ca vāhinī nadī ti
mīnāṃ rāśibhir upalakṣitaiḥ śarasy āmbhasaḥ pravāhaiḥ pratisroto 'parasyāḥ sravantyāḥ pravāhaṃ
nīyate || 267 ||

lg.l: jaghāna ca vinighnaṃ taṃ vinighnantaṃ sa bhāsuram |

div.p:
sa haraḥ sabhāsu nākaṃ rañjayan_ jayaṃś ca taṃ daityaṃ jaghāna | vinighnantaṃ
tāḍayantam_ | bhāsuraṃ dīptam_ | ākampivigrahaṃ bhayena calaśarīram_ || 268 ||

lg.l: kurvaṃs tasya bhaṭān saṃkhye javād āpatito 'tha saḥ || 269 ||

div.p:
sa haras tasya
daityasya bhaṭān_ jujūre jaghāna | ‘jūrī hiṃsāgatyoḥ’ | saha cchedakrameṇa vartamānaṃ śīrṣaṃ
śiro yasya tādṛśam ariṃ kurvan_ | koṭṭaprākāram iva | tatra tu sacchedāni bhaṅgīyuktāni
aśvatthapattrākārāṇi kramaśīrṣakāṇi yuddhasthānāni kriyante | yad uktam_—‘kramaśīrṣakaiś cā
śvatthapattrasaṃsthānair ekārāntai(?)r ācitāgram_’ iti | kauṭilyas tu—‘murujakaiḥ kapiśīrṣakai
ś cācitāgram_’ iti bruvāṇas tāni kapiśīrṣakāṇīti manyate | rājarājasya dhaneśasyājau
rorujām atyarthaṃ vyathakatvam arjayanti ye tān api rujanti ye pravīratarās tān nujan_ sa ca ra
rāja | ojaś ca vīryam arer ārjijat_ avajahāra | ruror daityasyor jaṃ balaṃ jvarati bhanaktīti
kvip_ | ‘jvaratvarasṛvyavimavām_’ iti saṃprasāraṇadvayam_ | ajo nityaḥ | urur mahān_ || 269 ||
270 ||
(yugmam_ | dvyakṣaraḥ)

tasya harasya senāyāḥ prahaṇanaiḥ prahārair daityānāṃ cetohāri cittaharaṃ kṛtibhiś ca
yuddhakuśalair yuktaṃ yuddham āsīt_ | suratam iva | tad api kartarīprabhṛtibhir āghātaiś cetohāri sundaraṃ
sītkṛtibhiś ca sītkāraiḥ sahitam_ || 271 ||

sa haro heter āyudhasyāśritaḥprāntād gaccha
ntyā jvālayā hetubhūtayā bhayānakayā surāṇāṃ sabhayā parṣadā kayā nāśritaḥ śatrubhayād iti
viśeṣakam_ | pratyastraiḥ pratipakṣāyudhaiḥ śastraiś ca yudhyate yaḥ | hārī ruciro hārāhir yasya |
aṃhohiḥ pāpapradhāno vṛtrāsuras tasya rāhor grasanapravṛttasya harer indrasya raṃhorihā vegenāriṃ
hatavān_ | haraharā sādhuvādas tasyāra āgamanaṃ yatra tathā kṛtvā āhantīty āhas tāḍakaḥ |
‘anyeṣv api dṛśyate’ iti ḍaḥ | rū(ro)ruhāv atyarthaṃ prasarantāv ūruruhau jaṅghākāṇḍe yasya saḥ |
ahahīti vismaye || 272 || 273 || 274 ||
(tilakam_ | dvyakṣaraḥ)

krūraṃ niṣkṛpaṃ balaṃ sainyam_ | akrūrā
khyaś ca vṛṣṇiḥ | balo haladharaḥ | śauryeṇa śauriṇā ca kṛṣṇenācitāṃ vyāptām_ || 275 ||

sa śivaḥ śuśubhe | samān akhilān dānagajān āmṛdnāti yaḥ | samadān sābhimānān asyati yaḥ
(kvibantaḥ) | nagajāmato gaurīpriyaḥ | parāmarśo bādhaḥ | pareṣām āmayo vyādhiḥ || 276 ||
(tūṇībandhaḥ)

dānavā rudrasya darād bhītyā meror darīr ādadire jagṛhuḥ | durdārā vidārayitum aśakyā dordravo
bhujataravas teṣām udareṇa kūpareṇa duvanti ye ......... | duddā upatāpapradā ye 'rayas teṣāṃ
rodaṃ rodanaṃ rānti dadati ye || 277 || 278 ||
(yugmam_ | dvyakṣaraḥ)

lg.l: vidviṣo 'kṣṇā dahann ārāt syandanena raṇe bhraman || 279 ||

div.p:
sa haraḥ kailāsādrir iva śuśubhe | vāme
dakṣiṇe ca bhāge tiṣṭhati na yat tena cakṣuṣā dviṣā dahan_ | avāmo 'nukūlo dakṣiṇasthaḥ
sārathir yasya tādṛśena rathena bhraman_ savasau vasvākhyasurasahite | valibhas trivalīsanātha
auma umāsaṃbandhī bhāgo yasya | ‘tundivalivaṭer bhaḥ’ | balinaś ca bhaumā mahī gṛhā yasmin_ |
arko ravir arkāś ca sphaṭikāḥ || 279 || 280 ||
(yugalakam_ | samañjasabandho gūḍhacaturthaḥ)

sā ca kṣmā kṣitir gaṇānām apakṣayo yatra
tādṛśi raṇe cakṣmāye dudhuve | ‘kṣmāyī vidhūnane’ | sthāvarāṇām apy aviratā atiśayena bhīr ya
syām_ | kṣapaṇaṃ gaṇānāṃ hiṃsanamevāgo daityānām aparādhas tena yā gaṇānāṃ bhītis tayā tāre
virāve tiṣṭhati | yā tasatyaṅṅantītyarthaḥ (?) || 281 || 282 ||
(anulomapratilomārdhaḥ | yugmam_)
(dvyakṣaraḥ)

yo yudhi raṇe yodhyaṃ ripum adhya
yūyudhat_ adhikaṃ yodhayāmāsa | sa haraḥ śarair labdhaśalabhākhyaprāṇicchāyam iva viyanmārgam aka
rod iti viśeṣakam_ | vigatasya dhūmasyāśleṣeṇa dhūmābhāvena śobhate yo locanāgnis tena, vidhoḥ
śaśina umāyāś cāśleṣeṇa śobhate yat tena ca vapuṣā śobhitaḥ | āyudhena jīvantyāyudhīyā
yodhāḥ | ‘āyudhācchaḥ’ | te yeyā abhigamyā yasyām_ | dhyeyair brahmādibhir apy ādhyeya u
tkaṇṭhayā smartavyaḥ | dhiyā ādhidhūr manorogadalanaḥ | yodhānādhatte tatra tatra niveśayati
yaḥ | dhayatīti dhayaḥ śatrūṇāṃ yaśasaḥ pātā | dhāyyayā samidhām ādhānamantreṇādheya āma
ntraṇīyaḥ || 283 || 284 || 285 ||
(tilakam_)

lg.l: yodhais tad dhanuṣaḥ sehe na kreṃkāro 'pi tāpadaḥ || 286 ||

div.p:
aṅke āropitā āpad yeṣāṃ tādṛśāṃs tān asu
rāṃs tasmin kurvati sati yodhais tadīyasya dhanuṣaḥ kreṃkāro 'pi nāsahyata | tāpapradatvāt_ |
vairiṇāṃ nakre hiṃsake || 286 ||

lg.l: nitye na tarasā yogaṃ bhūmivardhanatāṃ gatam || 287 ||

div.p: (dvyakṣaro yukpādayamakaś ca)

lg.l: praṇataṃ sa vibhuḥ śatrum utsasarjākulaṃ raṇe |

div.p:
saṃprahāretyādi viśeṣakam_ | yo vibhuḥ kayā raṇabhuvā
kam andhakabhaṭaṃ yogaṃ na nināya sarvam evāvanau nyapātayat_ | sarveṣāṃ bhūtebhya utpatter ante ca
teṣv eva layād bhūmivardhanatvam_ | kukākavaḥ kutsitā dhvanayaḥ kāyāḥ śarīrāṇi tānayanti
ye kākībhiḥ sahitāḥ kākaukā vāyasasamūhās teṣāṃ kāko laulyaṃ yasyām_ | ‘kai śabde’
ity asya kākāḥ | ‘kaka laulye’ ity asya kākaḥ | kokate māṃsādyaśitum ādatta iti kukaḥ |
sa evaikaḥ śivāvāyasādir yasyām_ | ‘kuka vṛka ādāne’ | vibhus tu kakate 'vaśyaṃ kākī
samaralampaṭaḥ | ‘kaka laulye’ | kāka īṣadakati kuṭilaṃ gacchati yo nirbhayatvāt_ | ‘ī
ṣadarthe’ iti koḥ kādeśaḥ | nāsti kaṃ śiro yeṣāṃ te 'kāḥ śiraś chinnā varākatvāt kākā
iva kākā ripavo yasyām_ | nāgān ibhān vidārayati yaḥ | īreṇa ca ripūṇāṃ kṣepeṇa citā
vyāptā sthitir yasya | himavāṃs tu nāgaiḥ puṃnāgatarubhir vidārībhiś ca latābhedaiḥ kṛtāvasthānaḥ
|| 287 || 288 || 289 ||
(tilakam_)

sa haraḥ papau svasainyaṃ rarakṣa | sāsāḥ saśarāsanāḥ (tān a
syati) | ‘avatyādinā vakārasyopadhāyāś ca saṃprasāraṇam | sāsānāmasūnasyantīti
kvip_ |’ teṣāṃ yodharakṣāvidhātināṃ daityānāṃ suṣṭhupipāsāṃ nijasainyaṃ rakṣitum icchām asate bā
dhate tacchīlaḥ | ‘... vibādhane’ | syati śatrūn antaṃ nayatīti saḥ | ‘anyeṣv api dṛśyate’
iti ḍaḥ | apipāsaḥ kṣuttṛṣṇārahitaḥ | sapāpāṃś ca suvati prerayati yaḥ | saha paṃsena śa
trunāśena vartamāna āsaḥ kunto yasya | ‘pasi nāśane’ | asibhiḥ pānti ye tān apāsya
ti nyak karoti yaḥ | sahopāsayā bhaktajanasevayā vartate yaḥ | supāl lalitacaraṇaḥ | ‘saṃkhyā
supūrvasya’ ity akāralopaḥ || 290 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ)

satpuṅkhā vibhinnahṛdayāś ca mārgaṇāḥ | asayas tu dṛḍha
muṣṭayaś chinnakaṇṭhāś ca || 291 ||

lg.l: bhūtidhāma paraṃ bheje śaṃbhuḥ śaṃbhur ivāparaḥ || 292||

div.p:
śaṃbhuḥ śivaḥ param atyarthaṃ bhūter bhasmano dhāma cchāyām ase
vata | kṛto hataḥ kāmaḥ smaro yena | ‘kṛñ_ hiṃsāyām_’ | gor vṛṣasya bhartā svāmī | savī
yajñavān_ | yajamānamūrtitvāt_ | kamalasya mṛgasyāsanam āspadaṃ śaśī sa ūḍho yena | dvi
tīyaḥ śaṃbhur iva | śaṃbhur acyuto brahmā ca | tatrācyutaḥ—kṛtakaṃ kṛtrimaṃ narasiṃhādirūpam a
mati gacchati yaḥ | ‘ama gatyādiṣu’ | gor bhuvo bhartā dhārayitā | bhuvaḥ saṃsārasyotiḥ
parirakṣā tasyā dhāma sthānam_ | paraṃ cotkṛṣṭaṃ bhajate | brahmā tu-kṛtakāmaḥ saṃpādita
manorathaḥ | gor vāco bhartā poṣakaḥ | sa iti lokātītaḥ | vibhir haṃsairūḍhaṃ kamalaṃ nalina
m evāsanaṃ yasya saḥ | bhūter utpatter dhāma viṣayaḥ kāraṇam_ || 292 ||
(arthatrayavācī)
(dvyakṣaraḥ)

asau vāsavaḥ savasau
vasusahite raṇe senāsu śauryāṇy eva śikharāṇi cicchedeti viśeṣakam_ | śambena vajreṇa rā
jitaṃ śambarākhyena daityenājitam aparābhūtam_ | kāmenaiva śambarasya jitatvāt_ | vasaivāsavaṃ
pānaṃ sevante ye sṛgālās taiḥ saha vartamānāsu | sāsāś ca saśarāsanā āvāsā gṛhāṇi
yāsu senāsu | svasyātmana idaṃ sauvaṃ nijaṃ sainyādi tatpraśastam asyāsti | suvāsasī aṃse
yasya | savān kratūn āsevate yaḥ || 293 || 294 || 295 ||
(tilakam_)

lg.l: śaraśreṇir vicakare kā vandhyā samare ca kaiḥ || 296 ||

div.p:
kabandhāḥ śiraś chinnāḥ |
tatsaṃbandhinyā mūrtyā asamarecakair maṇḍalībhramaṇair nṛttam_ | kaiś ca samare kā śarapaṅktir vandhyā
niṣphalā kṣiptā || 296 ||

jino buddha iva | so 'pi rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānala
kṣaṇaṃ skandhaṃ saṃsāraduḥkhaṃ jitavān_ | vajrasyāsanaṃ kṣepo vajrāsanaṃ cāsanabhedaḥ | kṣamā
dharāḥ parvatāḥ kṣamāvantaś ca | ārād dūrāt_ | ‘mārān_’ iti pāṭhe skandhakarṭṛkāḥ mārā
māraṇāni | tathā skandhaś ca māraś ca kāmastānajayad iti yojyam_ || 297 ||

lg.l: yasyāristrī daśāṃ nāpa kāṃ cīravasanātha tām || 298 ||

div.p:
athānanta
ramaśaniprabho daityaḥ krodhād abhyaid abhyāyayau | yasya ripunārī kāñcyā raveṇa sanāthatvam āgataṃ
jaghanaṃ dadhuṣī pūrvaṃ dhṛtavaty api kā daśāṃ nopayayau | tām iti nikṛṣṭām_ | yataḥ sā cīra
vasanā jaratkarpaṭā | abhyāgamo rogaḥ || 298 || 299 ||
(yugmam_)

kauśikasyendrasya śauryam evā
gnijvālāpaṭalaṃ tatra tena daityena patitam_ | ahir vṛtraḥ | nirmṛṣṭaḥ sann utpuṃsito yaḥ sāratayā
tāpas tejaḥ pratāpo vā tena nirmṛdhaṃ nirgataraṇaṃ kṛtvā || 300 ||
(śarabandhaḥ)

suketoḥ senā ghanāghanena
śakreṇa na nāghāni hataiva | nunnaḥ puraḥ prerito vāhanabhūto ghanānām ogho yena | nighā nimitāḥ
samārohapariṇāhāḥ anaghāś cākhaṇḍitā ghanā mattahastino yasyām_ | āghnānā tāḍayantī |
nunnā parair nirastā ata eva nighnāḥ paravaśā ye teṣāṃ nauḥ | uttārakatvāt_ || 301 || 302 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ | yugmam_)
dānam eva lakṣma lāñchanaṃ tena saha vartate yā | sadā analasyāgneḥ kṣmā bhūmiḥ || 303 ||

sa śakro nānāśam api tu sanāśaṃ bahulohitaṃ ca prabhūtai rudhiraiḥ sahitaṃ śatrum akarot_ |
paryastāḥ patitā nānāvidhāḥ śambasya vajrasya hulāḥ prahāraviśeṣā yena || 304 ||

kapardī
haraḥ | hālāhale surāsīre | hālāhalaṃ ca viṣam_ | suketur asuraḥ śobhanaṃ ca cihna vṛṣabhaḥ
|| 305 ||

saha raktaughasya visreṇām agandhena vartamānaṃ vapurbibhradibhaskandhāc ca visraṃsī sa
suketus tena halinā kṛtaḥ | yasmād adayaṃ kṛtvā sīrakṣato halanirbhinnaḥ | udayaṃ rakṣatā
pālayatā || 306 ||

halī haladharo varāḥ kriyās tanvan devaiḥ puṣpavṛṣṭibhir āvarjitaḥ | lā
ñchitayā lāñchanīkṛtayā śriyā yuktaḥ | harir iva | so 'pi varāhasthalīlābhirāñchi
tayā saṃbaddhayā lakṣmyāvalambitaḥ | atra halīti tananakriyāyāṃ kartā gūḍhaḥ || 307 ||
(gūḍhakartṛkaḥ)

lg.l: yasyāmbhaḥ praṇato naiva narake saritām adhāt |

div.p:
kāsūḥ
śaktis tayā saha vartamānair yodhaiḥ sākaṃ saha sa kaṃsāsī kaṃsaripū raṇe śaṅkham āpūryākasat ja
gāma | ‘kasa gatau’ | yasya praṇato jano narake saritāṃ salilaṃ naivādhāt_ na jātu papau |
yaś ca narakesaritāṃ narasiṃhatvam adhād adhārayat_ | ...... na saha vartamāne raṇe 'sau khaḍgaviṣayaḥ |
eko 'dvitīyaḥ | kaṃ samudrajalam evaiko gṛhaṃ tenopalakṣitaḥ | akukākusūḥ kutsitaṃ kākuṃ yo
na sūte | sāsāsikaḥ sahāsena kuntenāsinā ca vartate yaḥ || 308 || 309 || 310 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ | tilakam_)

ye bāhavo lambanā eva mukhyasya kāryasyābhāvāl lambanam evaiṣāṃ prayojanam_ | vastutas tu la
mbanā ity abhidhānam_ || 311 ||

lg.l: doṣṇi dṛṣṭiṃ dadau pīne kaṃsahā yamatoraṇe |
dviṣo hantum apaikṣiṣṭa kaṃ sahāyamato raṇe || 312 ||

div.p:
yamasya toraṇe doṣṇi kaṃsahā harir dṛṣṭim adāt_ | ata eva
dviṣadvighātāya sahāyaṃ kam apekṣitavān_ | naiva kaṃcit_ || 312 || 313 ||

lg.l: sa śarān dikṣu cikṣepa sacakro 'ṣṭāsu rakṣitā |
dviṣann avedi tenātha sa ca kroṣṭāsurakṣitā || 314 ||

div.p:
saha cakreṇā
yudhena vartamānaḥ sa harir aṣṭāsu dikṣu śarān amuñcat_ | rakṣitā pālayitā | tena ca sa dvi
ṣann arātiḥ kroṣṭā sṛgāla iti viditaḥ | asurān_ kṣiṇotīty asurakṣit_ tena || 314 ||

lg.l: lulāva līvo lolavāṃ(lolavāṃl līvo)l lavalīṃ volaloluvaḥ || 316 ||

div.p:
nandakamasiṃ paraśuṃ ca vyāpārayan sa ripor balānām āvalayo yasyās tādṛśīṃ senāṃ camūṃ senāṃ
vā sanāyakāṃ balānām āvaliṃ lavalīṃ latām iva lulāva ciccheda | pattrāṇi vāhāḥ palla
vāś ca | ballavo goparūpaḥ | vālino vānarasya līlā evailāvallyo niṣkuṭīlatās tā rā
marūpeṇa lunāti sma yaḥ | līvaḥ liyaṃ paraiḥ saha śleṣaṃ vāti gacchati | lolaṃ kṛtvā vān_
prasaran_ | vāśabda upamāyām_ | ulasyopadravasya loluvo 'tyarthaṃ lo(lū)yitā || 315
|| 316 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ | yugmam_)

ādivitpurākalpajñaḥ sa dyota eva kesarā yasya tādṛkkaustubhābjaṃ dadhad dideva
cikrīḍa | uddaiva ullaṅghitavidhiḥ | vedavādaṃ vidanti ye teṣāṃ davad eva śīghram eva divaṃ svargaṃ
dadat_ | viduṣa āsamantād vedayati jñānaṃ lambhayati yaḥ | deveṣu madhye dīdivir vijigīṣu
r dyutimān vā | dīdiviśabdo ‘divo dve dīrghaś cābhyāsasya’ ity auṇādikaḥ || 317
|| 318 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ | yugmam_)

lg.l: dhṛṣṭam āsādya tarasā kākī vairasyam ānayat || 319 ||

div.p:
gāndharvam aśvasaṃbandhi kalevaraṃ śarīraṃ prāpya kākī vairasyam ānayaj jugupsāṃ ja
nitavatī | yoṣic ca sabhāyāṃ dhārṣṭyena kāmukaṃ svayam abhiyujya vairasyam āvahati saubhāgyakṣa
yāt_ || 319 ||

bhāsvadānanaṃ mukhaṃ yasya sa harir natā ripucamūr jahau tatyāja | dīnānāṃ
tāraṇe rakṣaṇe raṇe baddhakakṣyaḥ kṛtodyogaḥ | nāgānāṃ dānaṃ nudati yaḥ || 320 ||

lg.l: bhāvīva vibhavāv eva bhāve vā vaibhave bhavan || 322 ||

div.p: (dvyakṣaraḥ | yugmam_)

lg.l: saṅgrāmas tasya tābhyāṃ ca sārdhaṃ sa śaradurdinaḥ |

div.p:
asau
harir āsthāṃ jayāśāṃ vidhāya yoddhum icchū tārasutārākhyāv ubhau daityapatī vibhavau samare ni
haniṣyamāṇatvāsaṃsārarahitāv evābībhavadbhāvayāmāsa | anadhikaḥ yasmād anyo 'dhiko nāsti
sa svanaḥ siṃhanādo yayoḥ | bhuvo bhāvaḥ sattā tadabhāvena vā janānāṃ bhīs tatra bhāvo
'bhiprāyo yayoḥ | bhauvau bhuvo 'patye | bhāvayaty avaśyaṃ bhāvī piṭatulyaḥ | bhakteṣu vatsala
tvāt_ | vaibhave ca vittasaṃbandhini bhāve snehe bhavan_ | keṣucit svāmīva sneham ācarann i
tyarthaḥ | vāśabdaḥ samuccaye || 321 || 322 || 323 ||

tadā tau daityāv amṛṣā satyam eva
pauruṣaśobhāṃ bibhratau tena hariṇā amṛṣātāṃ māritau | antarbhāvitaṇy artho 'tra mriyatiḥ
sakarmakaḥ | ūrjitau balavantau | atāntābhyāṃ ca dorbhyāṃ jitau prāptajayau || 324 ||
ūrur mahān ūrvoś ca niṣpeṣaś cūrṇanam_ | patattriketano garuḍadhvajaḥ || 325 ||

sa hariḥ satāṃ
vipadantakaro dāridryadalanaḥ kopāt tāṃ daityasenāṃ jaghāna | asilatayā lūnā dvi
pānāṃ dantau karāś ca yena || 326 ||

ubhaye mṛtāḥ sajīvāś ca bhaṭāḥ svargasthā
babhūvuḥ | mṛtānāṃ śubhagatiprātarjīvatāṃ cāsurakṣayeṇa nirbhayatvāt_ || 327 ||

lg.l: sābhaḥ sabhāsu bhūbhāsī sāsibhāḥsu sabhāsu bhān || 328 ||

div.p: (dvyakṣaraḥ)

sa devaḥ
sabhāsu surair astūyata stutaḥ | sahābhāsena prakāśena vartante yās tāsu sabhāsu | dīptiyukte
aṃse yasya saḥ | sahābhībhir nirbhayair ibhair vartante yāḥ | saubhabhit_ sālvāsurabhedī | syatīti
sā vinaṣṭā abhā aśrīr yasya | sabhāsu sanakṣatrāsu | bhuvaṃ bhāsayati yaḥ | sahāsīnāṃ
bhāsā vartante yās tāsu bhān_ dīpyamānaḥ | sakṛd ekavāraṃ tebhyo devebhyo hitatām arivighā
tād upakāritvaṃ dadhat_ | lakṣaṇagrantho vyākaraṇam_ | so 'pi saha kṛdbhis taddhitaiś ca pratyayair va
rtate || 328 || 329 ||
(yugmam_)

sa harir arīṇām apāyayatanād upatāpayogād anivṛttaḥ sannadas tadra
kṣasāṃ kulaṃ teṣām eva raktaughamapāyayata pāyayāmāsa | nādadaḥ siṃhanādakṛt_ || 330 ||

śatrur bāṇāsuro 'pi | ruṣā kopena uṣayā ca bāṇāsuraduhitrā krāntaṃ mano yasya saḥ |
aniruddho niṣeddhum aśakyo vāsudevapautraś ca || 331 ||

tena ripor nighnatā paravaśatā kṛtā |
vinighnatā tāḍayatā | sādhu samyak_ asaṃśritasādhvasaṃ ca kṛtvā | nānāvidhān āhavān ka
roti yas tena || 332 ||

mahāntair ity apaśabdābhāsaḥ | mahadbhir iti yuktatvāt_ | mahānanto
jīvitakṣayo yebhya iti tu nāpaśabdaḥ || 333 ||
(apaśabdābhāsaḥ)
(dvyakṣaraḥ)

sa harir daityau tārasutārau nihatya raṇe
cacāra | kau bhūmāv ekaḥ | avati rakṣaty avaśyaṃ yaḥ | kavir apūrvanirmātā | kaṃ sukham asyā
stīti kaṃvaḥ | ‘kaṃśaṃbhyāṃ babhayastitutayusa’ iti vapratyayaḥ | kekī mayūras tadval līlayā vā
nti gacchantīti kekivāḥ kumārās teṣām ekaḥ pradhānam_ | bālakrīḍānidhānam ityarthaḥ |
akutsitā kākuḥ svaro yasyās tādṛśī vāgyasya | kaveḥ śukrasya kākavo vyājās teṣāṃ
kavo vaktā | ‘kuṅ_ śabde’ | avīkau nāsti vīr gatir yayor daityayoḥ | kim iva daityau ni
hatya, avivekavan nirvivekam āvikam iva | avaya evāvikāḥ | svārthe kaḥ | teṣāṃ samūha
āvikam_ | vāśabda ivārthe || 334 || 335 ||
(yugmam_)

lg.l: tatra dṛṣṭiṃ janaḥ prītim ānināya matākṛtau || 336 ||

div.p:
tena māninā śuśubhe | yamatā śatrūṇāṃ
saṃhārakatvaṃ tatkṛtau saktena vyasaninā | matākṛtau manoharākāre ca | tasmiñ jano dṛśaṃ
prītim ānināya prāpayat_ | muhus tam evālokayad ityarthaḥ || 336 ||

vyutthānaṃ cetaso bāhya
bhāvābhiṣvaṅgaḥ | tatsaṃskāra iva yogasaṃskārān abādhata kālāntako vibudhān_ || 337 ||

lg.l: stutaḥ so 'py amunā nunno rajastamasi totriṇā || 338 ||

div.p:
ajo haris tam asuraṃ śarair atāḍayat_ | asitaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ | atriṇā ca muninā stutaḥ | so
'py ajo rajastamasi dhūlitimire 'munā daityena kṣiptaḥ | totriṇā pratodavatā || 338 ||

lg.l: udgūrya tam ubhāhasti hastī hantum athābhyagāt || 339 ||

div.p:
mudgarākhyam āyudhaṃ ubhāhasti dvābhyāṃ karābhyāṃ bhramayitvā taṃ daityaṃ nihantuṃ hastī gajamukho
vināyako 'bhyāyayau | ubhāhastiśabdo dvidaṇḍyādiḥ || 339 ||

uddāmatarāḥ sādi
no 'śvārohā yasya tādṛśaḥ sa vināyakaḥ pratāpibhiḥ sainikair amuṃ daityaṃ tarasā javena ja
ghāna | dīpratāpibhir dīpratvaprāpaṇaśīlaiḥ || 340 ||

abhāji bhagnaḥ sevitaś ca | nāyako
gaṇapatiḥ kāmukaś ca | pratikarma pratīpakaraṇaṃ prasādhanaṃ ca | kaitavaḥ ketusaṃbandhī sāro yasya
kaitān sthānaviśeṣān vā sārayati yas tad bhāvaṃ dadhatīti kecit_ | veśyāpi kaitavena vyājena
sāratāṃ dhatte || 341 ||

lg.l: so 'vait kṣatiṃ dviṣāṃ tasmin na vācām antike sthitām |
prāptaṃ yodhaṃ śivaughāḥ sma na vācāmanti ke 'sthitām || 342 ||

div.p:
‘so 'vait_—’ ityādi ślokadvayaṃ prāguktam iha tu lekhakapramādā
t paṭhitam_ ||

lg.l: bibhrataḥ sāṃyugīm uccair apare dhuram atra tām |
prāptāḥ prabhubhyaḥ kiṃ kīrter aparedhur amatratām || 344 ||

div.p:
apare yodhāḥ svām alaukikīṃ raṇadhuram atra raṇe dhārayantaḥ kīrteś cāmatratāṃ pā
tratvam upagatāḥ prabhubhyaḥ kim aparedhur naivāparāddhāḥ || 342 || 343 ||

lg.l: tārkṣyeṇa sadṛśās tasya sāyakā rejire raṇe || 346 ||

div.p:
chadāḥ pakṣāś ca
|| 344 ||
(niroṣṭhyaḥ)

lg.l: babhau tasya dviṣaḥ senā nighnatī vraścanādibhiḥ |

div.p:
tasya senā vraścanādibhiś chedanaprabhṛtibhir vyāpārair arīn nighnatī śuśubhe | sa ca
nādibhiḥ sainyair janito yo 'marṣas tasya nighnaḥ paravaśas tīvraś cābhūt_ || 345 ||

asau daityo
jayaśriyā samare na śliṣṭaḥ || 346 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ)

lg.l: sāḍambaram areḥ sainyaṃ hāstikaṃ ca khagādhipaḥ || 350 ||

div.p:
kakudī dhvajī dakena jalena duvaṃ paritāpaṃ da
dāti yaḥ | vāruṇāstravarṣitvāt_ | ‘dūṅ_ paritāpe’ | akaḥ kuṭilagāmī | akutsite u
dake oko gṛhaṃ yasya | abdurgavāsitvāt_ | kadā ekakaḥ na kadācid ekākī | ke
kādaḥ kekī gṛhamayūro yasmin samare | adgakāś ca ripupratāpāḥ kukā māṃsādanaparāḥ kā
kādayo yasmin_ | akutsitā kut_ śabdo yasya saḥ | tīkṣṇacañcuḥ khagādhipaḥ pakṣāṇāṃ
chāyayābhramākāśam arañjayat_ | puraskāraḥ pūjā purataḥ karaṇaṃ ca | prasaro gatir vistā
raś ca | āḍambaraḥ prapañco gajānāṃ galagarjitaṃ ca | hāstikaṃ hastisamūhaḥ | cañcurāś ca
ṭulā bhramarā yatra hāstike | jayal labdhajayaḥ || 347 || 348 || 349 ||
(tilakam_)

udātta udbhaṭaḥ
svaritaḥ svargaṃ gataḥ | udāttaś ca svaraḥ kathaṃ svarito bhavatīti virodho dhvanyate || 350 ||

apinā pauruṣavān ripur yasya kuśacīravatā darbhavalkalinā veṣeṇa sthitas tena śakreṇa mlā
nam_ | ākrandarūpeṇa kutsitena śacyā raveṇa tapyate yas tena || 351 ||

amuṃ vajraketu
m asau murāriḥ keśavo rurumāramamīmaradrurum iva māritavān_ | ‘upamāne karmaṇi ca’ iti
ṇamul_ | marmare rūkṣe marau mamārayo 'haṃkārapradhānā ripavo ye 'palāyitās tān mārayati yaḥ
|| 352 || 353 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ | yugmam_)

lg.l: sajīvaṃ kiṃ dviṣāṃ sainyaṃ sajjahāti sma rakṣatām || 357 ||

div.p:
vidviṣām anekapā gajās tadapaharaṇe, praṇatānāṃ cānekasya pāpasya
haraṇe vyagraḥ | ‘vyagrāḥ’ iti pāṭhe vyagraṃ kṛtvā āste iti kvibvidheyaḥ | viśliṣṭaṃ vi
bhinnaṃ bhavacārakāṇāṃ saṃsārapravartakānāṃ tṛṣṇādīnāṃ pañjaraṃ samūho yena | sa devo 'rakṣatāṃ
śatrūṇāṃ sainyaṃ sajīvaṃ sajjīvadeva kiṃ jahāti sma | nāmṛtaṃ kiṃcid atyākṣīd ityarthaḥ | sajjāḥ
saṃnaddhās tān hantīti ‘kālasāmānye kvip ca’ iti kvip_ | atra bhūtakāle vyākhyāto na
padārthaḥ iti pādasaṃskārasamaye tasyābhāvāt_ ‘brahmādiṣv eva hanteḥ bhūte kvip_’ iti
brahmādisūtreṇa niyamo na pravartate | tadabhighātāc cātiśayena smarakṣatām apsarasaṃ kartā |
‘sādhukāriṇi tṛn_’ | sutīkṣṇair atyantaṃ samarādikuśalair niśitaiś ca | muṣṭir aṅgulisaṃniveśaḥ
tsaruś ca | nistriṃśaiḥ krūraiḥ khaḍgaiś ca || 354 || 355 || 356 ||
(tilakam_)

lg.l: sa dāvair iva dhenūnāṃ senānāṃ jvalitaiḥ śaraiḥ |

div.p:
sa hariḥ sadā satataṃ vai
riṇāṃ vadhe śaktim anūnāṃ bibhratsenānāṃ bhayaṃ śarair dadau | dhenūnām iva dāvair vanavahnibhiḥ
|| 357 ||
(ayugyamakam_)

lg.l: cakre hṛdi padaṃ no bhīḥ kurvatām abhayāñjalim || 360 ||

div.p:
ayaṃ devo yadā dayāṃ yayau tadaiva bhīr asurayodhānāṃ hṛdi padaṃ na babandha | a
yam anukūlaṃ daivaṃ yāti yaḥ | diyaṃ ripūṇāṃ kṣayaṃ dadat_ | ‘dīṅ_ kṣaye’ | yadūnāṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ dā
yādā ripava eva yādāṃsi nakrādayas tān dunoti yaḥ | udayāya vijayārtham_ || 358
|| 359 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ | yugmam_)

āmodo harṣaḥ saurabhaṃ ca | sumanaso devāḥ puṣpāṇi ca | navaśeṣā nūtanā mālā
|| 360 ||

sa haris triyāmayā aparāmṛṣṭaḥ satataprabuddho dviṣatas tatakṣa kṣapitavān_ | satataṃ
sadā kṣattriyāṇām āmayo rogo yasyāḥ sakāśāt tādṛg asya ca kriyā bhārgavasyevāsīt_
|| 361 ||

lg.l: sāṃyugīṃ sahasā yoddhuṃ naiva tatra kumārakaḥ || 364 ||

div.p:
tatra kaḥ subhaṭaḥ sāṃyugīṃ kuṃ raṇabhuvaṃ yoddhuṃ nāra sarva eva yayau | ‘ṛ gatau’ |
saṃpratipattayaḥ prasādāḥ | atra karmakriyākartāras trayo 'pi gūḍhāḥ || 362 ||
(gūḍhakriyākarmakartṛkaḥ)

asau khaḍge
'navame sarvotkṛṣṭe sati tena hariṇāhatānāṃ saṃbandhī kravyakūṭo māṃsarāśis taiḥ kṣapāṭair niśācarai
r aghāsi grastaḥ | ‘ghasḷ adane’ | navameghavadasitaiḥ kṛṣṇaiḥ | asau yaḥ parita patitaḥ || 363 ||

lg.l: mantharatvaṃ gates tatra kasya cetasi nāsphurat || 366 ||

div.p: raṃho javaḥ || 364 ||

lg.l: jahāra pauruṣacchāyāṃ sa ca mūkāsuraṃ gatām || 367 ||

div.p:
sa hariḥ sacamūkāsu senāsahitāsu raṇorvīṣu raṅgatāṃ valgatāṃ daityānāṃ
satāṃ tān anādṛtya mūkākhyam asuraṃ gatāṃ pauruṣakriyām apaninye || 365 ||

sa haris tāra
kākhyam asuraṃ śanair aśāyayaddīrghanidrāṃ nināya | yaśa eva śayyā tatra śete tiṣṭhati yaḥ |
‘adhikaraṇe śeteḥ’ ity ac_ | śaṃyuḥ kalyāṇavān_ | ‘śaṃkaṃbhyāṃ—’ iti yus_ | śaśīśasya
candramauler āśaye śete | yo 'bhīṣṭakaraṇān na śāmyatīty aśān udyuktaḥ | śameḥ kvipi ‘anunā
sikasya—’ ityādinā dīrghaḥ | ‘mo no dhātoḥ’ iti ca natvam_ | yayubhir aśvair yāti yaḥ |
āśayā āsthayā śaṃyeyaḥ śreyortham abhigamyaḥ | yataḥ śaṃ mūrtam eva śreyo bhagavān_ | tārakā
khyam āśrayāśaṃ vahnim iti vākyoktarūpakam_ (?) | āśayāyī śatrukṛtāṃ tanūkṛtiṃ na yāti
yaḥ (?) || 366 || 367 ||
(dvyakṣaraḥ | yugmam_)

lg.l: dadhad dhruvam iva bhreje cakraṃ bhramitatārakam || 370 ||

div.p:
bhramyā bhramaṇena tatā vistīrṇā arā madhye śalākā
yasya | bhramitāś ca tārakā jyotīṃṣi yena | dhruvādhīnavṛttitvān nakṣatrāṇām_ || 368 ||

lg.l: nijaghāna ca vidhyantaṃ vidhyantaṃ ca jagāma saḥ || 371 ||

div.p:
sa
hariḥ surā evāṇḍajāḥ pakṣiṇas teṣāṃ vītasaṃ pañjaraṃ, ujjvalāṃ saṃpadaṃ vītaṃ viśeṣeṇa gataṃ
vidhyantaṃ ca ghnantaṃ tam asuraṃ jaghāna | vidheś ca prārabdhasya karmaṇo 'ntam avasānaṃ yayau || 371 ||

sa devaḥ prabhañjane ripumardane sahāṃ samarthām āyatāṃ ca śaktiṃ bibhradditijasainye didīpe ja
jvāla | jvalana iva | so 'pi prabhañjano vātaḥ sahāyaḥ sārathir yasya tadbhāvaṃ śaktiṃ ca
dadhatkānane jvalati | hetir āyudhaṃ jvālā ca | pippodam ātmajñānaṃ pādayati bodhayati
yaḥ | ‘pada gatau’ | gatyarthatayā cāsya jñānārthatvāt_ | pādasya ṛgādisaṃbandhina ādau
prārambhe dīpaḥ prakāśakaḥ | praṇava ityarthaḥ | tasya ca praṇavarūpatvam uktam_—‘tasya vācakaḥ
praṇavaḥ’ iti | apiḥ samuccaye | āpadaṃ dadat_ | dviṣatām eva | padaṃ svargāpavargādi dadāti

pradhanaṃ saṅgrāmo gomahiṣyādivargaś ca | dohado 'bhilāṣaḥ | dohaṃ ca dadāti yaḥ | senāṃ sa
svāmikām api | anuttamāṅgāṃ chinnaśirasam anuttamāṃ ca sarvotkṛṣṭāṃ gāṃ dhenum_ || 34
||

lg.l: yuṣmābhir ity apunar uktam idaṃ kurudhvam || 37 ||

div.p:
abhyāgamo raṇaḥ | tato yūyaṃ palāyitā maraṇabhayāt_ | tac ca maraṇaṃ yu
ṣmābhir ūṣmarahitatvād eva saṃśritam_ | anūṣmaṇo maraṇadarśanād iti vyaktam etat palāyanam_ |
uṣmābhimāno jīvitasphuritaṃ ceti gate 'pīdaṃ bharaṇam apunar uktam ekavārasaṃbhavi vidadhvam_ |
yadi hy ūṣmāṇam āśritya yudhi yudhyadhve tatsakṛd eva yuṣmākaṃ maraṇam iti raṇāt tu nirūṣmabhayād ye
upanatamaraṇāḥ......punar api martyadharmatayā tathaivāgre maraṇād dvimaraṇaṃ bhavatīti punar uktaṃ
tat_ | palāyanam eva dvitīyaṃ maraṇam iti tanniṣedho vātra vākyārthaḥ || 37 ||

lg.l: saṅgrāmād aribhayaviplutāḥ parāñco nirhrīkā nanu viṣamīkurudhvam etām |
vistīrṇāṃ kimiti mudhā kṛtāntalīlāvāhyālīm asurabhaṭā lalāṭabhittim || 38 ||

div.p:
vāhyālī tu
raṃgasaṃcārabhūmiḥ || 38 ||

div.p:
tīkṣṇacañcukoṭir garuḍa eva kaṅkamukhaṃ tenoddhṛtaṃ paribhūtiśalyā
ata eva kalpāḥ paṭavaḥ || 39 ||

vāhikā vāhanāni | ‘dhātvarthanirdeśe ṇvulvaktavyaḥ’ iti
ṇvul_ (?) || 40 ||

rtijam eveti | ānanderṣyayor asaṃbhavān na tajjanitam apītyevakārārthaḥ || 46 ||

laṅkaḥ || 47 ||
śauṇḍāḥ prasaktāḥ || 48 ||

saṃprastauty ayaśo yathā ca nitarām andhaṃ tamaścakṣuṣo-

div.p:
ayaśaḥ kartṛ yathā cakṣuṣor andham āndhyajanakaṃ
tamaḥ karoti na tathā rajaḥ | cakṣuḥpatitena rajasā yāvad ālokyate na tv ayaśasetyarthaḥ
|| 49 ||

lg.l: tyaktāḥ prāṇair bhṛśam aśucitāṃ naivam āyānti kāyā

pālī samūhaḥ |
agryā pradhānabhūtā || 52 ||

sainyaṃ dainyāt surāṇām aniśam aśaraṇaṃ daityacakreṇa cakre || 54 ||

div.p:
saṃkrandanaḥ śakraḥ | vidrāṇaḥ palāyitaḥ | glāni
grāhiṇo vicchāyāḥ || 54 ||

lg.l: pīlūnāṃ khaḍgalūnair bahu bahumakaraiḥ kīrṇam antaḥkaraughai-
labdhāsthaiḥ sthūlamatsyair iva hatapatitair yuddhabhājāṃ bhujaughai-

div.p:
pīlavo gajāḥ | īṣadasamāptā makarā bahumakarāḥ | ‘vibhāṣā
supo bahucpurastāt tu’ iti bahuc_ | sthapuṭitaṃ viṣamīkṛtam_ | āsthā sarvataḥ sthitiḥ |
akuṇṭhakam abhugnam_ || 55 ||

padmarāgadaṇḍākṛtiṣu rudhirapūreṣu paribhramantī vihagapaṅktir lī
lollāsana......ja kālirātricchattrasya sāmyam akarot_ || 56 ||

niṣkuṣitā nirmāṃsī
kṛtāḥ || 57 ||

naiko bahuvidhaḥ | ‘amānonā pratiṣedhe [iti] vacanān niranubandhako 'pi
na śabdo 'sti | tasyātra supsupeti samāsaḥ | vidhurā gaṇānāṃ vṛndasya manorathā yatra
tādṛśe samare harasya bhālabhuvi bhrukuṭiḥ kūṭabandhaṃ babandha sthairyam akarot_ || 58 ||

iti śrībālabṛhaspatyanujīvino vāgīśvarāṅkasya vidyādhipatyaparanāmno mahākave
rājānakaśrīratnākarasya kṛtau ratnāṅke haravijaye mahākāvye
subhaṭasaṃdīpanaṃ nāma pañcacatvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ |

iti
rājānakajayānakasūnor alakasya kṛtau haravijayaviṣamapadoddyote pañcacatvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ ||
ṣaṭcatvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ |

lg.l: sakālakūṭaṃ vahatīva yo galaṃ kalindakanyāsahitaṃ sahāryayā |

div.p:
amunā hareṇa dhanurarivadhārtham ākṛṣyata | yaḥ sakālakūṭatvāt kalindakanyayā sahita
m iva galaṃ vahati | āryā gaurī tayā ca saha suranadītoyaṃ bibharti | dakam udakam arthād i
taranadīnāṃ tannyāsena hitaṃ vṛddham_ | ‘hi gatau vṛddhau ca’ | kaliṃ samīrayan pāpaṃ nirākurvan_ |
sahāryayā hāryam haraṇaṃ tatsanāthayā | manoharayetyarthaḥ | ṭaṅkāreṇa dhvaninā citā yuktā | ṭa
ṅkena ca tvaṣṭuḥ śastrakeṇāracitā kṛtā || 1 || 2 ||
(yugalakam_)

sa haro mānasya śevadhir nidhir udā
rair vājibhir aśvaiḥ samare babhrāma | tasya ca śarair arkatejasām avadhir girir lokālokākhya ānaśe
vyāptaḥ | udāravā udgataśūtkṛtirājir gamanaṃ yeṣām_ | ajer gatyarthakatvāt_ ‘ajyatibhyāṃ
ca’ ity auṇādika iṇpratyayo bāhulakād bhāvasādhanaḥ || 3 ||

lg.l: babhūva nātmāpy upamānam āhave durāsadatvena kapālamālinaḥ || 4 ||
gaṇasenayā pratidiśaṃ tarasā prathamānayā samamayā ca tatam |
abhayaṃ surāripṛtanā samiti prathamānayā samam ayācata tam || 5 ||

div.p:
tarasā javena prathamā
nayā khyātim āyāntyā samamayā ca sābhimānayā gaṇānāṃ senayā tataṃ vistīrṇam_ | tadaiva
daityasenā taṃ bhavam abhayaṃ paritrāṇaṃ samaṃ yugapad evāyācata | prathamo 'nayo 'parādho yasyāḥ
|| 5 ||

rucirānabhilāṣapradānakhaṇḍāṃś ca layān drutam adhyavilambitākhyān_ jānāti yā
tayā rambhayāpsarasā jage gītam_ | svargabhuveva | tatpakṣe rucirasyākhaṇḍalasyendrasya yajñā
yasyāṃ tayetyarthaḥ || 6 ||

lg.l: śaśilekhayā śirasi yasya mugdhayā na vaśasya mānasam araṃsta naddhayā |
tam avāpya vairipṛtanā nanāśa sā navaṃśasyamānasamaraṃ stanaddhayā || 7 ||

div.p:
na vaśasyānanyaparatantrasya yasya śirasi naddhayārdhacandrakalayā
mānasaṃ hṛdayam araṃsta krīḍitam | taṃ navaiḥ stutibhir navam apūrvaṃ kṛtvā vā śasyamānaṃ samaraṃ
yasya tādṛśaṃ haram avāpya sā ripusenā nanāśa palāyāṃcakre | stanaddhayā heṣamāṇaturagā
|| 7 ||

viśikhāsanaṃ dhanus tenāstaiḥ preritaiḥ | etac coktaṃ punaḥ śrutiprakarṣaṃ gamayatīti dha
nuṣaḥ prakarṣadhvananāya | dadhati bibhrāṇāni || 8 ||

lg.l: yudhi śaktim asau dviṣāṃ sma hartuṃ navam āyasyati tāṃ satāṃ sadastraḥ || 9 ||

div.p:
yasya vibhor nataṃ lokaṃ prati hitakriyā
asamānā lokātītā anavamā ca sarvotkṛṣṭā asau yudhi śaktiṃ titāṃsatāṃ vistārayi
tum icchatāṃ satām arīṇāṃ tāṃ śaktim upahartuṃ navaṃ kṛtvā āyasyati sma saprayatno 'bhūt_ |
sadastraḥ śobhanāyudhaḥ | sadāṃsi ca sabhāstrāyate rakṣati yaḥ || 9 ||

lg.l: kapiśabalam athāmarāricakraṃ sphuṭam iva jāmbavadṛkṣasainyam āsīt || 10 ||

div.p:
kapiśaṃ dhūsaraṃ balaṃ
sainyaṃ yasya | jāmbavannāmnaś ca ṛkṣasyācchabhallasya sainyaṃ kapibhiḥ śabalaṃ vicitram_ || 10 ||

lg.l: senābhir asyākriyatāricakram ahāsam ājāv aniśaṃ sitābhiḥ |

div.p:
ājau raṇe ripucakram asya senābhir ahāsaṃ kṛtam | aniśaṃ sadā sitābhiḥ śubhrābhiḥ | ma
hatyā samājāvanau sabhābhuvi śaṃsitābhiḥ stutābhiḥ || 11 ||

lg.l: sasṛje śaravṛṣṭir andhakād yair ditijais tatra vicitrahemapuṅkhā |
vimukhīkriyate sma sā patantī paṭuhuṃkāraravaiḥ svayaṃprabheṇa || 12 ||

div.p:
svayaṃprabho nāma gaṇaḥ
|| 12 ||

sa gaṇaḥ saṃyugabhuvi samāyān saṃmukham āgatān asurān ambujakhaṇḍasya yo nāśas tatkra
meṇa mamarda vyanāśayat_ | ata evāsau gaja iva | asurāṃs tu nāśakram api tu saśakraṃ
surasamūham eṇasamaṃ mṛgavadardayato ghnataḥ | tathā samāyān savyājān upasarpataḥ || 13 ||

lg.l: tadguptyai raṇabhuvi nandiṣeṇamukhyā daityendraṃ pratimumucur mahāstravṛṣṭīḥ |
śṛṅgīvātanukuliśāśribhinnasaṃdhis tābhiḥ sa drutam atha bhaṅguratvam āpat || 14 ||

div.p:
śṛṅgī
nagaḥ | sa iti daityendraḥ || 14 ||

lg.l: yudhi bhān nihatena vairiṇā sa hi ḍimbena jaṭāsurājitaḥ |
atha bhīma ivābhyayuṅkta tān sahiḍimbena jaṭāsurājitaḥ || 15 ||

div.p:
(ḍimbena) bāhuyuddhena nihato vairī tena bhān_ dīpya
mānaḥ jaṭābhiś ca suṣṭhurājitaḥ sa gaṇas tān asurān bhīmasena ivābhyayuṅkta yuddhāyāhūtavān |
bhīma......hiḍimbanāmā rākṣasaḥ | sa evenaḥ svāmī tena saha vartamānena jaṭākhyenā
sureṇājitaḥ | eṣa cārtho dvitīyapādasya śliṣṭoktirūpatvād adhigata iti yamakavyasanita
yaiva turīyapādasyopādānaṃ na tvasya puṣṭārthatā kācit_ | evaṃ tarhi hiḍimbajaṭāsurayos ta
dānīm api saṃbhavād atra samagram eva viśeṣaṇajātam ubhayor apy upamānopameyayor yojyata iti nāsti
doṣaḥ || 15 ||

daityānāṃ gaṇānāṃ cādhipāḥ saṅgrāmarāgaṃ ye bhajante yodhās tān ājaghnuḥ |
atra hanteḥ sakarmakatvāt_ ‘āṅo yamahanaḥ’ ity ātmanepadābhāvaḥ || 16 ||

lg.l: jaghāna tāṃs tridivabhido 'ripauruṣaṃ sa hāravān akalayato 'vadhānataḥ |

div.p:
sa gaṇo hā
ravānarīṇāṃ pauruṣam akalayato 'gaṇayatas tān asurān avadhānata ekāgratayā jaghāna | tathā sa
hāraveṇa vartamāneṣv ānakeṣu paṭaheṣu layād vādanavyasanād ambudānāṃ garjitam ajayat_ | avadhai
r yeṣām anena na vadho vihitas tair ānataḥ kṛtapraṇāmaḥ || 17 ||

lg.l: śriyam āpa sa candraśālikāntāṃ ciram āsevitabhasmapāṇḍurāṃ saḥ |

div.p:
candreṇāvaśyaṃ śālamānaḥ
kāntaḥ śivaḥ paryanto yatra tādṛśīṃ śriyaṃ dadhat sa bhagavān āpa samāyayau | saudham amṛtamayaṃ
talaṃ yasya sāmarthyāc candramasaḥ | asmād aupacchandasikāt pratipādamantyākṣaralope vaitālī
yam ullasati | tatra sa devaḥ śriyaṃ bibhratsaudhatale harmyapṛṣṭe sthitāṃ candraśālikāṃ pragrīvakaṃ
catuṣkikāṃ vā prāpad ityarthaḥ || 18 ||

lg.l: nijaghāna nāsuravarūthinīṃ javān na batāyam ānaki raṇaṃ samāśritām |
śriyam asya śūlam atanoc ca saṃdadhan navatāyamānakiraṇaṃ samāśritām || 19 ||

div.p:
batāścaryamayaṃ devo daityasenāṃ javena na nijadhāna
na | api tu hatavān eva | ānaki paṭahavad raṇaṃ samāśritāṃ prāptām_ | samā aśrayo yasya
tadbhāvaṃ dadhānam_ | navaṃ kṛtvā tāyamānā bahalībhavantaḥ kiraṇā yasya tādṛśaṃ ca śūla
m asya śobhām atanot_ || 19 ||

lg.l: śeṣaḥ kim eṣa na kim asya phaṇāsahasra-
m ālokyate himagirir nanu niścalaḥ kim |
pramathā rabhasena yudhyamānā vyadhamandānavasādino bhiyā tān || 21 ||

div.p:
vyadhe tāḍane mandān alasāṃs tān dānavānāṃ sādino
'śvavārān vyadhaman dikṣu prerayāmāsuḥ | pāghrā—’ ādisūtreṇa dhmo dhamādeśaḥ | bhiyā ava
sādino vikalān_ | abhiyātān saṃmukham āgatān_ || 21 ||

lg.l: divasa iva nipatya gṛdhracakrair yudhi pidadhe mṛtavigrahaḥ sa teṣām || 22 ||

div.p:
nālikā nāntikā (?) gha
ṭikā ca | kālakhaṇḍaṃ kālamāṃsam | nābhiḥ śarīrāvayavaḥ | kālasya ca truṭikalādeḥ
khaṇḍanam atikrāntiḥ || 22 ||

lg.l: sa prāṃśur ojasy asurān sma hantuṃ na hastirodhī yatate nave 'gāt |
senārajobhiḥ samare ca tasminn ahas tirodhīyata tena vegāt || 23 ||

div.p:
sa devo daityān nihantuṃ na yatate sma | tān avajñayāvadhīd i
tyarthaḥ | yasmād ojasi nave viṣaye prāṃśur unnato hastirodhī ca | tena ca raṇe tasminn agād gire
rajobhir ahardinaṃ vegāt tirodhīyata sthagitam_ || 23 ||

lg.l: surāribāṇair atha hanyamānas tadā cakampe na mṛgāṅkamauliḥ |
vidadhad asakṛd aikṣyata svakāntyā navaśabalaṃ nayanābhirabhramābhiḥ || 25 ||

div.p:
abhraṃ nabhaḥ sa kāntyā na
vaṃ śaṃ......kṛtvā valannayanābhir bhramannetrābhir abhramābhir bhramaśūnyābhir ābhiḥ | nayasya nīte
r nābhir agrimaṃ sthānam_ || 25 ||
bāhuyantram eva mandīraṃ manthānadhāraṇakaṭakaḥ || 26 ||

lg.l: abhāji sakreṅkitam asya kārmukaṃ namat sareṇāvahitasya sādinaḥ |
raṇe pṛṣatkān kirato 'tha śaṃbhunā na matsareṇāvahitasya sādinaḥ || 27 ||

div.p:
a
syāhitasya ripor namat kārmukaṃ sareṇau sarajasi raṇe śaṃbhunā bhagnam_ | sādino 'śvārohasya
matsareṇa hetunā nāvahitasya | pārameśvaraṃ tattvam ajñātavata ityarthaḥ | sādino 'vasādakān_
|| 27 ||
mattakāśinī mukhyā yoṣit_ || 28 ||

sadyogajāsu sādhusaṃbandhajanitāsu
kīrtiṣu sthiracetāḥ sa harī raṇe cacāra | raveṇa dhūnitayā kampitayā bhuvā bhayapradaḥ sa
māṃso māṃsalaḥ | pīvara iti yāvat_ | sadyas tatkṣaṇam eva kīrtiśriyā yuktaḥ | na gajāsu
ravadhūbhir ūnitayā parityaktayā | tābhir vaidhavyacaryayā prakāśitayetyarthaḥ | akāro 'tra pra
śliṣṭaḥ | asamāṃsaś ca lokottaraskandhaḥ || 29 ||

lg.l: prahlādādibhir atha sainyabhaṅgam ājau paśyadbhis tvaritam upetya daityanāthaiḥ |
jaghne sa triśikhakṛpāṇabāṇavṛṣṭyā kālābhrair iva śikharī saghoragarjaiḥ || 30 ||
raṇabhuvam ajito 'vatīrya dhāmnā samaravi mardanatāṃ tatāṃ tadāpat |

div.p:
dhāmnā samo ravir yatra tathā
kṛtvā sa haras tadā tatāṃ vistīrṇāṃ mardanatāṃ vipakṣāṇāṃ kṣobhakatvam āpal lebhe | merur api ta
d āpat teṣāṃ daityānām āpad bhūtaḥ senāsamarasya vimardena natā antā yasya tadbhāvam āpad iti
prakṛtaiva kriyānuṣajyate || 31 ||

lg.l: yudhi sasarja ruṣā suravidviṣe sa vapur asya nināya kabandhatām || 32 ||
sa guṇai raṇeṣv api yaśaḥpaṭaṃ tato 'mṛduvāyaseṣu samado rasaṃ gataḥ |

div.p:
amṛduvāyaseṣu krūrakākeṣu raṇeṣu sa devo yaśaḥ
paṭam uvāya vyūtavān_ | ‘veñ_ tantusaṃtāne’ | guṇāḥ śauryādayas tantavaś ca | samado madena saha
vartamānaḥ | rasaṃ gato raṇarāgaṃ prāptaḥ | asaṅgato 'prasaktyā avahelayaiva seṣu saśaraṃ ca dha
nuś cālayann arisenāṃ mṛdnāti yaḥ | samau ca yogyau ājānuvilambinau doṣau bāhū yasya
saḥ || 33 ||

lg.l: ekatra tridaśagaṇair abhidrutānām anyatra pramathabalaiś ca dānavānām |
kīrtyaivāhavabhuvam ujjhatām aśeṣāṃ paryāptā daśa kakubho 'pi no babhūvuḥ || 34 ||

div.p: kīrtyaiva ripukīrtanamātreṇa yaśasaiva ca || 34 ||

sā surāṇāṃ sabhā bhagna
māyā satī tamajaṃ tuṣṭāva | yato daityānāṃ gaṇamāyāsabhājam eva cakṛvāṃsaṃ kṛtavantam_ |
atra ‘yudhi cakrivāṃsaṃ’ iti kvacit pāṭhaḥ | sa tu na yuktaḥ | krādiniyamādiṇniṣedhaprāpteḥ |
ahitānām arīṇām antakaṃ vināśakaṃ raṃho yasya | ahibhis tāntāḥ khinnāḥ karā yasya |
hasantaṃ ca sāṭṭahāsam_ || 35 ||

lg.l: sa mānayāmāsa dṛśāsamānayā samānayā saṃyati bhāsamānayā |

div.p:
sa devo nākināṃ samūham asamānayā lokottarayā
samānayā sapramāṇayā bhāsamānayā ca dṛṣṭyā mānayāmāsa | nāsti viraho yatra tathākṛtvā
umayā samānayātaḥ sahagataḥ | samānayā sābhimānayā | asamo 'naḥ prāṇo yasyās tayā |
saha ca mānena jñānena pūjayā vā vartamānayā || 37 ||

ditijānāṃ samitiḥ samūhas tasyā
nāyakena vibhunā smarāreḥ saṃbandhinī priyeva bheje | seneti sāmarthyāt_ | ‘madanaripucamūḥ’
iti tu yuktaḥ pāṭhaḥ | nāyakaḥ kāmuko 'pi | māno dairghyādiparimāṇamahastāvaś ca (?) |
nāsty avanaṃ rakṣā yatra tādṛśī yā kharā viṣamā ājis tatra vidāritā uravo daṇḍāḥ ke
tavo yasyām_ | navābhiś ca nakhānāṃ rājibhiḥ kṣatapaṅktibhir vidāritāv ūrūdaṇḍo yasyāḥ || 38 ||

lg.l: sa mānasīm āttasamānasīmā sindhor vidhāyārijanasya pīḍām |

div.p:
sa daityanāthaḥ śatrujanasya mānasīṃ pīḍāṃ kṛtvā kapolakāntiyogād īśaṃ sakaṭakaṃ hasann i
vāsta | sindhoḥ samudrād āttasamānasīmā gṛhītacitta(tocita)maryādaḥ || 39 ||

lg.l: nirāsa taṃ bāṇagaṇair gaṇādhipas tato 'sya tenāpratimena karmaṇā |
akṛta yudhi vināyako vidviṣāṃ na ca kam atanutāpadāvaṃ citam |
mṛtam amaravadhūḥ śritā vibhramān acakamata nutāpadā vañcitam || 41 ||

div.p:
vināyako gaṇādhipaḥ kaṃ ca ripum atanus tāpa eva dāvo yasya tādṛśaṃ nākarot_ | citaṃ
pravṛddham_ | amaravadhūś ca yudhi saṃmukhaṃ hatatvād āpadā vañcitaṃ vipadā tyaktaṃ mṛtaṃ yodham acaka
mata prārthayāṃcakre | nutā vallabhalābhena ślāghitā || 41 ||

bhogīndrāṇāṃ śarīreṇa baddhaśo
bhau praveṣṭau bhujau nābhiś ca yasya | mandaras tu vāsukeḥ prakṛṣṭābhir veṣṭanābhir abdhimathanasamaye
vyarucat_ || 42 ||

lg.l: mukhaśriyaṃ bibhrad asau vinirjitasvaruṃ tu dantena samānanāgatām |
jaghāna meghān vyatipetivān raṇe svaruṃtudaṃ tena samānanā gatām || 43 ||

div.p:
asau tu gaṇapatir dantena vinirjitaḥ svarur vajraṃ yayā tādṛśīṃ mukhaśobhāṃ
tathā samaṃ yogyaṃ yadānanaṃ mukhaṃ tadāgatām_ | samānanāgatāṃ nāgena sārūpyaṃ dadhānaḥ svaruṃ
tudaṃ suṣṭhumarmāvidham ariṃ tena dantena hatavān_ || 43 ||
saṃbhāvitā yogyatayā matāḥ || 44 ||

lg.l: katham api sānakapaṭahā raṇabhūmīḥ prāpya varcasā na kapaṭahā |
sthagitāśo 'bhanagaṇḍaṃ druhiṇasya dadhan mukhaṃ sa śobhanagaṇḍam || 45 ||

div.p:
mahānakair bherībhiḥ paṭahaiś ca vartamānā raṇabhuvaḥ prāpya sa gaṇeśo brahmaṇo 'ṇḍaṃ katham api nābha
nak_ kenāpi prakāreṇa na bhinnavān_ | varcasā tejasā sthagitadik_ | kapaṭahā parakīyaṃ
vyājaṃ hatavān_ || 45 ||

lg.l: vyacarat tarasātha ṣaṇmukho yudhi śaktyobhayarūpayā śritaḥ |

div.p:
sāmarthyam āyudhabhedaś ca śaktir ubhayarūpā | sphuṭasaṃpado navāḥ ṣaṭ_
padā alino yāsu | sphuṭaṃ kṛtvā ca saṃpannaṃ vaṣaḍ iti padaṃ yāsu || 46 ||

lg.l: śriyam atanuyaśaś ca tasya śubhraṃ surabhi divi bhramadakṣatām alāsīt || 47 ||

div.p:
nānādaityabhe
dini tatra surastrīlokasya nirmalā vibhrameṣu dakṣatā prauḍhatvam āsīt_ | tasya ca surabhiśreṣṭhaṃ
divi ca bhramadyaśaḥ śobhāmalāsīj jagrāha | ‘lā ādāne’ | akṣatām akhaṇḍām_ || 47 ||
taikṣṇyaṃ niṣkaruṇatāpi | udaghāniṣata ūrdhvaṃ hatā utkṣiptāś ca | parivāraḥ koṣo 'pi || 48 ||

lg.l: raṇāṅganorvīṃ dadhad āhitonmadadvipakṣayo dhāma sa kṛttadānavaiḥ |
cakara bāṇair bahulāsutaḥ skhaladvipakṣayodhām asakṛt tadā navaiḥ || 49 ||

div.p:
bahulāsutaḥ kārtikeyas tadā kṛttadānavaiś chinnadanujair navaiś ca śaraiḥ skhalanto vipakṣāṇāṃ yodhā
yatra tādṛśīṃ samarabhūmiṃ kṛtavān_ | dhāma tejo dadhat_ | āhitaś conmadānāṃ dvipānāṃ
kṣayo yena || 49 ||

lg.l: rīḍhābhiḥ prakaṭitasāra eka uccair vaiśākhaḥ sapadi babhūva bāhudaṇḍaḥ || 50 ||

div.p:
netraṃ dukūlaṃ nayanaṃ vā, manthānarajjuś ca | rīḍhāḥ śatruṣv avamānāḥ kṣo
bhāś ca | sāro balaṃ navanītaṃ ca | vaiśākhaḥ kumārasaṃbandhī manthānadaṇḍaś ca || 50 ||

lg.l: daityān ahimahima himataro 'ddhā roddhā dalayati yatibhayahṛdyaḥ |
hṛdyaḥ sa jagati gatihṛdasaṃkhye saṃkhye kṛtaratir atigurur āsīt || 51 ||

div.p:
aheḥ
śeṣasya mahimā yatra hitam upakārakaṃ taraḥ syado yatra tathā kṛtvā addhā niścitaṃ yo 'surān da
layati sa kumāro hṛdyaḥ saṃkhye raṇe kṛtaratitvād atiguruś cāsīt_ | roddhā ripūṇāṃ pratiṣe
dhakaḥ | yatīnāṃ bhayaṃ harati yaḥ | gatiṃ ca harati yaḥ | sāmarthyād arīṇām_ || 51 ||

lg.l: tad āhave satkavikāvyapāyibhir dadhe mukhaśrīḥ pṛtanāturaṅgamaiḥ || 52 ||

div.p:
turagāḥ
karṇaśālinaḥ supramāṇakarṇatvāt_ | vidagdhās tu sadasadarthāvadhāraṇāt_ | satkavikābhir avya
pāyābhiḥ (sahitaiḥ) satkavīnāṃ ca kāvyaṃ pibanti ye taiḥ || 52 ||

jagatāṃ manaḥpramāthi
ny urvaśī yatra tādṛśyā senayā kumāraḥ kayā jitaḥ na kayācit_ | ruṣā kopenāmṛduḥ krūraḥ |
vaśī jitendriyaḥ | ājitaḥ samare | ādyāditvāt tasiḥ || 53 ||

lg.l: gurumuṣṭighātaparipīḍitaṃ javād vinipātya vṛtram atha kuñjarānanaḥ |

div.p:
paraśuprahārair vikaṭā
vraṇā yasmāt_ | arasaṃ vīrarasaśūnyam_ | vikaṭavraṇam uro yasyeti tu na yuktam_ | ‘uraḥprabhṛ
tibhyaḥ—’ iti kapprasaṅgāt_ | ‘samāsāntavidhir anityaḥ’ iti ca kabvidhau na śakyate va
ktum_ | ‘śeṣād vibhāṣā’ iti sūtrārambhāt_ || 54 ||

lg.l: ke dārayantaṃ samadaṃ tamālanīlaṃ hariṃ jetum alaṃ babhūvuḥ || 55 ||

div.p:
śarā eva lāgalāni halāni teṣām a
rijanaṃ kedārayantaṃ kṣetraṃ kurvāṇaṃ samā dantamālā yasya tādṛśaṃ ca hariṃ ke daityāḥ | paribhā
vituṃ samarthā babhūvuḥ | dārayantaṃ dviṣo ghnantam_ | samadaṃ sāhaṃkāram_ || 55 ||

lg.l: sa varavīravasāv uruvairisūr avasare virasaṃ virarāsa saḥ || 56 ||

div.p:
sa surāṇāṃ
varo haris tasminn avasare virasaṃ virarāsa dhvānam akarot_ | savisarā prasarantī surāṇāṃ sāra
bhūtā vasaivāsavaṃ pānaṃ yatra | vivare rasātale ye 'surās teṣv api sāsravaḥ kleśaiḥ saha vartate |
tadvartino 'pi daityān abādhiṣṭetyarthaḥ | avivaraṃ vā saṃtataṃ kṛtvā | saha ca varair vīrair vasubhiś ca
suraviśeṣair vartamāne | vasu vā tejaḥ | uruvairisūr mahatām api ripūṇāṃ prerakaḥ || 56 ||
(tryakṣaraḥ)

lg.l: akṛta ca samaraṃ surāṅganānām atanu dadhac chucimānasaṃ sadaṃsaḥ || 57 ||

div.p:
sa ha
rir ditijānāṃ camūbhir yujyamānā saṃsadā sabhā yatra tādṛśaṃ samaraṃ dhārayann apsarasāṃ mānasa
m atanuṃ kṛtvā śuci prītyā viśadam akarot_ | sadaṃsaḥ suskandhaḥ || 57 ||

lg.l: jetā vegāṃs tīvrabhā vāyavīyān vṛtrārāter baddhabhāvā yavīyān |

div.p:
vṛtrārāter indrasya
yavīyān anujo viṣṇur aṇūrapīḍāḥ svalpā api stutīr ākārṇyāhṛṣyat_ | yatas tā baddhabhāvāḥ sā
kūtāḥ | asau tu vāyavīn vegāj jetā vāyor api caturagatiḥ | tīvrabhā duḥsahadyutiḥ | cāṇū
rākhyasya ca daityasya pīḍāḥ prathamam eva vidhātā || 58 ||

lg.l: bhāty ākāśaśyāmale yasya dehe vāsaśchāyā san navā pītaraṅgā |

div.p:
vapuṣi navā vāsasaś chāyā sa
ñ śobhanaṃ kṛtvā cakāsti | pītaraṅgā kapiśavarṇā | raṅga iti raṅgater gatyarthasya ghañi rūpam_ |
yena ca nānāvidheṣu haryeṣv āsannā vāpīnāṃ taraṅgā yasyāṃ tādṛśī dvārikākhyānagarī
paryaṣkāri bhūṣitā || 59 ||

lg.l: raṇe natā yena ripor varūthinī sahāsam āsannavadhe 'nukampitā |

div.p:
āsannavadhe 'pi raṇe yena natā satī ripucamūḥ sahāsaṃ kṛtvānu
kampitā | āhavakriyāyām asamarthaḥ sāmarthyarahito 'ta evāsamo nyūno 'sannasādhunavaś ca ta
ruṇo dhenukanāmāsuro yasya tādṛśaṃ ca sīriṇaṃ yaḥ ślāghitavān_ | pitā janakaḥ sarveṣāṃ
pālakatvāt_ || 60 ||

lg.l: tā rakṣa vīra samare cakitāḥ samāyāḥ |
ityarthivāgbhir ajahāt sa tu tās tatīr na

div.p:
sa harir ittham arthināṃ vāgbhis tā arātipṛtanā jahau | na tu
tarakṣur nāma daityas tatsaṃbandhinīs tatīr yodhapaṅktīḥ | yasmād asamarecakitā maṇḍalair bhrāntāḥ sa
māyāś ca savyājās tāḥ | kiṃvidhā vāca āha—he vīra, samāyāḥ samagatīs tā ripusenāḥ
samare vijitya sāṃprataṃ rakṣa prasādena yojaya | yataś cakitāḥ sabhayāḥ || 61 ||

lg.l: vahati karatalena baddharāgaṃ raṇadali tāmarasaṃ ca yaḥ sahāsam |

div.p:
raṇadali
kvaṇadbhramaraṃ sahāsaṃ ca vikasvaraṃ tāmarasaṃ kareṇa dhatte tenāmunā mayākṣyasyāsurasyātmajaḥ
sahāsaṃ hasitena saha nihataḥ | raṇe dalito 'marāṇāṃ saṃcayaḥ samūho yena saḥ || 62 ||

saha
rir vyāpāryamāṇābhiḥ karavālalatābhir nikṛttāś chinnās tridaśānāṃ pṛtanāḥ kurvatīr andhakasya
tāḥ senāḥ śarair vyāpa sthagitavān_ | lalatā valgatā balena sīriṇānusṛtaḥ | aryamāṇo
jñāyamānaḥ ke śirasi ravaḥ śarapātajanito yāsām_ | nikṛntatīti nikṛt_ nikarāṇāṃ
chettā || 63 ||

lg.l: d iva sakaram arīṇā cāmarair vījyamānam || 64 ||

div.p:
sakaraṃ saraśmikam api divasakaraṃ sthagayadbhir arīṇāṃ cāmarair vījyamānam amaraiś ca
vījyamānaṃ viśeṣeṇejyamānam abhyarcyamānaṃ taṃ hariṃ ripujano 'bhiyayau | arīṇām agatīnām_ |
nāsti rīr gatir yeṣām iti kṛtvā | ‘rī gatireṣaṇayoḥ’ | atra ‘vāmi’ iti vikalpena
‘neyaṅuvaṅ_—’ iti pratiṣiddhāyā api nadīsaṃjñāyāḥ pakṣe 'bhyanujñātatvātannibandhano nuḍāgamaḥ
|| 64 ||

tridaśāṅganā evābjinyas tāsāṃ savitari vikāsajanakatvāt sūrye tasminn acyute tu
ṅgatāyā aunnatyasya udaya ullāso yatra tathā kṛtvā sthite sati bhaṭair anekapānāṃ rājayo
dvipaghaṭā arjitāḥ | sa ca harir adayaṃ kṛtvā daityānāṃ bhayaṃ vitarituṃ dātuṃ durdharatvaṃ gato
na kasya ripoḥ parājayenorjitāḥ samṛddhāḥ kriyāḥ babhāra || 65 ||

pratipakṣā eva bhānava
s teṣāṃ rāhū grasanodyatatvena tatsadṛśau bhujau bibhrat tadā harir asurāṇāṃ dhvajinīr āśiśvasat_ |
yatas tā navā bālā yāś camūrāṇāṃ vadhvastā ivācarantīḥ | bhītā ityarthaḥ | camūbhi
parakīyābhir avadhūyamānāḥ prathamaṃ cāhūtā yuddhāyāgū(kā)ritā dānavānāṃ pṛtanā yābhiḥ
|| 66 ||

tridivavartma svargamārgaḥ sa rathino vīrān dadhau | samadano 'psarodarśanāt sakāma
āgamo yeṣāṃ tadbhāvena sahasā apratarkitaṃ tarasā ca vegena saṃghaṭitān_ | tathā ca raṇamaye
udadhau samarasamudre balavatā hariṇā śriyā śuśubhe | āhitakampayā ripūṇāṃ ca kṛtabha
yayā | samadaiḥ sarāgair nāgair hetubhir matayābhipretayā | ataro durlaṅghyaḥ sārathir yasya hareḥ || 67 ||
ambarastrī suraramaṇī śriyāṃ sthānaṃ nagaropa............[itaḥparaṃ ṭīkā nopalabdhā |]

lg.l: diśi diśi vīrabhadra ucitān niveśya pṛtanābhaṭān vidalaya-
vaṃśyaś cāruyaśas tadā dadhad adhaḥ sadyo hṛtaśrīripoḥ |
bhāsvān sānumati kṣapā iva tadā sūdāraśobhānugaḥ |

div.p: (yugalakam_)
(ity etad utthāryā)

lg.l: raṇabhuvam adhunā jayāśaṃsayā dordrumālambano dārayan vidviṣo 'tyūrjitā
kimiva bata bhiyetibherīravair abhyadhāyīva koṇāhatiprastutair yudbhuvā || 74 ||

div.p: (caṇḍavṛṣṭiprapātadaṇḍakena garbhayamakam_)
(sragdharayānulomapratilomābhyāṃ cakracatuṣṭayam_)

list.item:
3. itaḥprabhṛti agrimasargasyāṣṭamaślo
kaparyantam ekaṃ pattraṃ (281 saṃkhyakaṃ) kha-pustake truṭitam asti.

div.p: (ṣoḍaśadalapadmabandhaḥ)

iti śrībālabṛhaspatyanujīvino vāgīśvarāṅkasya vidyādhipatyaparanāmno mahākave
rājānakaśrīratnākarasya kṛtau ratnāṅke haravijaye mahākāvye
caṇḍikāsamarākṣepo nāma ṣaṭcatvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ |
saptacatvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ |

lg.l: m etat tvayā janani yat prasabhaṃ raṇāgre |
cakrā na jātu raṇalālasayā punas tvam || 5 ||
yady utsṛjen na kamalaṃ kamalākṣi lakṣmīm |
vyāpya sthito jagati yaḥ sakalā giraś ca
yaś ca praviśya kila tā api dhātur īḍyam |
m audumbaraṃ ca kavayaḥ kila tālusāhvam |
vyāpīti haṃsa iti tāra iti sma śukra
ity ucyate ya iha vaidyuta ity anantaḥ |
tasyāpi yo mukham iti prathitaḥ pṛthivyām || 66 ||
yaś cākṣuṣaḥ puruṣa ity abhidhīyate ca |
m ucyeta nityam iti cen nahi kāraṇaṃ tat |
jyotiḥ paraṃ yad amṛtaṃ hṛdi cākaśīti
sthityartham asya jagataḥ katham apy upādhi-
pādaś ca yasya bhagavāṃs tanum aprakampyām || 82 ||
r vāgīśvarī ca vinivartata eva yasmāt || 83 ||
granthiṃ ca yo vinihitaṃ puruṣo guhāyām || 84 ||
yaś cākṣaraḥ kṣaṇam atha kṣaratām upetaḥ |
hrasvaṃ na dīrgham atha na plutam apy aliṅga-
vyāvṛttir asti na kutaścid apīha yasya
vāgīśvaro janani sa praṇavo mukhaṃ te || 92 ||

div.p: (dvātriṃśadbhiḥ kulakam_)

lg.l: m ājyaṃ dvijāñ juhuvuṣaḥ śikhini pradīpte |
sthānaṃ nayanti tad asau tava śaktijṛmbhā || 95 ||
sūkṣmā sanātanatanuś ca nanu tvam eva
m etat sṛjaty avihataprasaraṃ tvayā tat || 102 ||
tvāṃ nābhim āhur amṛtām amṛtasya sapta-
m ekā tvam eva viśinaṣṭi samādhibhājaḥ || 108 ||
tvaṃ chandasāṃ kila jagaty adhidevatā tvaṃ
s tārādikā jagati yāḥ kila śaktayo 'ṣṭau |
d etat tridhā sthitam uśanti parāvarajñāḥ |
udgītham om iti yad akṣaram āmananti
brahma svatantram iha kevalam apy akartṛ
yasya kṣitiś ca caraṇau gaganaṃ ca nābhiḥ
dyaur uttamāṅgam api tasya vibhoḥ kila tva-
m āpyāyayasy aniśam eva himāṃśum ekā || 121 ||
dhyātaṃ nṛṇāṃ phalati tattvam anekadhā ya-
t tasyāmalā śivapadasya śikhā tvam ekā || 123 ||
yan neti nety upaniṣatsv abhidhīyate ca
m ekaiva tiṣṭhasi vibhor jagato niyantrī || 127 ||
brahma sthitaṃ sakalam ekam api dvidhā yat |
bāhyaṃ tvam antaram atha śriyam eṣi śaktiḥ || 128 ||
ye vā pibanti surabhes tava tāludeśa-
m ābhāsi saṃyugamukheṣu ca vaiṣṇavī tvam || 140 ||
vajraṃ tvam eva dadhatī nayanair vibhāsi
saṃyacchati sma na yamas tvayi bhaktinamrān || 149 ||
itthaṃ stutes tava vayaṃ viratāḥ svaśakti-
m abhyeti kasya rasanā virasām avasthām || 166 ||
iti tava guṇavādataḥ kilāsmāj janani yadarjitam asti puṇyajātam |
pratisamayam iyaṃ tvadaṅghripūjābhiratiphalā tvayi tena no 'stu bhaktiḥ || 167 ||
āsede 'nyair dainyam aprāptadaityaiḥ(?) śaureḥ śūrair antikaṃ ratnasānau || 170 ||

div.p:
iti śrībālabṛhaspatyanujīvino vāgīśvarāṅkasya vidyādhipatyaparanāmno mahākave
rājānakaśrīratnākarasya kṛtau ratnāṅke haravijaye mahākāvye
caṇḍīstotraṃ nāma saptacatvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ |
aṣṭacatvāriṃśaḥ sargaḥ |

lg.l: tārkṣye sthito megharucir yuyutsur vivalgito valguvarūthinīṣu || 2 ||
sāsī susāsāsasusāsaso 'sāv avauvavāv eva vivo vivīvaḥ |

div.p: (ekākṣarapādaḥ)

lg.l: nirīyur āyodhanamūrdhni kāyād amarṣavaddger iva visphuliṅgāḥ || 4 ||
salīlam āyodhanamūrdhni darpāt saṃnāham utsṛṣṭavato 'pi tasya |
surāricakrīkṛtacāpamuktaiḥ śaraiḥ śarīraṃ bibhide na dhairyam || 6 ||
vistāridainyaṃ laghubhiḥ prahāraiś ciraṃ vaśasthaṃ gurubhiś ca cakre || 8 ||
abhūt parīte subhaṭair arātiviṣādavadbhir na viṣādavadbhiḥ |
asṛṅmayīnāṃ prabhavas tadānīm apāṃ ca janye samapāñcajanye || 9 ||
surārisenādalitās tadānīṃ camūcarān svān atha śārṅgapāṇiḥ || 10 ||

div.p: (dvyakṣaraḥ)

lg.l: sa sādhusaṃdho nidhanāndhadhundhur dhanurdhunāno dhuri dhīnidhīnām |

div.p: (saptavyañjanabandhaḥ)
(dvyakṣaraḥ)

lg.l: kuntābhighātād raṇam īyivadbhis tadācakampe turagair arīṇām |
ghnanto na te tatra ruciṃ dadhānā tadā ca kaṃpeturagairarīṇām || 17 ||

div.p: (dvyakṣaraḥ)

lg.l: yodhasya tasmin samare tadānīṃ vinighnato 'rāticamūḥ svadhāmnā |
bhāsvān api sphāratarapratāpo na sāmyam ālambata cārudoṣṇaḥ || 21 ||

div.p: (mātrācyutakam_)
(yugmam_)
(prātilomyena sa evārthaḥ)

lg.l: nipātitas tena dṛḍhāsthibandhe tadbhaṅgatoṣād iva tīkṣṇadhāraḥ |

div.p: (dvyakṣaraḥ)

lg.l: sa pānabhūmīr iva saṃyugorvīś cakāra nānāvaravīrabāhyāḥ || 28 ||
tasmin mahārau ravasaṃkaṭe 'pi nipātitāḥ saṃyugamūrdhni vīrāḥ |

div.p: (mātrārahito gūḍhakriyākartṛkaḥ)

lg.l: ekā śivā dūty api cāntareṇa saṃyojayāmāsa sahāpsarobhiḥ || 32 ||
saṃkhye parāsuṃ suralokanārī pravīram ādāya sarāgicetāḥ |

div.p: (akṣaracyutakam_)
(dvyakṣaraḥ)

lg.l: kṣatābhimānās tarasā tayātha te vītatṛṣṇāḥ samare babhūvuḥ || 36 ||
saṃsārasetuḥ surasaṃstutās trais tastāra sāstāritarāḥ satārā |
